detailedDescription:
Summary
Situated just minutes from Bush Hill Rail Station and the conservation area and within easy access of Enfield Town, we offer this spacious three bedroom halls adjoining family house with delightful south facing rear garden, three good sized bedrooms, two reception rooms and more. Chain free.

Description
Barnfields are pleased to offer this delightful, three bedroom 1930's halls adjoining, semi-detached family house situated in the popular residential tree lined turning of Park Avenue, within close proximity of shops, schools, Bush Hill Park Rail Station and within easy access of both Enfield Town with its multiple shopping facilities, transport hub and the A10 with its multiple retail parks.

The property is offered in good condition throughout and boasts a new brick driveway for three cars.

detailedDescription:
*Chain Free* Cottage Fields are delighted to present this ground floor two double bedroom apartment in this sought after development in Winchmore Hill. This property boasts an array of features to include Gated and Secure underground parking, long lease, En-Suite to Master Bedroom, Renovated and Modern Family Bathroom Juliette Balcony to Large Living and Dining Room, Lift in development, Gas Central Heating, Communal gardens and Much More. This property is not to be missed as it is ideally located within walking distance to local amenities, which include Winchmore Hill British Rail Station with links to Central London, Local Outstanding Ofsted Rated schools, shops, and more.

Cottage Fields Team Thoughts:

' Stunning Ground Floor Spacious apartment in one of North London's most affluent locations, enter via the gated underground parking and take the lift to the floor of your apartment. This property is stunning, whether you are looking for a home or investment this property would be ideal'.

Location Guide:

This property is located in the affluent and Historical area of Winchmore Hill. The area offers a strong sense of community, hosting weekly farmers markets and an annual town fair on the local green. The area boasts streets of well-maintained family houses, fine parks and an easy direct train commute into the City in just 30 minutes via Winchmore Hill br stations which is within walking distance. Local amenities include local Post Office, Library, Banks, Restaurants, Shops, whilst also being just a short journey from Enfield Town with its high sreet shopping, and local 'Outstanding' rated schools.

detailedDescription:
Cole Hardin is pleased present this first floor one bedroom apartment located within easy reach of Bush Hill Park Train Station.

The property comprises of a spacious Living room which leads to a modern high spec kitchen, hallway with Bedroom, study and modern bathroom.

This property is in excellent condition throughout, with neutral décor, large rooms, plenty storage cupboards, a study that can be use for an office or a nursey room on top of the large bright and airy bedroom.

This really is a must see property which requires no work at all.

Lease is 94 years
Service charge: £950 per annum
Ground rent: £10 per annum

The apartment is situated in Bush Hill, North London, a 4 minute walk to Bush Hill Park Train Station which goes direct to Seven Sisters Underground Station (Victoria Line) in just 10 minutes, and also direct to London Liverpool Street Underground Station (Central Line and Circle, Hammersmith & City Line) in 30 minutes. Perfect for those who work in the city.

Other local amenities include a Sainsbury's local (3 minute walk), Enfield Town Shopping Centre, and Enfield Retail Park.

Vendors comments:
"I have lived in the property for 2 years and have found the location very convenient. The property is a 5 minute walk from Bush Hill Park Overground Station, where I take the train to Seven Sisters and change on to the underground. In addition to this, there are a wide range of shops on Main Avenue and Enfield Town Palace Exchange shopping centre is also within walking distance. The area is very peaceful and as a person living alone, I have felt safe at all times. It is a family friendly area, with Bush Hill Park being only 1 minute walk from the property.
During the pandemic and having to work from home the availability of a separate study has been invaluable. The ability to have a secluded work area which allowed me to distinguish from work time and personal time was perfect."

Property Description

The property comprises of a spacious Living room which leads to a modern high spec kitchen, hallway with Bedroom, study and modern bathroom.

This property is in excellent condition throughout, with neutral décor, large rooms, plenty storage cupboards, a study that can be use for an office or a nursey room on top of the large bright and airy bedroom.

This really is a must see property which requires no work at all.

Lease is 94 years
Service charge: £950 per annum
Ground rent: £10 per annum

The apartment is situated in Bush Hill, North London, a 4 minute walk to Bush Hill Park Train Station which goes direct to Seven Sisters Underground Station (Victoria Line) in just 10 minutes, and also direct to London Liverpool Street Underground Station (Central Line and Circle, Hammersmith & City Line) in 30 minutes. Perfect for those who work in the city.

Other local amenities include a Sainsbury's local (3 minute walk), Enfield Town Shopping Centre, and Enfield Retail Park.

Vendors comments:
"I have lived in the property for 2 years and have found the location very convenient. The property is a 5 minute walk from Bush Hill Park Overground Station, where I take the train to Seven Sisters and change on to the underground. In addition to this, there are a wide range of shops on Main Avenue and Enfield Town Palace Exchange shopping centre is also within walking distance. The area is very peaceful and as a person living alone, I have felt safe at all times. It is a family friendly area, with Bush Hill Park being only 1 minute walk from the property.
"During the pandemic and having to work from home the availability of a separate study has been invaluable. The ability to have a secluded work area which allowed me to distinguish from work time and personal time was perfect."

"The property was bought in need of a complete renovation which I undertook. The property was rewired, replastered and new plumbing was put in. I have renovated the property though out, including a high spec kitchen with AEG appliances and an integrated washing machine. I have also updated the bathroom and included a concealed cistern and built in under storage for the sink. It is with a heavy heart that I am selling the property and the only reason is that I am moving further out of London."

detailedDescription:
Baker and Chase are delighted to present this 3-bedroom tunnel-linked family home, which has been impressively extended and improved, on the popular Willow Estate.

This property really must be seen to be fully appreciated. Once inside, the accommodation consists of a private front room complete with a log burner fire place, Oak flooring and bay fronted windows. An extended kitchen/diner follows offering under floor heating and boasts a fully fitted kitchen with a range of integrated appliances. There is ample to space to cook, entertain and eat on offer as the space has been cleverly designed and interlinks perfectly with the garden via stunning Bi-folding. A modern cloakroom concludes the ground floor accommodation.

The first floor retains the original layout, offering two generous double bedrooms, a further single bedroom and a stylish 4-piece bathroom suite. We believe that there is also scope to develop the loft (STPP). Externally the property benefits from a private driveway and side access.

Sandringham Close is a very desirable no-through road, close to Aldersbrook park and a host of popular schools, making this property an excellent choice for families. Enfield Town is little over half a mile away and offers a wide range of shops and restaurants. Enfield Town London Overground Station is also just 0.6 miles away and Enfield Chase B.R Station is also under 1 mile away, both offering direct access into The City of London in approximately 30 minutes.

For families where schools are a consideration, St Andrews CofE, St Georges rc and Lavender Primary schools are all within 0.5 miles.

title: 3 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
Baker and Chase present this well presented 2 bedroom Victorian terrace, with large garden and off street parking in a sought after location close to Gordon Hill B.R Station.

Entered via a porch, the accommodation consists of a spacious reception room and boasts double glazed box-bay style windows. The property has been extended by the current owners and hosts a TV room and w/c on the ground floor as well as a stylish kitchen/diner which boasts a fully fitted kitchen with a range of integrated appliances. There is ample to space to cook, entertain and eat on offer as the space has been cleverly designed and interlinks perfectly with the garden via stunning Bi-folding doors.

The first floor offers two double bedrooms, the main of which spanning the full width of the property and a modern family bathroom, completing the internal accommodation. Externally the property benefits from a private driveway to the front and south facing rear garden.

The property sits in a fantastic location just 0.2 miles from Gordon Hill B.R station, serving the City in around 30 minutes, via Finsbury Park (Piccadilly and Victoria Lines). Lancaster Road hosts a number of well known shops, including a Sainsburys local and a Co-Op. There are also a number of popular location shops including Zippola Cafe and The award winning Holtwhites Artisan Bakery.

This particular pocket of Enfield has the added benefit of being close to both Town and "Country", with the beautiful Hillyfields and 273 acre Forty Hall Estate both close by.

The kitchen has a comprehensive range of wall and base units with range cooker, integrated fridge/freezer and dishwasher. The conservatory has French doors onto the garden. On the first floor there are four excellent size bedrooms and a family bathroom with both shower cubicle and bath. There is the added benefit of a loft room which could be used for a multitude of uses. There is a stunning west facing garden with patio area, lawn with mature flower and shrub borders. detailedDescription:
Offered with no onward chain and a long lease is a magnificent two double bedroom apartment with secure gated car parking space. The flat is set within a modern purpose built development in a superb cul-de-sac location close to Southgate tube station. Boasting circa 950sq ft of internal floor space, this unusually spacious two bedroom flat offers bright and spacious accommodation and is beautifully presented throughout. The layout of the apartment is particularly suited to modern family living and young professionals alike.

Upon entering the property, you are greeted by a welcoming entrance hall that leads you to all the principle rooms. There is a stunning large reception complete with Juliet balcony and a modern kitchen offering ample storage and high-end integrated appliances. There are two well proportioned bedrooms, situated at the rear of the property. The stylish family bathroom boasts ceramic tiled walls and flooring with chrome fittings.

Location

Excellently located moments from Southgate tube station and high street with a variety of shops, restaurants, trendy coffee shops and patisseries on offer. Other benefits nearby include Broomfield and Grovelands parks and open spaces. The property falls within catchment for highly sought after primary and secondary schools. Palmers Green mainline station (trains to Moorgate) is also close by.

Service Charges

The service charge on the property is circa £1,500 per annum, with ground rent at £300 per annum. All prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries via a solicitor.

108 years from 2021. All prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries via a solicitor.

Blake Court

Blake Court comprises of a collection apartments and bungalows, mainly one and two bedrooms, the communal areas are decorated to a high standard to include a very comfortable communal lounge, on-site restaurant, guest suite, landscaped gardens and ample car parking. The services on offer are much greater than is usual in standard retirement apartments or sheltered housing. detailedDescription:
Nestled on a sought after quiet residential road in the heart of Southgate is a stunning two-bedroom end of terrace Victorian cottage. It has been meticulously renovated by the current owner. Arranged over three storeys with flexible living space, the layout of the house is particularly suited to a family or professionals. The cottage offers a bright and spacious modern-style living. It is beautifully presented throughout with high-end fixtures and fittings so is 'turn key' ready.

Features

Upon arrival at the property, you are greeted by a well maintained front garden leading to the cottage. The stunning front reception room includes a bespoke modern turnaround staircase complete with tempered glass and oak balustrade with bespoke under stairs storage. A rich oak wood floor has been installed throughout both reception rooms.

The designer kitchen boasts modern mat gloss fitted cabinetry complete with solid oak wood work surfaces and matching wall shelves. The high-end integrated appliances includes a brand new Bosch fridge freezer and Neff slide and hide oven with wifi. The white limestone fireplace features a custom made glass freestanding bio ethanol fireplace, perfect for winter nights or summer dinner parties.

The spacious open plan kitchen diner is flooded with natural light through the contemporary custom made large frosted glass pocket door at the front and its large central roof lantern directly above the second reception, situated at the rear of the property. Full width French doors lead out to the generously sized secluded rear garden, designed with low maintenance in mind yet ideal for entertaining family and guests. It has three main areas including a patio area, a raised decking that leads onto the lawn with a timber shed at the rear. The property also has side access and comes with development opportunity
additional land to the rear.

Leading up the stairs from the ground floor, lies a bedroom to the rear with an oak wooden door and contemporary fireplace currently used as an office and spare room thanks to its bespoke study bed that has a bed that folds away to become a desk. The bathroom has been cleverly modified to maximise space and comprises of a four piece bathroom suite with chrome fittings and white limestone tiled walls and floors to create a luxury feeling. Taking the stairs up to the second floor lies the light and airy beautiful master bedroom with two Velux windows and ensuite W.C with wash hand basin.

Location

Excellently located moments from Southgate tube station and high street with a variety of shops, trendy artisan coffee shops, restaurants and patisseries on offer. Other benefits nearby include Grovelands, Oakhill, Oakwood and Broomfield parks and open spaces. In addition, Trent Park Country Club is idyllic for a Sunday afternoon stroll only 15 minutes away. Brunswick park fields perfect for blackberry picking in the summer, sloe berry picking in the autumn and mushroom picking in the winter. North London with a countryside feel offers nearby local farmers markets and wonderful strawberry picking at Pick Your Own Farms on warm summer evenings.

The property falls within catchment for highly sought after primary and secondary schools. Palmers Green mainline station (trains to Moorgate) is also close by.

Being well suited for young professionals and families alike and set in the heart of Southgate, this house is not to be missed. An internal viewing is highly recommended.

Disclaimer For Virtual Viewings

Some or all information pertaining to this property may have been provided solely by the vendor, and although we always make every effort to verify the information provided to us, we strongly advise you to make further enquiries before continuing.

If you book a viewing or make an offer on a property that has had its valuation conducted virtually, you are doing so under the knowledge that this information may have been provided solely by the vendor, and that we may not have been able to access the premises to confirm the information or test any equipment. We therefore strongly advise you to make further enquiries before completing your purchase of the property to ensure you are happy with all the information provided.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Havilands have pleasure in offering this substantial (1803 sq ft) double-fronted property with spacious front reception room and a converted garage which now serves as an additional sitting room or office. The rear reception opens from the main reception and into the garden.
The kitchen has a comprehensive range of wall and base units with gas hob and integrated oven and grill.
In the entrance hallway there is a guest washroom with toilet and wash basin and additional storage.

On the first floor there are four bedrooms and 2 modern family bathrooms. On the second floor there is a further bedroom and an ensuite shower room. The rear garden has a patio area with mature flowers, shrubs, bushes and lawn area, there is a outbuilding which is currently used as a utility room. There is also a front driveway which is brick paved providing off street parking.

Winchmore Hill Green is within easy reach and there are both primary and secondary schools near by. Distance from Winchmore Hill station 0.4 miles. 1 mile from Southgate tube and direct access to the W9 bus on route from Southgate to Chase Farm Hospital.

title: 5 bed semi-detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
Baker and Chase are delighted to offer this well presented 1-bedroom, ground floor flat on a sought after and desirable development close to Enfield Chase B.R Station.

Offered in good condition with double glazing throughout, the property boasts a spacious living room and sizeable double bedroom. There is a modern bathroom and well equipped kitchen. The property also benefits from private parking.

The property is currently tenanted but can be offered chain free. For people considering it as a turnkey buy-to-let investment, the current tenant has been in situ since August 2020 and is keen to stay on. The current rent is set at £950 per calendar month. The lease is a very healthy length and the proximity to the station will ensure the property is always desirable for incoming tenants.

Gladbeck way is situated directly off Windmill Hill. There are an excellent range of shops nearby, including Waitrose on Windmill Hill itself and Enfield Town which hosts a terrific array of shops.

Enfield Chase B.R station serves London Moorgate via Finsbury Park (Victoria & Piccadilly Line), making this a great option for those that commute.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A stunning Garden level apartment comprising of 3 Bedrooms and 2 Bathrooms. Forming part of this luxury development of nine bespoke apartments set in an oasis of tranquillity offering five star hotel style living. Concierge at your service, beautifully manicured landscaped gardens, swim, leisure and wellness facilities and Golf course views.

Specification:
- Main Hallway features floor and wall finishes. Feature decorative lighting. Concierge reception.
- Bespoke passenger lift exclusively designed
for residences serving each level with direct access to parking/Spa level. Oversized entrance doors to all apartments.
- Individually designed Kitchen & Utility Room with
bespoke cabinetry, lacquer finish soft closing doors and drawers. Miele integrated oven and induction hob, integrated combination microwave/oven, integrated full-height fridge and freezer, dishwasher. Composite worktops to Kitchen. Feature splashbacks to selected areas. Composite worktops to Utility rooms. Composite under mount sink with waste disposals. Quooker mixer tap with boiling water function and extendable hose for cleaning in dark platinum matt. Miele washing machine and dryer to Utility room.
- Bathrooms & Powder Room with large tile wall and floor finishes to master ensuite bathroom and guest ensuite bathroom. Bespoke vanity units with stone tops exclusively designed. Medicine cabinets to master ensuite bathroom where appropriate. Rain showers to master ensuite bathroom. Pull out hand showers to bath in master ensuite bathroom. Wall mounted WC pan with soft close seat/cover and concealed cistern to ensuite bathroom. Heated towel rail to all ensuite bathroom.
- Interior finishes include bespoke oversized timber doors. Bespoke skirting and architrave detail. High quality timber floors throughout hallway and main reception room. Carpet to all bedrooms and dressing area to master suite with bespoke fitted wardrobes and second bedroom suite with fitted wardrobes including shelving, rails, drawers and concealed lighting. Dark bronze effect ironmongery to all doors.
- Lighting & Technology includes bespoke lighting design layout. Feature ceiling coffers with concealed lighting to selected hallway, principal
reception room and master bedroom suite. Recessed LED downlighters throughout. 5-amp lighting circuits to selected principal reception room and bedroom suites. Pir lighting where appropriate. Integrated Sonos music system and ceiling speakers to selected principal reception
room and master bedroom suite. Cat 6 wiring throughout. Telephone and data points to selected
principal reception room. Television points to principal reception room and bedroom suites. Lutron mood lighting system. Central ‘Hub’ cupboard for home automation.
- Underfloor heating to principal reception room, hallway, bedroom suites and bathrooms. Individual room thermostatic climate control. Comfort cooling to selected principal room and master bedroom suites.
- Video entry system to operate private entry / exit. Individually designed zoned apartment alarm system installed. Mains operated smoke detectors. On site concierge service. External lighting to selected areas. CCTV coverage of all external communal areas monitored by the concierge.
- Secure underground parking with two reserved parking spaces. Heated ramp. Individual lockable storage room. Power and lighting to private storage room. Cold store for grocery deliveries and
additional private refrigeration. Provision for vehicle charging points.
- Residents Spa & Fitness Suite includes comfort cooling. Vinyl flooring to gym suite. Mirrored wall. Television and sound system. 15 metre swimming pool. Sauna and steam room. Spa treatment rooms for private use. Two changing rooms with shower facilities. Covered and secure access to spa.
- Garden and Terrace with bespoke landscape design. External feature lighting. Clipped topiary hedging. Central ornate water feature. Modern podium landscape. Fruit trees. Meandering mown paths through long grass. Resin bound gravel paths to selected areas. Specialist exterior flooring.

For further information, please contact Hamptons Enfield New Homes on .

detailedDescription:
A rarely available, split-level maisonette arranged over the entire first and upper floors of a double-fronted Edwardian conversion, situated in the heart of Palmers Green, moments from the br station and Broomfield Park. This beautifully presented property boasts almost 940 Sq.ft of light and airy living accommodation with high ceilings and modern features.

The first floor provides an impressive 18'4 wide reception room with tall sash windows and a limestone fireplace surround. You will also find a spacious kitchen and two double bedrooms, one of which benefits from a floor to ceiling fitted wardrobe.

The upper floor provides a bathroom with a three-piece suite, plus a separate WC. A door in the bathroom leads into a large which offers the potential to convert into a third bedroom (subject to planning consent).

Additional benefits include a video entry-phone system, a programmable lighting system and wooden flooring. The vendor has advised Winkworth that the roof was replaced approximately seven years ago and that the sash windows in the reception room were refurbished approximately two years ago. The property is offered for sale with a share of freehold.

Location:
Devonshire Road is ideally located in the heart of Palmers Green within easy reach of the mainline station, providing excellent links the centre of London, along with the excellent selection of shops, restaurants, bars and parks the area has to offer.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A magnificent four bedroom two bathroom family home that has been recently extended and beautifully refurbished. Boasting circa 1,250sq ft of internal floor space. Located on a highly sought after residential road close to Oakhill Park and Oakleigh Park station. The layout of the house is particularly suited to modern family living. Offering bright and spacious accommodation and is beautifully presented throughout.

Upon entering the property, you are greeted by a welcoming entrance hall which leads on to all the principle rooms. There is a stunning large front reception room with a wealth of features including large picture windows. The equally spacious extended kitchen diner is semi open plan with the reception and is flooded with natural light through its rear bi-folding doors. The modern fitted kitchen boasts fitted wall and base units complete with breakfast island bar with solid stone work surfaces and high-end integrated appliances. A guest W.C complete the ground level. The bi-folding doors to the rear lead onto the decking area of a beautifully kept rear garden with a timber built summer house located at the rear of the garden. Leading up the stairs from the ground floor, lies three bedrooms and a wonderful family bathroom. Taking the stairs up to the second floor lies another double sized master bedroom with ensuite bathroom. At the front of the property is a generously sized front garden that has also been recently landscaped.

Location

Daneland is located within a short walk to all the local amenities of East Barnet Village where you will find various shops, restaurants, pubs and cafes. Local transport links include Oakleigh Park Overground station (Moorgate Line) and Cockfosters underground station (Piccadilly line, zone 5), Also within easy reach is Totteridge & Whetstone (Northern Line). There is also a great selection of bus links nearby. You are also within close proximity to some popular local Primary and Secondary schools. The open green spaces of Oakleigh Park can also be found within a short walk.

detailedDescription:
Apartment 38 at New River View
Offering beautiful, well-designed space throughout, Apartment 38 is a stunning three bedroom, two bathroom apartment positioned on the top floor. Featuring an open plan living area and private terrace with ever side views, it creates the perfect place to host friends and family.

With a fitted mirrored wardrobe to the main bedroom, carpet and amtico flooring in the main living areas and bedrooms, integrated appliances and recessed downlighters in the kitchen, our high-quality specification flows throughout.

agency_name: Dominvs Group - One Fox Lane Apartments
detailedDescription:
Show apartment opening 26th/27th June - By appointment only, so call today to reserve your space!

The Apartment
Apartment 17 is a luxury 1 bedroom apartment in leafy Palmers Green. The attractive open plan living room and kitchen area opens onto a balcony above the central landscaped garden. The apartment has a high specification throughout which includes underfloor heating + fresh air circulation, timber effect flooring, recessed down lighters, and high-quality carpet to the bedrooms.

Building and facilities
One Fox Lane is a stylish and contemporary 4 storey apartment block in leafy Palmers Green. Designed to complement the locally listed architecture of this historic building, the new development includes a refurbished gastro pub on the doorstep, ground floor gym, private parking, and a landscaped garden. Palmers Green train station is a short 5 minute walk away, and central London, just 25 minutes by train.

Stylish interiors
Offering urban living on the edge of suburbia, One Fox Lane is a desirable design-led residence with no compromise on style. Each apartment is beautifully furnished to a high spec with the top floor enjoying views across the iconic London skyline. With secure private parking (by separate negotiation) and bike storage on site, you don't need to rely on public transport to explore your new surroundings.

The neighbourhood
Palmers Green is a popular leafy suburban area but with all the benefits of easy access to central London. Benefiting from large parks, extensive amenities and good schools. High street names share space with independent cafés and restaurants. You can enjoy all that's available in the locality or take advantage of all the wonderful neighbouring areas.

Transport
Palmers Green train station is just a 5 minute walk away. The train station provides connections into central London: Moorgate, King's Cross St Pancras and Finsbury Park are all easily accessible. The new Crossrail stations are located at New Southgate, Wood Green and Angel Road and are all within a short drive or bus journey.

Make an appointment today to visit us in our marketing suite. Find out more about our apartments, look through the floorplans, and reserve your apartment off plan.

Viewings are strictly by appointment only. Please follow the latest government Covid guidelines when visiting the marketing suite.

detailedDescription:
Show apartment opening 26th/27th June - By appointment only, so call today to reserve your space!

The Apartment
Apartment 54 is a spacious luxury 1 bedroom apartment in leafy Palmers Green. Situated on the 4th floor, this stylish apartment enjoys views across London. The apartment has a high specification throughout which includes underfloor heating + fresh air circulation, timber effect flooring, recessed down lighters, and high-quality carpet to the bedrooms.

Building and facilities
One Fox Lane is a stylish and contemporary 4 storey apartment block in leafy Palmers Green. Designed to complement the locally listed architecture of this historic building, the new development includes a refurbished gastro pub on the doorstep, ground floor gym, private parking, and a landscaped garden. Palmers Green train station is a short 5 minute walk away, and central London, just 25 minutes by train.

Stylish interiors
Offering urban living on the edge of suburbia, One Fox Lane is a desirable design-led residence with no compromise on style. Each apartment is beautifully furnished to a high spec with the top floor enjoying views across the iconic London skyline. With secure private parking (by separate negotiation) and bike storage on site, you don't need to rely on public transport to explore your new surroundings.

The neighbourhood
Palmers Green is a popular leafy suburban area but with all the benefits of easy access to central London. Benefiting from large parks, extensive amenities and good schools. High street names share space with independent cafés and restaurants. You can enjoy all that's available in the locality or take advantage of all the wonderful neighbouring areas.

Transport
Palmers Green train station is just a 5 minute walk away. The train station provides connections into central London: Moorgate, King's Cross St Pancras and Finsbury Park are all easily accessible. The new Crossrail stations are located at New Southgate, Wood Green and Angel Road and are all within a short drive or bus journey.

Make an appointment today to visit us in our marketing suite. Find out more about our apartments, look through the floorplans, and reserve your apartment off plan.

Viewings are strictly by appointment only. Please follow the latest government Covid guidelines when visiting the marketing suite.

title: 3 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
A beautiful three bedroom period conversion flat with a private garden, offered chain free.

The property is situated a 14 minute walk away from Palmers Green Station (Great Northern and Thameslink). Additionally, a number of green spaces are located near the property, including Hazelwood Recreation Ground, a 12 minute walk away and Firs Farm Wetlands Park, a 19 minute walk away. Peaceful strolls to these parks can be easily organised, as well as fun days out with the family.

The sizeable reception room offers lots of space for lounging and relaxing with family. The room features large windows which allow for a great deal of light to enter, brightening the space. A dining table has been set up in the area too, great for group meals.

The kitchen contains modern appliances and a white tiled backsplash. Cupboards have been placed throughout the kitchen, creating fantastic storage options. Leafy views of the surrounding Palmers Green area are also offered from the kitchen’s sash window.

The property’s three bedrooms are all bright and airy. The main bedroom is located next to the reception room and the other two bedrooms are found towards the rear of the house.

The three piece bathroom is gorgeously tiled, including a lovely bathtub and shower.

The property’s garden is extensive. It will become the perfect place for entertaining friends, or for children’s play.

This is sure to be high in demand!

Kings Group - Enfield Town are pleased to offer this chain free four bedroom semi detached house, which is located within walking distance of Bush Hill Park over ground Station which offers fast links into London Liverpool Street with connections to the Victoria Line at Seven Sisters. Local Shops and amenities are also easily accessible along with access to the A10, A406 & M25 all of which offer good road links to the surrounding areas. This ideal family home falls within the catchment areas of some of Enfield's most sought after schools including Bush Hill Park Primary and Raglan Primary Schools. Internally the accommodation comprises through lounge, downstairs W.C, fitted kitchen, four good size bedrooms, along with family bathroom and shower room. agency_name: Dominvs Group - One Fox Lane Apartments
detailedDescription:
Show apartment opening 26th/27th June - By appointment only, so call today to reserve your space!

The Apartment
Apartment 51 is a spacious luxury 2 bedroom apartment in leafy Palmers Green. Situated on the 4th floor, this stylish apartment enjoys views across London. The attractive open plan living room and kitchen area opens onto a large terrace. There are two bathrooms, one of which is an en suite off the main bedroom. The apartment has a high specification throughout which includes underfloor heating + fresh air circulation, timber effect flooring, recessed down lighters, and high-quality carpet to the bedrooms.

Building and facilities
One Fox Lane is a stylish and contemporary 4 storey apartment block in leafy Palmers Green. Designed to complement the locally listed architecture of this historic building, the new development includes a refurbished gastro pub on the doorstep, ground floor gym, private parking, and a landscaped garden. Palmers Green train station is a short 5 minute walk away, and central London, just 25 minutes by train.

Stylish interiors
Offering urban living on the edge of suburbia, One Fox Lane is a desirable design-led residence with no compromise on style. Each apartment is beautifully furnished to a high spec with the top floor enjoying views across the iconic London skyline. With secure private parking (by separate negotiation) and bike storage on site, you don't need to rely on public transport to explore your new surroundings.

The neighbourhood
Palmers Green is a popular leafy suburban area but with all the benefits of easy access to central London. Benefiting from large parks, extensive amenities and good schools. High street names share space with independent cafés and restaurants. You can enjoy all that's available in the locality or take advantage of all the wonderful neighbouring areas.

Transport
Palmers Green train station is just a 5 minute walk away. The train station provides connections into central London: Moorgate, King's Cross St Pancras and Finsbury Park are all easily accessible. The new Crossrail stations are located at New Southgate, Wood Green and Angel Road and are all within a short drive or bus journey.

Make an appointment today to visit us in our marketing suite. Find out more about our apartments, look through the floorplans, and reserve your apartment off plan.

Viewings are strictly by appointment only. Please follow the latest government Covid guidelines when visiting the marketing suite.

Summary
A Victorian 2 bedroom semi-detached home ideal for a young family or First Time Buyer. Winchmore Hill and Palmers Green Stations are both located 0.6 miles are within close proximity and could be appealing to those needing to commute into London.

Description
This residence comprises of an entrance porch opening to a modern spacious fitted kitchen breakfasting area, ground floor bathroom and living area opening to the rear garden. To the first floor you will find two double bedrooms plus the added benefit of a first floor WC. Externally this property has on street parking.

Winchmore Hill is an affluent suburb and electoral ward in the Borough of Enfield, North London in the N21 postal district. With the Winchmore Hill conservation area as a focal point, the district is bounded on the east by Green Lanes, Barrowell Green, Firs Lane and Fords Grove, and on the north-west by Grovelands Park; in the south it extends to part of Aldermans Hill, and in the north to Vicars Moor Lane and Houndsden Road.

detailedDescription:
Peter Barry are pleased to offer this stunning two double bedroom ground floor Victorian garden conversion within a stones throw of Bush Hill Park Mainline Station.

Perfect for a small family, it is located within the catchment area for local primary schools, it would also make an ideal first time purchase or investment property too.

St Marks Road is within close proximity to Bush Hill Park mainline station and road links such as the A10, M25 & A406.

Bush Hill Park has a plethora of amenities, with village style local shops literally on your door step and Enfield Town & Enfield Retail Park just 0.2 miles away, both boast your usual high street brands, Coffee houses and restaurant's.

The area has an abundance of open spaces, sports clubs and Parks, with Bush Hill Park, Enfield cricket club and Power league to name a few.

In brief the accommodation comprises shared communal entrance, inner hallway, lounge/dinning room, modern fitted kitchen, lobby area leading to modern bathroom and two large double bedrooms.

Outside, the front is paved for off street parking, the rear garden is paved with lawn area.

Viewing recommended.

address: Augustus Lodge, Bulls Cross, Enfield EN2
detailedDescription:
Description

This beautiful, original Victorian Lodge is nestled between the Jacobean splendour of Forty Hall and the wonderful Myddelton House, famous for its luxurious gardens which were created by Edward Augustus Bowles, a self-taught Victorian gardener.

As well as the lodge itself, there is an outbuilding in the gardens which is a separate freehold, so offers great potential for development.

The open space, private aspect and idyllic nature of the working fields surrounding the house make it completely private, which is practically unheard of within the M25.

Walking through the wrought-iron gate and hedgerow, the facade of the house still looks as it might have done over a hundred years ago. A neat garden path leads you onto a veranda, and through a thick oak door.

The plethora of original features in the house is striking, from cabinetry to cornicing, doors to floors.

To your left as you walk in, the sitting room has a fireplace and cool views of green on all sides. A second reception room is currently set up as a dining room-cum-office and opens into the kitchen, where you'll also find a spacious larder and separate loo by the back door.

A cavernous cupboard under the stairs leads up to a family bathroom. A traditional landing leads to three double bedrooms, all with leafy outlooks. The principle bedroom has a gorgeous 180° view of the fields, currently all lush and yellow.

Every room has a superb view of the gardens. It is a hidden enclave of period beauty in Greater London.

Opposite the house is an outbuilding, contained within the same freehold title, ripe for conversion. A home office, music studio, separate Airbnb cottage - the possibilities are endless. High brick walls provide security as well as noise insulation.

There is off-street private parking for several cars and there's a garage, which is presently used for storage (perfect for dry storage of a classic?).

Despite being so magnificently secluded, the M25 is only a five minute drive away - though you'd never suspect it - while Turkey Street mainline is only minutes away and connects to Liverpool Street and Seven Sisters to the south and to the north, it links up with Cheshunt station, where you can change for Stansted Airport.

All in all, this is a splendid house, which has great potential to be an amazing family home; truly a hidden gem.

Cottage Fields is delighted to present this Rare to market Tudor Styled gated development, Three Bedroom Three Bathroom Apartment in the Historic Forty Hill Conservation Area. Chimneys Lodge stands within landscaped grounds and this development consists of only 14 apartments and each being unique and individual. This rare Tudor styled development is further enhance by having walled boundaries, security gates, entry phone facilities for all pedestrian and vehicle points.

Cottage Fields Team Member:

'Absolutely a stunning development located within the historic Forty Hill Conservation area, first in its development to come onto the market in a Decade and offers someone a great opportunity to buy a unique and stunning apartment. Not only has the property been decorated to the highest standard, but it also offers off-street parking, Three Double Bedrooms with Two En-suites, Luxury Kitchen, and a securely position in a gated residence. A must-see.'

Location Guide:

This property is Enfield's conservation area and this Tudor Styled Residence, within walking distance to scenic and Picturesque Grade 1 listed Jacobean Listed Forty Hall Manor House and Grounds, hosting a museum, exhibitions, whilst also being walking distance to Hillyfields. Within short proximity, you will find Crews Hill and Enfield Golf Club and Parkland for those who enjoy outdoor activity. We are pleased to present this spacious double fronted Mock-Tudor detached house with off-street parking spaces for 4/5 cars and attached garage to the side standing on a substantial plot including a 125ft south facing garden in one of Hadley Wood's most desirable streets, a short walk from the prestigious golf course.

This beautifully maintained detached 1930's residence with large bay windows and includes many of its original period features including oak paneling to the entrance hall and drawing room, mock-Tudor beams, internal picture rails and Inglenook fireplaces.

The current owners have also added a custom-built oak and walnut drinks bar in the open plan drawing/dining room and a covered brick-built BBQ area (complete with sink unit, refrigeration and storage cupboards) at the patio area to the rear.

The property offers considerable scope for further expansion into the loft space. Planning permission has recently been granted for the creation of new dormer window projections and additional bedrooms and/or a games/cinema room.

This property has considerable charm and character with exceptionally good natural daylight. It features a large entrance hall, with guest cloakroom plus front TV room, Family room and dining room with French doors leading to the rear garden. There is a large kitchen/breakfast room with separate utility room and study on the ground floor. The first floor boasts a semi-gallery landing with a large master bedroom suite (with en-suite), five further double bedrooms and a separate family bathroom plus a separate sauna room.

Set in this tree-lined avenue within easy reach of Hadley Wood's local shops, mainline station and primary school. Additional amenities are provided at High Barnet, Potters Bar and Cockfosters and the M25 is a short drive away.

title: 3 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription: Havilands are delighted to present this spacious (2095sqft) 4 bed, 2 reception, 2 bath extended Edwardian semi-detached, situated only minutes from the mainline station (30 minutes to Moorgate) and amenities of Winchmore Hill Green. The property combines period features including fireplaces, picture rails and cornices with modern fixtures and fittings throughout. The spacious entrance hall leads to a large front lounge, beyond which is another spacious lounge with patio doors leading directly to the garden. There is a modern German-made kitchen which was designed and fitted last summer. This leads into a stunning David Salisbury Conservatory which was also only built last summer - it is used as a dining area with access to an attractive, mature south-facing garden featuring fig, apple, pear and plum trees, a herb garden plus large patio area and pond. Off the kitchen, there is also a utility room and downstairs toilet. The 1st floor has 3 double bedrooms with a family bathroom; the 2nd floor features a Master suite with a 4th double bedroom with en-suite, walk-in wardrobe and ample eaves storage. Open day: Saturday, 17th July - register your interest now.

address: "The Sign Writer's House", Raleigh Road, Enfield Town EN2
detailedDescription:
Baker and Chase are delighted to present this beautiful semi-detached Victorian house, in the heart of Enfield Town, occupying the corner of Raleigh Road and Cecil Road, complete with character features, detached double garage and south facing garden.

Affectionately known as "The Sign Writer's House", the property offers an abundance of features, spread across two floors of flexible accommodation. Entry is via the choice of two front doors. The door closest to Cecil Road is the grandest, with stunning ornate detail on and around the original front door. The more commonly used door provides access to an entrance lobby/utility area, with a door to the garden and a feature multi-fuel stove. The entrance lobby provides access to a conservatory/dining room, which enjoys a beautiful aspect overlooking the garden and in turn provides access to a dedicated study, with a bi-folding window, creating an incredibly tranquil place to work or study from home. Beyond the lobby in the other direction is the kitchen, which has space for a range style cooker and double sink which sits in a stunning square bay window. The kitchen then provides access to the main hallway, where you will find another room, which is currently used as a 4th bedroom/study, a downstairs w/c and the main, dual aspect living room, complete with feature fire place and period windows.

The first floor provides 3 double bedrooms, two of which are served by en-suite bathrooms and a further family bathroom.

Externally, the property is surrounded on 3 sides by mature gardens, include a warm and secluded south facing back garden. The garden has gated side access and access to the brick built garage, complete with pitched roof, power and light.

The location could not be more convenient. Sitting South of Palace Gardens, there is a wide selection of shops on your doorstep. Enfield Town Park is approx 200m away and provides a lovely outside space. Enfield Town & Enfield Chase stations are both under 0.5 miles away.

Front Garden

Paved area, two entrances, gate leading to rear garden, access to double garage, shrubbery.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Ref: Qumia

We are pleased to bring on to the market this stunning detached family home located in one of the most highly sought after areas of Hadley Wood. Located on Beech Hill this property boasts nearly 7500 sq. Ft of living space with so much to admire.

As you enter the property you are immediately met with a spacious entrance hall allowing access into the lounge with arched feature leaded light windows which also leads to the conservatory with glass lantern and arched feature windows and door, the family room which leads into the well kept and presented dining room and the kitchen/breakfast room fitted with bespoke handmade Charles Yorke oak units with granite work tops and satin finished stainless steel appliances. You also benefit from another reception room which is ideal for a study.

On the first floor you have in total 5 bedrooms, 4 of which are en-suites and a master bedroom with a beautifully designed walk in wardrobe with bespoke fittings. The second floor hosts another 3 bedrooms, one with a jacuzzi bath and also a separate bathroom. The rear garden is something truly to admire which extends 228ft. And features a heated swimming pool, BBQ, pool house and a well kept and spacious patio/terrace. A double garage is also available.

Hadley Wood benefits from tranquil open-countryside. You have the benefit of serene country walks, with Central London just a quick trip away.

Location: Hadley Wood mainline station offers a 30 minute journey time to Moorgate, Kings Cross and Cockfosters underground station (Piccadilly Line) is a short drive away as is junction 24 of the M25 which provides an excellent link to the M1 and all major airports including Heathrow, Luton and Stanstead. Recreational facilities in the area include Hadley Wood Golf club, Tennis Club and acres of green space to explore.

detailedDescription:
An impressive, and highly sought after, three-bedroom, semi-detached home, recently renovated to exacting standards, situated on the hushed road of Oakdale, N14 which is within the catchment area of Ashmole Academy. The home is positioned in a prime location, conveniently located within a short walk to many local amenities via Hampden Square, as well as being close to Southgate high street and Station (Picadilly Line) providing quick and easy access into the Capital.

This fabulous family home boasts further benefits, such as a double driveway, extended with semi open plan living space, a large front reception room teamed with the adored benefit of a feature bay window & fireplace, as well as a downstairs guest W/C which can be accessed via the large landing on the ground floor.

The garden is well maintained, which can be accessed from both the rear of the kitchen or through the side access at the front, which is one of the many luxuries of owning a semi-detached home. For peace of mind, there is also no rear access into the garden which adds that bit of additional reassurance and security.

Upstairs greets you with a stunning, stained glass window positioned on a well sized landing, alongside three double bedrooms which all have the added benefit of bespoke fitted wardrobes, in addition to a newly renovated family bathroom with underfloor heating.

Beautiful bespoke shutters have been added to all of the windows around the home, all of which are double glazed throughout, improving the homes general security and insulation, coupled with gas central heating flowing through the property.

Location Oakdale is in a superb location, situated with access to the A10 from just an 8 minutes' drive, as well as the A406 from just 5 minutes, providing quick and easy access into the Capital.

Many local amenities such as restaurants, supermarkets, coffee shops and key bus links are all within walking distance via Chase Side (approx. 4-minute walk), otherwise Hampden Square is also conveniently located close to Oakdale, also providing an abundance of local amenities.

Southgate Station (Piccadilly Line) is half a mile away, which provides access to Central London within less than half an hour. Alternatively, Oakleigh Park Railway Station is also close by, providing direct access to Finsbury Park from just 11 minutes.

Oak Hill, Grovelands, and Brunswick Parks are close by, offering an abundance of greenery and a relaxing local environment for adults and children.

Education in Southgate is also a huge factor in its popularity. Walker, Monkfrith, Osidge, Brunswick Park and Ashmole Primary schools are nearby, as well as being in the catchment area for Ashmole Academy (rated outstanding by Ofsted).

As well as the local schools, Southgate's location in London means that it lies on the bus routes to the top independent and state schools in North London as a whole.

A message from the owners "We've had the most incredible 17 years living in our home at Oakdale. We originally moved to the area to get in to the Ashmole catchment area where our children went to school, but ended up loving the area and most importantly, the home we created. It's a beautiful, sociable home with large bedrooms and a big open-plan living area and garden, which has been perfect for hosting our friends and family over the years. The move from Oakdale will be difficult as we have created such special memories here. We hope that the new owners will love it just as much as we do."

Please contact one of our property consultants to organise an accompanied meeting at your earliest convenience to avoid potential disappointment.

The property boasts 1429sq.ft (including restricted height) of well-appointed living accommodation successfully blending character features with modern finishing touches. An elegant four bedroom period house situated on a desirable tree-lined avenue in the heart of Palmers Green, within easy reach of the local overground station, bus links, shopping amenities and parks.

This beautifully presented property boasts 1934 Sq.ft of well-appointed living accommodation arranged over three floors. The ground floor features a striking tessellated tiled entrance hall leading to an impressive front reception room with a large bay window. A separate dining room at the rear of the house has French windows leading out to the patio, ideal for entertaining guests inside and al fresco. Both rooms enjoy high panelled ceilings, fireplaces and stripped wooden floors. The kitchen is fitted with an extensive range of bespoke pastel tone painted units with integrated appliances, a breakfast bar and a granite worktop. At the end of the kitchen is a WC and a door leading into a home office. The first floor provides three well-proportioned bedrooms, an attractive family bathroom and a separate WC. The loft has been converted into a stunning, air-conditioned master bedroom with storage built into the eaves and stylish fitted en-suite shower room. The landing has been cleverly utilised into an office space with a fitted desk unit and shelving.

Externally the property enjoys a mature and secluded rear garden extending 62'3 ft in length. There is a shed with light and power points and a gate providing rear access, whilst the front of the house benefits from a paved driveway for off-street parking and a storm porch.

address: Beech Hill Avenue, Hadley Wood, Hertfordshire EN4
detailedDescription:
A fantastic opportunity to acquire this fine family residence set within a wonderful plot that is approximately just over half an acre and has been occupied by the current residents for over 23 years. The property has an impressive 90f ft frontage, benefitting from a prominent position on the road adding a sense of grandeur and space.

As you enter the property you are first greeted with a spacious reception hallway that leads to a family TV room and guest WC. The formal lounge is dual aspect with a feature bay to the side of the property. To the rear of the hall double doors draw you to a 75 ft wide super room that is defined into three living areas including a kitchen breakfast room, tripled aspect seating area with 'Shucco' sliding doors. To the far end of the room is a large dining area. A door from the dining area leads to a further WC and a integral door to the double garage.

To the first floor there are six bedrooms, a family bathroom and a utility room. Two of the guest bedrooms have en suite shower rooms and a further bedroom has a separate WC and wash basin. The principle suite has the added benefit of two walk in dressing rooms and a large five piece en suite bath/shower room.

The rear garden has an grand rear terrace and the manicured rear garden has a large formal lawn and an array of plants, shrubs, trees and a water feature. The garden is a approximately 175ft in length.

To the front of the property is a grand carriage driveway that is also beautifully landscaped with ample amount of parking for numerous vehicles.

Location:- Situated in this tree lined road in the heart of Hadley Wood, within easy reach of local shops, Hadley Wood main-line station and Hadley Wood primary school. Hadley Wood golf and tennis clubs are close at hand and the M25 is a short drive away.

For more properties for sale in Hadley Wood please call our Hadley Wood Estate Agents .

A beautiful ground floor apartment set behind an electric gated entrance. The entrance hall is welcoming, light and airy that leads to the wonderful 25ft. Reception/dining room with wooden flooring and rear aspect window to enjoy the views of the communal garden lawn, mature trees and shrubs.

The kitchen breakfast room is spacious and offers excellent wall and base unit storage with integrated fridge/freezer and dishwasher, fitted microwave, grill with oven and hob with an overhead extractor. The kitchen also benefits the rear aspect view.

The two double bedrooms offer versatility, with a choice of either the front bedroom with an en suite shower and range of fitted wardrobes or the bedroom to the rear with a range of fitted wardrobes and use of the bathroom. with several shops, restaurants and everyday amenities, while Barnet has The Spires shopping centre and High Street, with a Waitrose, salons and coffee shops.

title: 4 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
If you are unable to buy a property outright on the open market, then Shared Ownership could be the ideal solution for you. It is a part-buy, part-rent scheme, which enables purchasers to buy an initial share of usually between 25% and 75% the value of the property and pay a subsidised rent on the remainder. A service charge may also be payable to cover the cost of communal maintenance. Shared Ownership properties are designed as a stepping stone to completely owning your own home, allowing you to buy as much as you can afford when you can afford it.

A resale is a Shared Ownership property that the current owner bought new from us or as a resale. Buying a resale property makes you an owner-occupier because you are buying at least the current owner's share on the existing lease. The great thing about choosing to buy a re-sale shared ownership property is that it gives you the opportunity to speak to the previous owner and to find out more about the area.

A charming one bedroom apartment located on the 8th floor of a landmark 22-storey modern purpose built block. The accommodation comprises; hallway, open plan kitchen/reception room, bedroom, bathroom and a well-kept recessed balcony affording far-reaching panoramic skyline views towards Alexandra Palace. The building benefits from lift and stair access to all floors, secure bicycle storage areas, a modern door entry-phone system, a communal roof terrace.

This home boasts an exceptional open plan kitchen/dining area that stretches the full width of the house with double glazed doors that lead out onto the rear garden. The ground floor also benefits from a large study, a cloakroom and storage space.

title: 3 bed semi-detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
Key features:
  • 3/4 Bedroom End Terrace
  • Ideal Family Home
  • Flexible Living Space
  • Fitted Kitchen
  • 3 Piece Bathroom Suite + Downstairs Shower Room
  • Off Road Parking
  • Close To A Range Of Local Amenities

Full description:
The Express Estate Agency is proud to offer this Four Bedroom End Terrace House – all interest and offers are invited.

Internal:
Entrance Porch - Front door opens to.
Lounge - Generous sized lounge area with fitted wooden flooring throughout and ample space for a range of furniture. With window bringing plenty of natural lighting.
Kitchen - Fitted with a range of modern high gloss wall and base units, including integral oven, hob and overhead extraction fan. With Inset stainless steel sink unit and fitted wooden flooring throughout, the kitchen opens into a good sized dining area.
Conservatory - Bright and airy room with windows bringing natural lighting. Door access to rear garden.
Bedroom Four - Double sized bedroom with window bringing natural lighting.
En-suite - 3 Piece Suite comprising; Shower enclosure with overhead mixer tap and surrounding tile walls. Low level WC and wash hand basin.

First Floor Landing -
Bedroom One - Double sized bedroom with fitted wardrobe/storage cupboards and bay window to front aspect.
Bedroom Two - Double sized bedroom with bay window to rear aspect.
Bedroom Three - Good sized bedroom.
Bathroom - 3 Piece Suite comprising; Panelled bathtub with surrounding tile walls. Low level WC and wash hand basin.

External:
Rear Garden - Paved rear yard with space for outdoor furniture, plant beds and shrubs.
Driveway - Paved driveway to front of property providing off road parking.

Early viewing is highly recommended due to the property being realistically priced.

detailedDescription:
Summary
Elegant and substantial six bedroom detached Edwardian house in a most sought after location, backing onto Bush Hill Park Golf Course, within a short walking distance of rail stations, Grange Park 'Village' shops and within easy reach of Enfield Town and good schools.

Description
Barnfields are extremely pleased to offer this elegant and substantial six bedroom detached, double fronted Edwardian house in a most sought after location, backing onto Bush Hill Park Golf Course, within a short walking distance of Grange Park 'Village' shops and rail stations (Moorgate Line). Enfield Town multiple shopping centre and good schools are also close at hand.

This stunning property must be viewed to be fully appreciated and just some of its many excellent features include:-

Double Front Door
To:-

Entrance Porch
Parquet flooring.

Elegant Spacious Entrance Hall
Parquet floor, beautiful stained glass window, radiator and cover, plate rail and beams, walk-in coat cupboard.

Low flush WC, bracket wash hand basin (white suite), parquet floor, radiator, fully tiled walls.

Reception Room 17' 4" into bay x 15' 5" max ( 5.28m into bay x 4.70m max )
Plate rail, radiator, tiled fireplace, attractive bay window.

Fitted carpet, modern fireplace, recess, sliding double glazed patio doors to garden, radiator.

Parquet floor, radiator, plate rail, brick fireplace with wooden mantel, two attractive triangular feature windows and bay window.

Parquet floor, fireplace, stained glass flank window, bar recess, double storage cupboard, access into kitchen.

Kitchen 15' x 9' 10" ( 4.57m x 3.00m )
Parquet floor, comprehensively fitted comprising base units with worktops, inset white sink unit, matching wall cabinets, gas cooker range, built-in microwave, integrated dishwasher, radiator, door to garden.

First Floor

Spacious Landing
Split level with fitted carpet, radiator and cover.

Bedroom One 17' 8" x 15' 5" ( 5.38m x 4.70m )
Fitted carpet, two radiators, range of built-in wardrobe cupboards and dressing table.

Bedroom Two 15' 6" x 15' 1" max ( 4.72m x 4.60m max )
Fitted carpet, radiator, double built-in wardrobe cupboard.

En-Suite Shower Room / Wc
Shower cubicle, pedestal wash hand basin, low flush WC (white suite), fitted carpet, radiator, fully tiled walls, window.

Bedroom Three 16' 6" x 14' 1" max ( 5.03m x 4.29m max )
Fitted carpet, range of built-in wardrobe cupboards and dressing table, vanity wash hand basin with cupboard under, radiator.

Bedroom Four 16' 8" x 12' 2" ( 5.08m x 3.71m )
Fitted carpet, radiator, range of built-in wardrobe cupboards and dressing table.

En-Suite Shower Room / Wc
Shower cubicle, vanity wash hand basin with cupboard under, low flush WC, radiator, fully tiled walls.

Spacious Bathroom/ Shower Room
Walk-in shower cubicle, corner bath, pedestal wash hand basin, low flush WC (white suite), eaves cupboard, ceramic tiled floor and walls, walk-in airing cupboard housing hot water tank.

Second Floor

Landing
Fitted carpet, eaves cupboard.

Bedroom Five 18' x 13' 2" max ( 5.49m x 4.01m max )

Outside

Power and lighting, plumbing for washing machine, door into garden.

Rear Garden

address: St. Andrews Road, Enfield, Middlesex EN1
detailedDescription:
A rare opportunity to acquire a remarkable and very special five bedroom, two bathroom Victorian family home built in circa 1880's. The property has been lovingly restored and skilfully enhanced over the years by the current vendors who are only one of a handful of custodians of this wonderful home.

The property benefits from many fine character features including lovely high ceilings, fireplaces, wooden flooring and stained glass windows.

On the ground floor you are greeted by a characterful entrance hallway that leads to two reception rooms both with fireplaces, a spacious Cotswold style kitchen/dining room and a guest cloakroom. There is also a cellar located directly off the hall providing additional storage. The current owners have scoped plans that they can pass on to the new owners for a potential basement conversion.

On the first floor there are two well proportioned double bedrooms, along with a bespoke study (bedroom 5), ideal for working from home and a modern bathroom with freestanding bath and shower cubicle.

A further staircase leads to the second floor, where you will find two double bedrooms, again with high ceilings and a shower room.

To the rear there is a pretty, secluded west facing garden with a patio and is mainly laid to lawn, Located in a highly sought after position within the heart of Enfield town centre, and within a minutes walk to Enfield Town station, 13minutes from the Victoria line (via Seven Sisters and approximately 33 minutes to Liverpool Street. Enfield Chase station is also a short walk away with trains directly into Moorgate. The M25 is also within easy reach.

For more properties for sale in Hadley Wood please call our Hadley Wood team .

title: 5 bed property for sale

detailedDescription: A fine example of a character-filled Edwardian family home, enviably situated opposite Broomfield Park and close to Palmers Green br station. This beautiful and impeccably presented property boasts 1688 Sq.ft of well-appointed living accommodation filled with an abundance of period features and detailing including original fireplaces, high ceilings, stained glass windows, picture rails and high skirting boards. The ground floor boasts two grand reception rooms at each end of the house, both with imposing fireplaces and stripped wood flooring. The kitchen is generously sized and is fitted with bespoke units, a wooden worktop and a butler sink. There is also a pantry and space for a double oven. The ground floor also has an impressive entrance hall with striking tessellated tiled flooring, a fireplace and a door leading to the cellar. Moving upstairs, a large landing leads to four well-proportioned bedrooms with feature fireplaces. There is also a charming family bathroom complete with a claw bath and a high-level cistern WC. A door over the stairwell provides access to the attic. Externally the property enjoys a well-stocked rear garden extending just under 88' in length. You will find a sundeck directly off the kitchen and rear reception room, plus two patios and a shed/workshop. There is also a driveway at the front of the house.

title: 4 bed semi-detached house for sale

detailedDescription: A light and spacious six bedroom Edwardian house boasting almost 2400 Sq.ft of character-filled living accommodation spanning over three floors. The property is situated within the desirable 'Lakes' conservation area, close to Palmers Green mainline br station to Moorgate, Broomfield Park, and an excellent selection of cafes and restaurants on nearby Aldermans Hill and Green Lanes. The ground floor features an elegant front reception room with large bay windows, bespoke units fitted into the alcoves, a focal point fireplace and stripped wood flooring. The rear of the house has been extended and remodelled to create a spectacular open-plan space incorporating a kitchen/dining room and an interlinking living room. The kitchen area benefits from a range of modern wall and base units, a breakfast bar and underfloor heating, whilst the living room and dining areas provide plenty of space to entertain and relax. There is also ample natural light via a ceiling lantern. Original French doors with stained glass inserts provide access to the rear garden. The ground floor also benefits from a tessellated tiled hallway with intricate fretwork, a utility room and a shower room/WC.On the first floor are four generously sized bedrooms and a family bathroom. The loft has been converted into two well-proportioned bedrooms, one of which has a Juliet balcony and a Jack and Jill door leading into a shower room. Externally the property enjoys a rear garden extending just over 79' long, plus a front garden. Offered for sale with no onward chain.

detailedDescription:
Stamp Duty Paid On All Homes Including A Complete Bespoke Furniture Package.

Show Home Open by appointment

far far away - Laying within five acres of picturesque historic grounds, home to Sir Thomas Lipton for over 50 years, offering the perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of City life.

Thomas Court is a collection of only eight very unique homes. Six maisonettes located to the ground and first floors with private south facing gardens and two breathtaking penthouses with views across the private 5 acre estate.

Please see below a list of the finer details on offer for our Two Bedroom Penthouse, an enviable specification to be proud of:

Hallway
* Feature entrance door with multipoint locking system.
* Porcelain tiles throughout with a bespoke linear border around the hallway floor area.
* Concealed mirror feature wall with two hanging pendant lights.
* Recessed ceiling with LED lighting and down lights.
* Bespoke glass balustrade to staircase
* Flush finished lights to all walls up the staircase

Bedrooms
* Fully fitted Italian wardrobes in a matt lacquer finish bespoke handle in second bedroom.
* Walk-in wardrobe with automatic lights in master bedroom.
* Flooring finished with 70oz carpets.
* T.V. Feature walls with LED lighting and shelving in all bedrooms. Finished with either textured wallpaper or mirrors.
* Ceiling mounted Bowers & Wilkins speakers in master bedrooms.
* Floor to ceiling bespoke padded headboards with LED lighting on both sides.
* Designated dressing table / study area in the master bedroom.
* Juliet balcony overlooking your private garden and the landscaped woodland area. Accessed via the master bedroom.
* Recessed ceilings with LED lighting and down lights.

Living & Dining Room:
* Porcelain tiles throughout with a bespoke linear border around the living and dining floor area.
* Full width feature wall in dining area including recessed walls with shelving and LED lighting. Materials include tinted mirrors, wallpaper, walnut and copper trims.
* Floor to ceiling feature wall in living area with recessed T.V. And storage areas. Finished with a textured wallpaper with LED downlights above.
* Ceiling mounted Bowers & Wilkins speakers
* Large double doors leading onto the private landscaped gardens.
* Triple recessed detail in ceilings with LED lighting and down lights.

Security & Peace Of Mind:
* Pre-wired for future security alarms
* Mains powered smoke & heat detectors with battery backup.
* Multiview video entry phone system with 7-inch display monitors located on all floors.
* 10-year building warranty

External Features:
* Wall mounted lighting to the front and rear of the houses, including a hanging pendant light under the stone canopy on entrance.
* Private landscaped gardens with porcelain tile pavement area leading up to the grassed area.
* Private front garden including porcelain tile porch, grass verges and up-lights.
* Stone features including entrance canopy, windowsills and headers and cornices bandings at roof level.
* Wall mounted retractable water hose
* Double power sockets in gardens.
* Two allocated garage spaces for each home.
* Access to over five acres of communal landscaped gardens

detailedDescription:
Cole Harding brings to you A simply stunning four bedroom home with dining/ reception room and a fantastic open plan kitchen living room and W/C to the ground floor, first floor offers One double and two good size single bedrooms and Bathroom, The second floor offers Master Bedroom and en-suite with plenty of storage within the eves. (There is also Window shutter for the Master bedroom window)
The property is beautifully presented throughout. The fantastic rear garden has a covered decked patio area, directly off of the living room, and Off street parking.

Devonshire Road is located within access of Edmonton Green shopping centre, schools and bus routes. Approx 15 mins walk to Edmonton Green train and bus stations with trains running to Liverpool St and the Victoria tube line.

Vendors Comments:
My neighbours are both amazing people.
They are both married couple with a kid. Always there when we need any help.
I will say that Devonshire road is a very quiet street from the fact that it’s also half way to be a dead end street.
I always been living in this house since when I bought in 2013.
I always been someone travelling a lot for work so that’s also perhaps the reason why the house is kept in a very good condition.
I’m selling the house because since with had Olivia, we need to be closer from our family and we want Olivia to be able to see her family on a weekly basis and not on monthly basis like now.

This three bedroom house is perfect for first time buyers or a buy to let investor looking to add a solid property to there portfolio. This property offers families a spacious living accommodation with further benefits including being sold on a chain free basis, has a storage garage to the rear and offers more living space with a conservatory added.

This three bedroom house is perfect for first time buyers or a buy to let investor looking to add a solid property to there portfolio. This property offers families a spacious living accommodation with further benefits including being sold on a chain free basis, has a storage garage to the rear and offers more living space with a conservatory added.

When entering the property, you are welcomed with a sizeable through lounge that allows for space to entertain friends and family. There is a second reception which is ideal for dining, but should you prefer a more open feel you are able to open the two rooms out and create a through lounge. A galley kitchen with integrated appliances is located to the rear of the property along with the conservatory that gives access to the garden. The garden has been mainly laid to lawn with a patio area to the front.

The first floor of the property comprises of three double bedrooms that have been smartly finished. The three piece family bathroom suite completes this family home. Further potential can be unearthed by converting the loft into a fourth bedroom and en suite bathroom.

In terms of locality you are surrounded by an abundance of local amenities such as bars, restaurants, coffee shop. Edmonton Green train station is 0.7 miles away (14 minute walk away) whilst Bush Hill Park station is 1.3 miles away (23 minute walk away).

As for schools in the are you are truly spoilt for choice including West Lea School, Hounsfield Primary School, Eldon Primary School and many more.

address: Musgrave Close, Hadley Wood, Hertfordshire EN4
detailedDescription:
A five bedroom detached gated residence set in a prominent yet discreet residential turning in the heart of Hadley Wood. This wonderful home has many fantastic attributes including an impressive gated entrance, spacious reception hall and well proportioned living accommodation. The property is in excess of 3,200 sq ft and offers a private mature rear garden measuring approximately 140ft.

The reception hall leads to two reception rooms, one being a lounge and the other a family/tv room. To the rear of the hall you enter a kitchen/diner with bi-folding doors leading to a raised decked patio overlooking the garden. Just of the kitchen is a utility room and a dining room.

To the first floor there are five bedrooms with a family bathroom fitted with a four piece suite. The master bedroom can also be accessed via a private staircase and benefits from a large en suite with his' and hers' sinks, double shower and a modern free standing bath tub with modern and contemporary design. Bedroom two also benefits from a range of fitted wardrobes and an en suite shower room.

The property benefits from a secluded 140ft west facing tiered garden which is complemented by a large decked patio area offering excellent outdoor space. To the front of the property there is a substantial driveway allowing parking for a number of cars and leads to a double garage.

Location:- Situated in this sought after enclave of Hadley Wood adjacent to Hadley Woods, the property is within easy reach of Hadley Wood Mainline station, local shops and Hadley Wood Golf and tennis clubs.

Approach: The property is approached via an electronic wrought iron gated access leading to a gravelled driveway providing ample off street parking for numerous vehicles. The property has a walled boundary to the front and features a front with shrub and plant borders.

For more houses for sale in Hadley Wood please call our Hadley Wood team .
