detailedDescription:
Reception hall | Sitting/dining room | Kitchen| Principal bedroom with en suite | Bedroom 2 with en suite | Garden | Outside store | Off street
parking | Garage | EPC rating C

The property
82 Camlet Way is a spacious two bedroom apartment with modern fixtures, several period features and an attractive outdoor entertainment
space.

The accommodation is spread across the first floor of an end of terrace house. The sitting/dining room
provides ample living space, while the modern kitchen features dual aspect windows, Karndean flooring, white fitted units with integrated hob, oven and fridge. A hatch looks through to the well-proportioned sitting/dining room which features a fireplace and double windows flooding the room
with natural light. There is also a door with stairs to access the generous loft space.

To the rear is the principal bedroom, a light and airy room with dual aspect windows, a feature fireplace and en suite bathroom. A door leads to a
built in cupboard, ideal for utilities or for storage. A second double bedroom with a corner fireplace and
en suite shower room completes the apartment’s living spaces, there is underfloor heating in both bathrooms.<br /><br />Mileages
M25 (J24) 3 miles, Hadley Wood station 0.6 miles (London Kings Cross 27 minutes), Barnet 1 mile, High Barnet Underground Station 2 miles (London Bridge 40 minutes), New Barnet 2 miles, Cockfosters 3 miles, Finchley 6 miles, St Albans 10 miles, Central London 18 miles.

Location
Hadley Wood offers local shops including restaurants, a hairdresser, a newsagent and a health club. Hadley Wood golf course and tennis club are also within the area.

Schools nearby include Stormont, Lochinver, Haberdashers Askes for Boys and Haberdashers Askes for Girls, Mount House School, and Queen Elizabeth's Girls and Boys Schools.

Hadley Wood features a good selection of sports and leisure facilities, from nearby golf courses and stables to cricket and tennis clubs. Several sports centres sit close by too, such as the New Barnet Leisure Centre.<br /><br />Outside
The property benefits from a private driveway with space for several cars and a single garage with an electric up and over door. A low maintenance
garden with established flower beds and a large patio area. A small storage space lies next to the garage, with steps leading up to the front door of the property.

Situated above a retail unit, the property has been modernised and boasts 750 Sq.ft of neutrally decorated living accommodation arranged over two floors. The ground floor benefits from a generously sized reception room providing plenty of space to relax and dine, plus an attractive fitted kitchen. On the upper floor are the bedrooms and a shower room. Offered for sale with a remaining lease term of just under 149 years.

detailedDescription:
A superb five bedroom period house boasting 1935 Sq.ft of living accommodation with high ceilings, naturally spanning over three floors. The property is enviably located in the heart of desirable Winchmore Hill, close to the mainline station (to Moorgate), Grovelands Park, plus an excellent selection of cafes and restaurants situated along the 'Green', The independent Keble School is also located moments from the property.

The ground floor benefits from an impressive reception room with box bay windows and an imposing fireplace. Bi-folding doors lead into a dining room and a kitchen, whilst at the rear of the house is a large bedroom with a fitted wardrobe, an en-suite shower room, plus French doors leading into a conservatory.

On the first floor are three further double bedrooms, a bathroom and a separate WC. The second floor provides a generously sized fifth bedroom and a second kitchen.

Externally the property benefits from a patio garden and access to a double garage. Offered for sale with no onward chain.

address: Sambrook Court, Cockfosters Road, Hadley Wood, Hertfordshire EN4
detailedDescription:
** show home now open by appointment **

plot 11 - two bedroom two bathroom first floor apartment with terrace and two underground parking spaces

Ideally located in the exclusive community of Hadley Wood backing directly onto Hadley Wood Golf Course. Sambrook Court is an exceptional modern development of just14 one and two bedroom apartments. Set within beautifully landscaped gardens, each with its own private balcony, patio or terrace and two secure underground parking spaces (plus visitors spaces), many have far-reaching views towards Trent Country Park or Hadley Wood Golf Course.

Hadley Wood boasts a vibrant community spirit with thriving churches and excellent schools, along with wonderful award-winning local restaurants, cafés and bistros in Cockfosters and Hadley Wood offer a variety of international cuisines. The Spires Shopping Centre in nearby Chipping Barnet hosts Waitrose along with other high street names while Brent Cross shopping centre is only 30 minutes away by car.

Cockfosters Road is within easy striking distance of the M1, M25 and A1, for swift journeys in and out of the capital. Heathrow and Luton airports are each approximately 40 minutes away, and there is a private helipad in the grounds of nearby West Lodge Park Hotel.

detailedDescription:
Detached period property offering over 4500 sq ft of accommodation and overlooking Enfield Cricket Club. Open plan rear reception, kitchen/breakfast room, utility, 2 studies, 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, walk-in wardrobe, large garden, garage block, gym, basement with sauna and plunge pool, parking.

We have pleasure in offering for sale this detached period property offering over 4500 sq ft of accommodation and overlooking Enfield Cricket Club. The house offers a vast array of versatile living space across four floors and with a garden approaching 200'. The house briefly comprises reception hallway with downstairs cloakroom, an open plan rear reception with French doors out to the garden, a study, kitchen/breakfast room, The basement has a sauna and plunge pool (not currently used by the owners) and storage area. On the first floor there are three double bedrooms, one with an en-suite and one with walk-in wardrobe, a study, utility room and balcony overlooking the garden. On the third floor are two further double bedrooms and bathroom. The rear garden has a spacious patio area with step down to lawn with mature flower and shrub borders. In the middle is a brick built gym and garage block with parking in front and private gates. Beyond the gym is further gardens with lawn and decked area.

Situated in easy reach of local shops, cafes and railway station and Enfield Town multiple shopping centre is close by.

Purplebricks are delighted to market this stunning four-bedroom property situated just opposite the picturesque Oakhill park open space.

This property boasts a modern, spacious feel throughout with two reception rooms on the ground floor, a larger than average kitchen area and a stunning 100+ foot garden benefitting from a huge outbuilding/garage/home office at the back of the garden with direct access from the rear of the property where you can also securely park your car.

The first floor consists of three good sized bedrooms and a family bathroom, all with a modern feel benefitting from fantastic high ceilings throughout. The fourth bedroom is situated on the top floor, also benefitting from its own en-suite bathroom and fantastic views across the gardens.

This property is conveniently located on Church Hill Road just moments away from East Barnet Village giving it great access to all of its local shops and amenities. Also, just a stone's throw away from Oakleigh Park train station giving it fantastic access for commuting in and out of the city, plus boasting the luxury of having Oakhill Park open space situated on your front door.

title: 6 bed detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
This magnificent home is in a league of its own. It has been refurbished from top to bottom (and then some) to an exemplary standard. Fabulous style, top quality finish and an incredible sense of space sets this 2-bedroom cottage apart. Period features include beautiful original floors boards and double glazed sash windows all fitted with wooden shutters. The property further benefits from a working fireplace and cast iron column radiators, which have been combined with modern decor to stunning effect.

The navy Shaker style kitchen could be fresh from a style magazine, with white marble quartz worktop, ceramic sink and Rangemaster cooker. Double aspect sash windows and brass hardware throughout make this a room kitchen dreams are made of. Did we mention the under floor heating? The floors in the tiled ground floor of the home all benefit from it as does the bathroom. The kitchen leads you onto an idyllic paved garden, a brick walled tranquil space to enjoy all year around with raised L-shape flower bed. The side courtyard area is gated and the garden has handy side access to the path leading to the canal and two well regarded pubs, The Crown and Horseshoe and The Cricketers, both with large beer gardens.

The C.P.Hart bathroom boasts two huge single pane marble effect porcelain tiles, spanning the internal walls of the shower and are complemented by black Dornbracht rain maker shower. The oval basin console fits beautifully with this trendy monochrome room which looks fresh from a Pinterest board. There’s an electric Velux sky light too.

The navy reception room at the front of the house has built in cupboards and shelving in the alcoves and a working gas fireplace. The period style cornicing has been reinstated and the skirting has been carefully selected to suit the age of the home. The dining room offers great additional space and can also be regularly adapted as space (like an office space) as the current owner found recently. There’s also built in storage under the stairs.

The two bedrooms both benefit from vaulted ceilings and exposed beams which offer double height ceilings and truly make these rooms feel extra special. They also offer built in wardrobes and column radiators.

You’d be hard-pushed to find a better location, with Chase Green Gardens opposite, the stunning River View, New River running behind the house and Gentleman’s Row leading you into Enfield Town in a few minute’s walk, the local scenes are beautiful. Chase Side really is in the heart of Enfield Chase and It's a great commuter spot - just a short walk from Enfield Chase Station, Enfield Town Station (both overground) and a short Drive to Oakwood Station (Piccadilly line) plus excellent bus links.

title: 2 bed end terrace house for sale

detailedDescription:
A beautifully presented four bedroom end of terrace house situated on a popular residential road, close to schools, playing fields and bus services to Wood Green tube and Palmers Green br Station.

The property has been extended to provide 1441 Sq.ft of light and spacious living accommodation arranged over three floors. The ground floor features an impressive front reception room and a separate dining room, both with high ceilings and wooden flooring. You will also find a 21'11 long kitchen with an extensive range of modern fitted units. The ground floor also benefits from a long tessellated tiled entrance hall. The first floor provides three generously sized bedrooms, one of which benefits from a fitted wardrobe. There is also a bathroom with a three-piece suite and a separate WC. The loft has been converted into an additional double bedroom which retains plenty of eaves storage.

Externally the property enjoys a wide and beautifully maintained rear garden backing onto an allotment. The garden extends 89'ft in length and has a brick-built garage which offers the potential to be converted into a gym, games room or office. At the front of the house is a paved driveway and a mature flowerbed.

detailedDescription: An elegant semi-detached period residence boasting just over 2,500 Sq.ft of character-filled living accommodation spanning over three floors. The property is situated within the desirable 'Lakes' conservation area, close to Palmers Green mainline br station to Moorgate, Broomfield Park, and an excellent selection of cafes and restaurants on nearby Aldermans Hill and Green Lanes. The ground floor features a striking tessellated tiled hallway leading to two grand reception rooms at each end of the house. Both rooms feature high corniced ceilings, character fireplaces and wooden flooring. French doors in the rear reception room lead into a large conservatory with secluded views of the garden, ideal for dining and entertaining guests all year round. The kitchen is centrally located and is fitted with pastel tone units and a granite worktop. An opening in the kitchen leads into a useful utility room, whilst at the end of the hall is a guest WC. The first floor provides five generously sized bedrooms and an attractive family bathroom which is in keeping with the character of the house. The loft has been converted into two further bedrooms and a shower room. You will also find generous eaves storage accessed from one of the bedrooms. Externally the property enjoys a well-stocked and beautifully maintained rear garden complete with a summerhouse, whilst the front of the house benefits from a block-paved driveway and a tessellated tiled footpath.

detailedDescription:
For plot of the month, if you reserve this apartment in June, we can offer your full stamp duty paid, subject to offer

Surrounded by the eclectic energy of North London, Evergreen is an elegant enclave of modern homes with a tranquil garden square at its heart. Set amongst the bustling life of Green Lanes, residents at Evergreen can sample the endless delights of the local area; from the delectable cuisines of London’s most popular Turkish restaurants to the breath-taking views of London from the spectacular Alexandra Palace and the beautiful natural setting of the area’s unique parks and waterways. Evergreen offers a limited collection of just 117 1,2 and 3 bedroom apartments and duplexes within contemporary architecture, providing the latest in 21st-century style, comfort and convenience with a calm and verdant garden for residents to enjoy.

The location is well connected with the Piccadilly line under 10 minutes’ walk away at Turnpike Lane, and the Harringay Green Lanes Overground Line, and Harringay rail station also close by. A number of bus routes take you down Green Lanes and into central London via Finsbury Park and Manor House. The cycle network is extensive in North London and there are quiet ways to avoid busier roads connecting the parks and scenic routes to Crouch End, Highgate, Stoke Newington and Camden.

Evergreen will be available to preview from Autumn 2020, and will be completing from Q4 2021. This is a car free development, with secure cycle storage for all residents.

Enquire now for more information.

shared ownership (Advertised price represents 50% share. Full market value £220,000). This south-facing, one-bedroom apartment is on the second floor and has a reception room with attractive flooring and a Juliette balcony. The kitchen is smart and open plan with a breakfast bar. There is a built-in wardrobe in the bedroom, useful additional storage in the hallway and a simple, monochrome bathroom. Well insulated walls, modern double glazing and gas central heating make for a very good energy-efficiency rating. Faraday House is part of a substantial development that features spacious, well-tended communal grounds. The apartment comes with use of a parking space plus Enfield Lock Station is only a short walk away.

detailedDescription:
Baker and Chase are delighted to present this spacious, two-bedroom, top floor apartment, in Enfield Town.

This well presented property begins with a long hallway allowing access to an incredibly spacious main bedroom which benefits from plenty of storage space. A stylish family bathroom and a separate w/c follow as well as a modern kitchen boasting mosaic tiled flooring and wood bloc worktops. A bright and generously sized reception room and second bedroom complete the internal accommodation.

Positioned just south of Enfield Town, the property had a range of shopping facilities and restaurants on its doorstep. There is also a Nuffield health and fitness centre almost directly opposite and the popular Enfield Town Park just 250m away.

Enfield Town London Overground Station is just 0.2 miles away and offers a regular service into London Liverpool Street via Seven Sisters (Victoria Line). Enfield Chase B.R Station is just over 0.5 miles away and offers an excellent alternative, servicing London Moorgate via Finsbury Park (Victoria & Piccadilly Lines). Lincoln Court is also served by both the 329 & W8 bus routes.

title: 3 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
A stunning Edwardian house, enviably located within catchment for Hazelwood Primary School and St, Monica's Primary school (by proximity to St. Monica's church). You will also find a number of open spaces within easy reach including Broomfield Park and Hazelwood Recreation Ground, as well as Palmers Green br station just over half a mile away.

The property boasts 1375 Sq.ft of spacious and well-appointed living accommodation with high ceilings. The ground floor features a 29'5 long, interlinking reception room and dining room with stripped wood flooring. A spacious eat-in kitchen is located at the end of the entrance hall and enjoys a range of contemporary units with an oiled block wood worktop. Beyond the kitchen is a conservatory with French doors leading to the rear garden, ideal for relaxing during warm summer evenings. The ground floor also benefits from a WC, utility room and a tessellated tiled entrance hall. The first floor provides a modern family bathroom and three double bedrooms with stripped wood flooring, including an impressive 17'7 wide master bedroom. Externally you will find a mature 71' long rear garden with a decking area and a front garden.

detailedDescription:
Listed Grade II being of architectural and historic interest, Longbourn is nearly symmetrical in design and finished in white stucco under a slate roof with a parapet.

Internally the house combines elegant, well-proportioned reception rooms with comfortable bedroom accommodation over the first and second floors. Of particular note is the wonderfully light and airy drawing room, centred on an attractive fireplace with a wood-burning stove. The drawing room is triple aspect with twin glazed doors leading onto the paved terrace at the rear.

Property details
Services: Mains gas, water, electricity and
drainage are connected. Broadband connection.
Gas fired central heating.
Local authority: Enfield Council
(Tel: Council tax band: H
Tenure: Freehold for sale with vacant
possession.

N.B. The Coach House apartment is currently let on an Assured Shorthold Tenancy.

Rights of way: The property is being sold subject to and with the benefit of all rights including rights of way, whether public or private, light, support, drainage, water and electricity supplies and other rights and obligations, easements and quasi-easements and restrictive covenants and all existing and proposed wayleaves, whether masts, pylons, stays, cables, drains, and gas and other pipes, whether referred to in these particulars or not.

Fixtures and fittings: All fixtures and fittings are
specifically excluded from the sale. Some items
may be available by separate negotiation.

Viewing: By appointment with Strutt & Parker.<br /><br />Turkey Street train station 0.9 miles (London Liverpool Street from 34 minutes), Gordon Hill train station 1.3 miles (Moorgate from 35 mins), Enfield 1.5 miles, Central London 14 miles, London Heathrow airport 35 miles

Longbourn lies in the tree lined street of Forty Hill comprising a selection of handsome red brick and stuccoed period houses of the Georgian era. Opposite is the beautiful Forty Hall Manor, a Grade I Listed Jacobean Manor House and Country Park, both of which are open to the public.

There are excellent local amenities in nearby Enfield, just 1.5 miles distant including a new shopping centre and multiplex cinema.

Communications are good by both road and rail. Fast and frequent trains leave Turkey Street Station under 1 mile away, reaching London Liverpool Street in 34 minutes or from Gordon Hill Station reaching Moorgate in 35 minutes. The M25 is within 3 miles, linking with the national motorway network and central London is only 14 miles away.<br /><br />Across the gravelled courtyard is the old coach house, now partially converted to provide comfortable secondary accommodation with two bedrooms, together with the old stables providing garaging and storage.

The gardens and grounds lie predominantly to the rear. Approached over a gravel terrace and laid mostly to lawn the gardens are studded with a selection of mature specimen trees including Cedar of Lebanon, Wellingtonia, Scots pine and Silver birch.

address: Beech Hill, Hadley Wood, Hertfordshire EN4
detailedDescription:
A beautifully presented six bedroom detached family home situated in Hadley Wood's premier road set within a plot of approx 0.44 of an acre. 'Covenden' blends traditional features including lovely high ceilings and wood panelling along with flexibility of versatile accommodation.

From the front door you are greeted by an inviting entrance hallway leading to a TV room, double doors lead into the dining room which is dual aspect and has a bar and seating area. Adjoining the dining room double doors lead to the formal sitting room which is very well proportioned. There is also a large kitchen/breakfast room that leads to a conservatory. To the rear of the kitchen there is a passage that takes you through to a further prep kitchen and utility room with access to the integral garage. Furthermore there is a also a large summer room/bbq kitchen and dining facility with bi-folding doors and a vaulted ceiling. To complete the ground floor there is also a guest wc.

To the first floor there are six double bedrooms including a combined guest suite with shared bathroom. The principle bedroom also has its own en suite bathroom. Bedroom two has the added benefit of a balcony that overlooks the private and secluded rear garden.

The beautiful secluded mature rear garden measures approximately 153 ft and features an entertaining patio leading to a lawn with a wide variety of trees and shrubs with a outdoor swimming pool and brick built leisure suite towards the rear of the garden.

The property is accessed via an impressive sweeping carriage driveway leading to a double garage. The property has an impressive road frontage of approx 87ft.

Location:- Situated in the areas premier road within close proximity to Hadley Wood Golf Club and within easy distance to Hadley Wood mainline station (which offers a regular service into Moorgate and Kings Cross with a journey time of approx 30 mins), local amenities & shops. Cockfosters underground station (Piccadilly Line) is approx 3 miles away as is junction 24 of the M25, which provides a link to all major motorway links and to all London airports.

For more houses for sale in Hadley Wood please call our Hadley Wood team .

detailedDescription:
Attractive and spacious first floor flat, recently renovated to a very good standard with with quality fixtures and fittings. Close to Enfield Town Station, schools, Shopping Centre and local parks.
High ceilings and large windows add to the feeling of space throughout the flat, soft grey carpeting in the living rooms and landing, which is complemented by the vibrant lilac colour walls.
The bedrooms are both generous doubles with windows looking out from the back of the flat, while the vast lounge spans the full width of the property.
The kitchen is in the centre of the flat with marbled worktop and embedded sink. The bathroom is next to the kitchen and has beautifully matching floor and walls tiles, stylish, white three piece suite, and storage cupboard, There is gas central heating and double glazed windows which tilt in addition to side opening.
The loft space runs the length of the flat, is fully boarded and has the potential for conversion at a later date.

detailedDescription:
**sumptuous family home** Homelink are delighted to bring to the sales market this wonderfully gorgeous and understated four bedroom semi-detached house set in one of the most desirable parts of Winchmore Hill.

The property, presented in immaculate condition, is set over 2 floors and has been extended in some areas. Entering through the warm and welcoming hallway, you immediately feel at ease looking at the beautiful wood flooring and lit staircase. The property comprises on the ground floor of two separate reception rooms with wooden flooring, spacious modern fitted kitchen/breakfast room with integrated white goods and tiled flooring, integrated single car garage and guest WC.

On the first floor, the master bedroom has ample fitted modern wardrobes, bedroom two benefits from having sleek sliding modern wardrobes, as well as a shower. Both bedrooms three and four have en-suite showers with storage. There is also a three piece family bathroom suite. All bedrooms have wooden flooring and all bathrooms and en-suites have tiled flooring. The property has gas central heating and is double glazed throughout.

The property opens on the ground floor from both reception two and the kitchen on to the south facing garden. The garden has a lovely 'L' shaped patio with a covered seating area, is mainly lawned and has a workshop to the rear with power.

Located within close proximity to Eversley Primary School, being only 400ft you are very close, equally Highland's Secondary School is only 0.5 miles away making this location ideal for those looking to be in good catchment area for schools.

Chaseville Park Road sits 0.7 miles away from Grange Park Overground Station, ideal for commuting to London's Financial District. You also within short walking distance to local shops and amenities with Sainsbury's superstore just 0.6 miles away.

For those who are looking for a move-in ready dream family home, this has it all. Yet there is still potential to extend further (STPP)

address: Parkgate Avenue, Hadley Wood, Hertfordshire EN4
detailedDescription:
A substantial detached five bedroom Neo Georgian family home situated in one of the areas most sought after avenues, built in 2012. The beautiful home is approaching 5,800 sq ft and is arranged over 3 floors with a detached entertainment complex in the rear garden.

The main residence has been carefully designed to fulfil and adapt to most families requirements while offering traditional living spaces with a contemporary design. The ground floor accommodation consists of a warm and inviting entrance hall that leads to a dining room and lounge which has access to an orangery to the rear of the property. Double doors from the hall also lead to a kitchen/diner family room with a range of contemporary units finished with marble work tops with Gaggenau and Miele appliances. To the front of the property there is a well appointed study and to complete the ground floor there is the added benefit of a downstairs cloakroom, utility room and integral door to the garage.

The first floor comprises of 3 double bedrooms including a sumptuous master suite with walk in dressing room and a luxurious 5 piece en suite bathroom. Bedroom 2 also has the added benefit of an en suite shower room and fitted wardrobes. To the second floor there are 2 further double bedrooms, living area and a further family shower room.

The separate leisure complex set within the grounds of the property can be used for multiple purposes including a golf simulator/cinema room, games room and bar area with a guest cloakroom to complete the flexible family living space. There is a low maintenance landscape garden with patio and lawn that leads to the entertainment suite. To the front aspect there is paved driveway that provides parking for multiple vehicles.

Location:- The property is located on a quiet tree lined avenue of Hadley Wood and is within walking distance of Hadley Wood mainline station, Hadley Wood primary school, local shops, golf course and tennis club. The M25 is also just a short drive away.

For more properties for sale in Hadley Wood please call our Estate Agents in Hadley Wood .

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
This substantial Edwardian family home has been impressively modernised by the current owners and was a finalist in the 'London Building Awards'.

Situated within the desirable 'Lakes' conservation area, the property is conveniently located close to Palmers Green mainline br station to Moorgate, Broomfield Park, and an excellent selection of cafes and restaurants on nearby Aldermans Hill and Green Lanes.

The ground floor features an elegant front reception room with bay windows, bespoke units fitted into the alcoves and solid wood flooring. The heart of this fantastic house is at the rear, where the owners have spared no expense in creating a breathtaking, open-plan space incorporating a luxury kitchen, dining and lounge areas. The kitchen area features fitted 'Hacker' units with a ceramic work-top and an abundance of high-end integrated appliances. Just off the kitchen is the large dining area and access to a utility room and garden. The lounge is generously sized and enjoys lovely garden views via floor-to-ceiling frameless doors. This amazing space has been thoughtfully designed with an integrated entertainment system and large floor tiles flowing from the interior out to the patio, making it perfect for entertaining both inside and al-fresco. The ground floor also benefits from a long original Edwardian tiled entrance hall and a WC.

On the first floor are four bedrooms, the principal bedroom benefits from a luxury en-suite. There is a also a large bathroom with designer fittings. The house further benefits from an app-controlled 'Lutron' lighting system, an integrated home cinema system and is fully networked for high-speed internet.

Externally the property enjoys a landscaped rear garden with a 'Gabriel Ash' greenhouse and organic vegetable garden. At the front the double driveway has a charging point for an electric car.

The vendor has advised Winkworth that the property benefits from the following features and improvements:

-Hacker Kitchen (£60k)
-All Miele appliances and Gaggenau fridge and freezer
-Cat 6 Networked, 3 zone internet
-Lutron Light Home Control System
-Solar Panels (16 Panasonic panels (discrete))
-Swiss Skyframe floor to ceiling Sliding doors
-Integrated Home cinema system
-Full bespoke Alarm system
-Fully double glazed timber box sash and casement windows
-labc Building Award Finalist
-Provenance and owner history dating back to original owners in 1905
-New central heating, 3 zones
-New Electrics Throughout
-Bathrooms with underfloor heating
-Hansgrohe Axor Bathroom fittings
-Gigacer Italian 1.2m tiles inside and out bringing the outside inside
-Chargemaster ev charger
-Gabriel Ash Cedar Greenhouse (£5000) with Organic Vegetable garden
-Zinc wrap around roof and zinc gutters and downpipes

detailedDescription:
Summary
full stamp tudy paid for July only *T&c's* apply. Last few plots remaining. This outstanding 1221 sq ft apartment benefits direct access to a private patio/ garden, which leads onto stunning communal gardens. A lift in the building & underground parking.

Description
do you have A property to sell? Reservations will be considered. Set on the ground floor and with 1221 sq ft of stunning living space throughout. This high specification, boutique scheme benefits exceptionally large private terraces & patios with outstanding greenery views, underground parking for 2 cars and 2 bathrooms. This scheme benefits a lift in the building

Ideally located in the exclusive community of Hadley Wood, this is an exceptional modern development of just 14 one and two bedroom apartments. Set within beautifully landscaped gardens, each with its own private balcony, patio or terrace. Cocooned by the woodland edging the prestigious Hadley Wood Golf Club, this boutique scheme offers clean lines and modern materials within a beautifully landscaped setting. With surface parking for visitors immediately inside the entrance, residents can access a secure underground car park, where each apartment comes with two spaces, access to electric car charging points and cycle storage.

You are surrounded by rolling countryside with parkland on the doorstep. In one direction, the much-loved Hadley Common hosts the renowned Monken Hadley Cricket Club, with Hadley Manor, Covert Way Local Nature Reserve and King George's Fields all nearby. Trent Country Park extends for 413 acres in the other direction, offering ancient woodland and historic monuments, tranquil lakes and wildflower meadows for all to enjoy, ideal for walking, cycling and riding.

detailedDescription:
Light Move Properties are delighted to present this three bedroom 1930's style property to the market, the property is situated just 0.3 miles from Meridian Water Development. Meridian Water is a major £6billion, 25-year London regeneration programme led by Enfield Council, bringing 10,000 homes and thousands of jobs to Enfield, north London, next door to the beautiful Lee Valley Regional Park.

Alongside attractive new homes and world class public spaces and community facilities, the development now has its own brand new railway station, unlocking the area for commuters, with better connections south to Stratford and London Liverpool Street and north to Stansted and Cambridge. If your looking for a property which is going to increase in value over the years then you cannot get a better property or location than this.

The property offers three bedrooms (two doubles & one single), two receptions which has the potential to be one big open through lounge, bathroom, lean to and Garden. Many amenities & schools are located nearby including Ikea, Tescos Superstore, Restaurants etc. A local park is also situated on the same road if you like to go for walks or have children.

title: 4 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
A unique opportunity to purchase two premier, character, detached properties in Hadley Wood's
Camlet Way, reuniting them as one plot after 120 years. They are for sale together or as individual lots.

At the turn of the last century, local architect Richard Clay, purchased the land to build two houses from the Jack Estate. In 1905, he built Chace End (103 Camlet Way) for himself on part of the land and Ivinghoe (101) on the remainder. Situated at the head of the most prestigious road in Hadley Wood and immediately beyond the White Gate, the Clay houses rise from the road with sweeping driveways and have far reaching views over the green belt valley towards Wrotham Park.

Combined, the site area of both properties is 2.45 acres.

Chace End stands on a plot in the order of 1.51 acres - held on two titles, which includes a small
portion of green belt land (land registry plan available on request).

All viewings are strictly by appointment only.

In the same family ownership for over 30 years, Chace End offers generous accommodation suitable for a substantial family home, with scope to extend, re-model, or even re-build to the purchasers' own specification - subject to the necessary consents being obtained. The property is within easy reach of the shopping and transport facilities of Barnet. Hadley Wood mainline railway station is approximately half a mile away, and junction 24 of the M25 Motorway is just a few minutes' drive.

Summary of accommodation.

Gated entrance with impressive sweeping drive leading to the house. A detached character property of the Arts & Crafts style standing in its own substantial grounds - arranged over 3 levels. On the ground floor; 3 receptions - including an oak panelled hallway and sitting room, conservatory, utility room, laundry room, kitchen and 2 guest cloakrooms. On the first floor - in the main house; 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms & WC, with further first floor accommodation by way of an attached annexe (partly above the integral garage) with; 2 further rooms, bathroom & kitchen. There is a top floor attic room over the main house, currently used as a hobby room, but with scope for more.

In the mature landscaped grounds, there are various outbuildings including; a 19th Century barn, sheds and a greenhouse.

Available separately or jointly with 101 Camlet Way - offering scope for redevelopment (STPP)

Written offers will need to be made for submission to the vendor for consideration
by noon on 30th July 2021

Either write to our Whetstone office: 1320 High Road, London N20 9HP
or email:

As well as the offer amount, written confirmation must be given, confirming;
- Buyer's Name (individual or company), with full contact details
- Solicitor details (should the offer be acceptable)
- Any special conditions (e.g. To be tied-in with the purchase of the adjacent property)
- Proof of funding
- Proposed timescale for an exchange of contracts and completion of the purchase.

detailedDescription:
Extended semi-detached property situated situated in this sought after road in walking distance to Oakwood Park. Lounge, open plan kitchen/reception room, basement room, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, garden, off street parking.

We have pleasure in offering for sale this extended semi-detached property situated situated in this sought after road in walking distance to Oakwood Park and in catchment for excellent local primary and secondary schools. The accommodation comprises of front reception room, large open plan rear reception/kitchen with patio doors to the terrace. The are a comprehensive range of wall and base units with integrated hob, extractor, oven and space for American style fridge/freezer. There is also a basement room currently used as a gym but could be used for multiple uses. On the fist floor there is three bedrooms and a family bathroom and on the second floor there is a further bedroom and en-suite bathroom. The garden has a raised terrace with steps down to the garden with lawn area and flower and shrub borders. At the rear of the garden is a covered seating area.

The property is in easy reach of Winchmore Hill Green and Southgate Circus.

Opening into a large entrance hallway and leading to a 27ft living room with floor to ceiling windows with access to a sole use south east facing balcony that is open plan to the fitted kitchen. title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A rarely available, extended, double fronted, semi-detached, five-bedroom family home, situated on a premium road, offering off street parking for two cars, as well as three larger than average sized reception rooms. It is positioned in a prime location, ideally situated close to Southgate School, as well as being walking distance to Oakwood Station, providing quick and easy access into the capital.

This wonderful family home boasts further benefits such as a downstairs guest w/c, a stunning fireplace in the main reception room, a large tiled kitchen and a well-maintained garden which is directly accessed through both the kitchen and one of the three reception rooms.

Four double bedrooms occupy the first floor, in addition to a large family bathroom which has been fitted with under heating and chrome fixtures throughout. A separate shower room can also be found on the first floor, which has been fitted with a three-bar pump, providing strong and reliable shower flow.

A further, extremely spacious, fifth bedroom can be found in the extended loft room, which solely boasts 475sq ft of space. This includes the luxury of air-conditioning, an en-suite, and plenty of windows throughout welcoming an abundance of natural light.

The windows are double glazed throughout, improving the homes general security and insulation, coupled with gas central heating flowing through the property.

Location Bramley Road is in a superb location, situated with access to both the A10 and the North Circular Road (A406) from a 9 minutes' drive, providing quick and easy access into the Capital.

Many local amenities such as restaurants, supermarkets, coffee shops and key bus links are all within walking distance via Oakwood Parade, as well as the highly recommended local Chickenshed Theatre.

Oakwood Station (Picadilly Line) is a 5 minutes walk away, providing access into Central London from less than half an hour. Alternatively, Oakleigh Park Railway Station is also close by, allowing direct access to Finsbury Park from just 11 minutes.

Both Trent Park and Oakwood Park are nearby, with Trent Park being the most convenient option as you can enjoy many family activities there such as horse riding, go ape or even fishing on the large lake the park accommodates. This is also the perfect environment to enjoy fitness activities such as cycling, jogging or a peaceful walk.

Education in Oakwood is also a huge factor in its popularity, with Southgate and Oaktree School conveniently situated within walking distance from Bramley Road.

De Bohun nursery is also just a 10 minutes-walk away, as well as Eversley, Wolfson Hillel and Osidge Primary schools being nearby.

A message from the owners "A real family home built on love and laughter. We've had the most amazing 20 years in our home. We've put our heart and soul into it and have raised our children here. The lovely big reception rooms have seen many large celebrations during our time here. Chilling out in the extensive loft with friends and family over the years has been amazing. We feel privileged to have lived here and have many amazing memories. The move from here will be both exciting and heart breaking. We hope that the new owners will create their own special memories here, just as we have."

Please contact one of our property consultants at your earliest convenience to avoid potential disappointment.

detailedDescription:
Key features:
  • Detached Property with 0.5 Acres of Land
  • Fantastic Investment & Develop Opportunity
  • Three Bedrooms, Two with Dressing Rooms
  • Open Plan Living/Dining Room & Kitchen
  • Bathroom, En-Suite & Cloakroom WC
  • Study for Home Working
  • Sought After Location in Enfield
  • Close to Local Amenities & Transport Links
  • Easy Access onto the M25 Motorway
  • Off-Road Parking for up to Six Vehicles

Full description:
The Express Estate Agency is proud to offer this Three Bedroom Detached House with 0.5 Acres of Land – all interest and offers are invited.

Internal:
Entrance - The front French doors open to the porch, with a door to the hall.
Hall - With the staircase leading up to the first floor landing and doors to the living/dining room and kitchen, the study and the cloakroom WC.
Open Plan Living/Dining Room - Ample space for furniture for both living and dining, with multi-aspect windows and doors to the side, providing extensive country views. Opens to the kitchen.
Kitchen - Fitted with a range of wall and base units with granite effect worktops over and tiled flooring. Inset Belfast exposed sink with a drainer and engraved drainer, and a range cooker oven with a splashback and overhead extractor hood. Space and plumbing for appliances, and a side aspect window.
Study - Perfect for use as an office for home working, with a rear aspect window.
Cloakroom WC - With a WC and wash hand basin. Obscure front aspect window.

Master Bedroom - Large double size room with multi-aspect windows, a door to the dressing room, and a door to the en-suite.
En-Suite - Modern suite comprising a push-button WC, a wash hand basin and a large inset shower enclosure.
Bedroom Two - Double size room with a front aspect window and a door to the dressing room.
Bedroom Three - Good size room with a side aspect window.
Bathroom - Comprising a WC, a wash hand basin and an integrated bath with a shower. Rear aspect window.

External:
The property sits on half an acre of land with incredible opportunity for development, subject to the relevant planning permissions. To the front is ample off-road space for up to six vehicles.
There are local amenities nearby and easy access to the M25 motorway.

Early viewing is highly recommended due to the property being realistically priced.

detailedDescription:
Summary
full stamp tudy paid for July only *T&c's* apply Last few plots remaining. A 1319 sqft high specification apartment with a large private terrace overlooking stunning greenery, underground parking for 2 cars, 2 bathrooms & walk in wardrobe. Set within a boutique scheme in Hadley Wood.

Description
do you have A property to sell? Reservations will be considered.

Offering over 1300 sq ft of stunning living space with two double bedrooms, two bathrooms, a private terrace and a walk in wardrobe. This scheme benefits a lift in the building. Ideally located in the exclusive community of Hadley Wood, this is an exceptional modern development of just 14 one and two bedroom apartments. Set within beautifully landscaped gardens, each with its own private balcony, patio or terrace. Cocooned by the woodland edging the prestigious Hadley Wood Golf Club, this boutique scheme offers clean lines and modern materials within a beautifully landscaped setting. With surface parking for visitors immediately inside the entrance, residents can access a secure underground car park, where each apartment comes with two spaces, access to electric car charging points and cycle storage.

You are surrounded by rolling countryside with parkland on the doorstep. In one direction, the much-loved Hadley Common hosts the renowned Monken Hadley Cricket Club, with Hadley Manor, Covert Way Local Nature Reserve and King George's Fields all nearby. Trent Country Park extends for 413 acres in the other direction, offering ancient woodland and historic monuments, tranquil lakes and wildflower meadows for all to enjoy, ideal for walking, cycling and riding. There are also rugby, running, football and fishing clubs in the neighbourhood, while the local lawn tennis club is one of the oldest in the UK.

detailedDescription:
Earn instant income on this already tenanted investment opportunity! Not suitable for owner occupiers.

Yieldit are pleased to present this fantastic 3 bedroom terraced house located on Albany Park Avenue, Enfield.

The property is extremely spacious throughout, upon entering the property there is a large entrance hallway with a porch currently used for storage, the property also comprises of: Entrance hallway leading to a spacious lounge / dining room; guest bathroom; fully fitted kitchen with all appliances included; staircase leading to three double bedrooms all with double glazed windows; three piece family bathroom with a walk-in shower.

The property benefits from a large double drive and generously sized garden to the rear.

This is an excellent buy to let opportunity for anyone looking for a high performing property currently achieving an annual rental income.

Enfield has always been a popular buy to let option for property investors, with prices much lower compared to much of North London. That also makes Enfield popular with family buyers and tenants looking for more space at a reasonable cost.

Yields in the Enfield area are the highest in North London. They range between 3.2% and 5.6%.

Transport services in Enfield include the Piccadilly Line of the London Underground and the London Overground. Enfield has good road connections to the M25 London Orbital Motorway as well as the A10 and A406 North Circular.

Financial Breakdown

Gross rent: £17,400
Ground rent: £0
Service charge: £0
Lettings fees: £1,670
Net income: £15,730
Gross yield: 4%
Net yield: 3.62%

detailedDescription:
A well-presented, extended, five-bedroom, semi-detached cox-built home, situated within close proximity to Southgate Station (Picadilly Line) which offers quick and easy access into the Capital, as well as being within the catchment for Ashmole Academy.

This Fantastic family home boasts further benefits, such as a large driveway, two reception rooms, a well sized kitchen/breakfast room and the added luxury of a rear garage.

Two double bedrooms currently occupy the first floor, with the third being a well sized single. The bathroom is sizable and has been fitted with tiled flooring, with the addition of chrome fixtures.

A further two spacious double rooms can be found on the second floor, which has the shared use of shower room that has also been fitted with chrome fixtures throughout.

The windows are double glazed throughout, improving the homes general security and insulation, coupled with gas central heating flowing through the property.

Location Exeter Road is in a superb location, situated with access to the A10 from just an 8 minutes' drive, as well as the A406 from just 5 minutes, providing quick and easy access into the Capital.

Many local amenities such as restaurants, supermarkets, coffee shops and key bus links are all within walking distance via Chase Side (approx. 6-minute walk), otherwise Hampden Square is also conveniently located close to Exeter Road, also providing an abundance of local amenities.

Southgate Station (Piccadilly Line) is less than a mile away, which provides access to Central London within less than half an hour. Alternatively, Oakleigh Park Railway Station is also close by, providing direct access to Finsbury Park from just 11 minutes.

Both Oak Hill Park and Brunswick Park are close by, offering an abundance of greenery and a relaxing local environment for adults and children.

Education in Southgate is also a huge factor in its popularity. Walker, Monkfrith, Osidge, Brunswick Park and Ashmole Primary schools are nearby, as well as being in the catchment area for Ashmole Academy (rated outstanding by Ofsted).

As well as the local schools, Southgate's location in London means that it lies on the bus routes to the top independent and state schools in North London as a whole.

Please contact one of our property consultants to organise an accompanied meeting at your earliest convenience to avoid potential disappointment.

detailedDescription:
Situated in a quiet location, yet within easy reach of Cockfosters Road where you have a fabulous selection of shops, supermarkets, café’s and restaurants, along with Cockfosters Piccadilly Line Tube Station and access to the M25, with Southgate Station also within easy reach.
There is a good choice of highly regarded schools in the area, De Bohun, Danegrove, Monkfrith for Primary and East Barnet, Southgate and Ashmole for Secondary, to name a few.
A very well maintained property having been only recently built in 2017, the property has high ceilings throughout and comprises from the reception hallway a guest cloakroom, utility cupboard housing a washer/dryer, there is a well fitted kitchen with pelmet lighting and integrated fridge/freezer, micro combi oven, induction hob and dishwasher, there is a water softener, filtered water and porcelain tiled flooring. To the rear a lounge/dining area with doors opening into the garden.
Upstairs are two bedrooms and family bathroom and on the top floor a lovely master suite with balcony big enough to sit out on, a walk in wardrobe and en suite shower. The top floor also has access to the loft storage with ladder.
Outside to the rear there is a patio area and lawned garden with two parking spaces to the front.

detailedDescription:
** exdended ** Aleco Estate Agents are pleased to present this large 1930's four bedroom, two bathroom semi-detached house.

The property boasts three reception rooms, extended lounge area, good size bedrooms, off street parking for two cars, attractive rear garden approx. 40ft, ceiling high than normal and much more.

The property stands proudly on Cat Hill on the boarders of East Barnet and Cockfosters, and provides off street parking for a couple of cars. You'll find both Danegrove Primary and East Barnet Secondary schools just around the corner, while the nearest stations include Cockfosters tube with its surrounding shops, cafes and restaurants, as well as New Barnet and Oakleigh Park overground.

Tenure: Freehold
Council Tax Band: F

detailedDescription:
Offered with a long lease is a stunning two double bedroom two bathroom modern flat with private terrace, boasting circa 800sq ft of internal floor space. Set within a direct access to an exclusive gated development located in the heart of Palmers Green, a moments walk to the station and high street. This property offers exceptional contemporary living space and is beautifully presented throughout.

Features

Comprising of a stunning large open plan reception room with dining dining area. The modern fitted kitchen is equipped with modern fitted cabinetry offering ample storage and high-end integrated appliances. The master bedroom is well proportioned and benefits from an en-suite shower room. The second bedroom is also well proportioned . The stylish family bathroom boasts ceramic tiled walls, white bathroom suite with chrome fittings. Reception and both bedrooms lead out to a large private terrace that is completely secluded. The development also boasts well kept communal gardens and allocated parking.

Location

Located close to all local amenities of Palmers Green including various shops, restaurants and cafes. You will find excellent transport links, including Palmers Green overground station within a short walk, providing direct access into the City and the West End, easy access to Wood Green underground station (Piccadilly line, zone 3) and numerous bus routes.

Lease Information

125 years from 1 January 2016. All prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries via a solicitor.

Service Charges

We understand the service charge on the property is circa £2,400 per annum, with ground rent at £625 per annum. All prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries via a solicitor.

Disclaimer For Virtual Viewings

Some or all information pertaining to this property may have been provided solely by the vendor, and although we always make every effort to verify the information provided to us, we strongly advise you to make further enquiries before continuing.

If you book a viewing or make an offer on a property that has had its valuation conducted virtually, you are doing so under the knowledge that this information may have been provided solely by the vendor, and that we may not have been able to access the premises to confirm the information or test any equipment. We therefore strongly advise you to make further enquiries before completing your purchase of the property to ensure you are happy with all the information provided.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A unique, one-bedroom cottage, arranged over four floors and situated in a prime location with easy access to both the A10 and the A406, as well as being nearby to some excellent education facilities, with Worcesters Primary School being just 0.3 miles away.

On the lower ground floor, you can find a fully integrated kitchen, which is modern throughout, fitted with tiled flooring, spot lights and a gas hob.

The entrance of the property leads you directly into the well sized reception room, which has been fitted with laminate flooring and welcomes plenty of natural light.

One large bedroom occupies the cottage on the first floor, as well as a modernised bathroom which can be found on the second floor, boasting chrome fixtures throughout.

The windows are double glazed throughout, improving the home's general security and insulation, coupled with gas central heating flowing through the property.

Location Goat Cottage is conveniently located close to the A10 and is within a 20-minute walk to Turkey Street Station which provides quick and easy access into the Capital.

Additionally, there are a number of bus services located nearby, but most importantly, Forty Hall is just a stone's throw from Goat Cottage which is one of England's finest historic houses set in its own Estate.

The 273-acre Grade II listed estate is a rare example of an intact 18th Century Landscape, with an Ornamental lake, medieval fishing ponds and streams, a walled garden, Pleasure grounds, Georgian and Victorian flora and fauna, lakes, lawns, and meadows.

This makes the perfect purchase for the avid explorer and given the price bracket this property is listed at, it lends itself perfectly to a lucky first-time buyer.

Please contact one of our property consultants at your earliest convenience to avoid potential disappointment.

Full market value: £517,500
75% share value: £388,125
10% deposit of 75%: £38,813

Viewings by appointment only, book yours today!

The Chase Collection
2 Bedroom Apartment at Bevan House
The well-appointed apartments at Trent Park have been designed to a high standard featuring generous-sized rooms and spacious layouts finished to a high specification. In addition, the beautifully designed kitchen in this apartment has been fitted with the latest A rated appliances. The contemporary décor is additionally offset by historical touches that echo the distinguished heritage of its magnificent surroundings. Trent Park is a little oasis away from the hustle and bustle of the city.

Location
Trent Park is located amongst beautiful parkland in the north London triangle of Oakwood, Cockfosters and Hadley Wood. Nature is all around, yet so much more is on your doorstep, from sport and leisure facilities to shopping and dining opportunities. The development further offers easy access to the M25 and connects to King's Cross in 27 minutes from nearby Oakwood underground station.

To book a viewing or more information, please register your interest and our dedicated Sales Consultant who will be delighted in helping you find your new home.

What is Shared Ownership?
If you can't afford the mortgage on 100% of a home, Shared Ownership offers you the chance to buy a share of your home (between 25% and 75%) and pay rent on the remaining share. Later on, you could buy bigger shares when you can afford to and, if you chose, own the property outright. Monthly costs to purchase via Shared Ownership are generally less than purchasing outright or renting, making it a fantastic option to get onto the housing ladder.

About Legal & General Affordable Homes
Legal & General Affordable Homes are a Registered Provider offering these apartments for sale on a Shared Ownership basis. We are creating communities to live, grow and flourish and are committed to removing the stress and anxiety associated with moving house, whilst delivering customer satisfaction and quality new homes.

Please Note: The video tour shows the 2 bedroom show apartment at Trent Park.

**chain free**click for virtual tour**newly refurbished**four bathrooms**amazing kitchen**

This stunning 5 bedroom Victorian house has been newly refurbished, extended and remodelled to the highest spec. The ground floor offers a reception room fitted with new carpets, quartz walls and neutral décor, ground floor bedroom/entertainment room also has a quartz feature wall and en-suite shower room. The stylish and modern kitchen has been fully extended and boasts integrated appliances with self closing units leading to living/dining space and large bi-folding doors. The first floor offers three good sized bedrooms, one with en-suite shower room and a beautiful three piece bathroom suite. The third floor is a wonderfully converted space which offers a spacious bedroom with fitted wardrobes, utility room and three piece bathroom suite with built in waterproof TV. The rear garden has been designed with entertaining guests in mind with its fully paved floor area, wooden Pagoda and new fencing. Located a 10 minute walk away from Silver Street train station providing easy access into Central London. This house offers great access to the A10 and A406 and is conveniently located close to variety of primary and secondary schools including the prestigious Latymer Grammar. Close to local amenities and Edmonton Angel is situated around close by. Please call now to arrange a viewing.

detailedDescription:
Tucked away on a quiet sought after residential cul-de-sac in the heart of Southgate is a charming two-bedroom terrace Victorian cottage, offering bright and airy accommodation.

Upon arrival at the property, you are greeted by a well maintained front garden with own driveway, that leads onto the house, that comprises of a large front reception room that boasts electric fan fireplace and leads onto the large open plan kitchen diner. The kitchen boasts fitted cabinetry complete offering ample storage. The spacious open plan kitchen diner is flooded with natural light through its large patio sliding doors. Leading out to the modestly sized secluded rear garden, designed with low maintenance in mind yet ideal for entertaining family and guests. Leading up the stairs from the ground floor, lies two bedrooms and the family bathroom.

Location

Excellently located moments from Southgate Circus tube station(Piccadilly Line) and high street with a variety of shops, restaurants, trendy coffee shops and patisseries on offer. Other benefits nearby include Oakwood and Grovelands parks and open spaces. The property falls within catchment for highly sought after primary and secondary schools. Southgate Leisure centre is a stones throw away offering a 33m 6 lane swimming pool as well as full Gym facilities.

Being well suited for young professionals and families alike and set in the heart of Southgate, this house is not to be missed. An internal viewing is highly recommended.

detailedDescription:
Peter Barry are delighted to offer this fabulous four bedroom semi detached family house ready for your ever expanding family but with scope to further extend in the future (STPP).

This wonderful 1930's house offers amazing living space with a great size through lounge, an extended kitchen with a dinning area too.

Great for a large family, it is located within the catchment area for the outstanding St Paul's primary school, it would also make an ideal property to make your own, with ample potential to further extend.

Perfectly located you are a stones throw from Winchmore Hill Green and short distance from local boutiques, restaurants, bistros and convenience stores including Sainsburys & Waitrose Supermarkets.

The property is within close proximity to Winchmore Hill National Rail Station that travels into London's Moorgate and Old Street's financial district as well as road links such as the A10 & A406.

In brief the property comprises, porch, inner hallway, through lounge, kitchen breakfast room, dining room/study/playroom, guest cloakroom, first floor landing, four good sized bedrooms, four piece family bathroom and separate wc.

The front garden is paved for ample off street parking, the garden is mainly laid to lawn with paved patio area and mature shrubs and trees.

Viewing highly recommended.

title: 3 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Stunning Victorian property with over 4600 sq ft of accommodation finished to an exceptional standard in Enfield's conservation area. 5 Receptions, kitchen/diner, utility room, 5 bedrooms, en-suite, bathroom, garden, garage, off street parking.

We have pleasure in offering for sale this truly stunning Victorian property with over 4600 sq ft of accommodation. The property has been extended and completely refurbished and finished to an exceptional standard. The accommodation consists of five reception rooms, one of 47, the second 30' and the incredible kitchen/diner boasts 42' x 19' of space. The kitchen is custom made with comprehensive range of units. Large central breakfast bar with Corian worktops, Miele coffee machine, steam oven, ovens, warming drawer, fridge, freezer, induction hob and dishwasher. The seating area has a contemporary fireplace and drop down projector and bi-fold door opening to the terrace. Reception one is dual aspect with a gas fireplace, a TV entertainment area with speaker system and bi-fold doors opening to the garden. Reception two has a dining area and a fitted colour changing bar and electric curtains. There is a further TV room with views on to the garden. There is a utility room off the kitchen and a further entrance hall giving access to the garage and the side pathway. On the first floor there is games room that could be easily converted to another bathroom, four bedrooms all with fitted wardrobes and a luxury family bathroom. On the second floor is a complete air conditioned master suite and a stunning en-suite with bath, walk-i shower, enclosed wc and marble wall with TV integrated. The rear garden has a great terrace with bar and barbeque area, covered seating area, water feature and a 250 year old olive tree. The remainder is laid to lawn with flower and shrub borders. The front has electric gates with retaining walls and a brick paved driveway providing off street parking for numerous vehicles. The house contains an abundance of modern fittings which you would expect of a house of this quality including cat 5 wiring, professionally designed lighting system, CCTV around the house, central vacuum system, underfloor heating and music system across the house.

Situated in a conservation area, the house has been lovingly restored by the current owners and finished to an exact standard. The house is within walking distance of br railway station and local shops and cafes.

The property comprises of a very large open plan lounge/fitted kitchen and dining room, a double glazed conservatory overlooking a private, enclosed, south-facing rear garden. With 4 double bedroom’s, an en-suite to master and family bathroom, leading up to the second floor with a generous self-contained Studio Flat, consisting of open plan living/bedroom accommodation, a shower room and kitchenette with fantastic views at the rear. title: 2 bed flat for sale

address: Harlequin House, 5 Woodall Street, Enfield EN3
detailedDescription:
Launching soon - Register now!

Creating a new community in the heart of Enfield

1 Bed prices starting from £87,000 (based on a 30% share of the full market value of £290,000)

2 Bed prices starting from £102,000 (based on a 30% share of the full market value of £340,000)

Sanderling & Harlequin House are part of the next exciting phase in the transformation of Ponders End. These brand new 1 & 2 bed apartments are being offered by Newlon Living for Shared Ownership and come with stylish fitted kitchens, modern bathrooms, bright and airy living areas and private balconies.

With Ponders End station so close by, Westfield Stratford is only 30 minutes away. You’ll be spoilt with over 300 shops, 50 places to dine and an 11 screen cinema. Westfield Stratford City is one of the largest inner-city shopping malls in Europe and the new lifestyle destination for East London.

Trent Park, on the borders of Enfield, offers a beautiful and rural location. Take a stroll around its acres of meadows, lakes and ancient woodland. Here you can enjoy cycling, horse riding or just relaxing in its picturesque surroundings. The Lea Valley Walk is also nearby, so you’ll always have somewhere to go to get away from the everyday hustle and bustle of urban life.

Alma Primary School and Oasis Academy, both rated good by Ofsted, are within walking distance and close by are a variety high street stores and supermarkets in Enfield Town Centre.

London travel is simple from here, from Ponders End Station you can enjoy a quick commute into the City in less than 20 minutes.

This really is a place you’ll want to call home, making your first step onto the property ladder a meaningful one!

Parking available with selected apartments - See price list for details.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

address: Antlia Court, The Pump House, Hadley Road, Enfield EN2
detailedDescription:
Key features:
  • 2174 sq ft three bedroom, two bathroom duplex penthouse apartment
  • Magnificent master bedroom with dressing area and sumptuous en-suite
  • Truly spectacular living space ideal for entertaining
  • Delightfully designed kitchen area complete with granite worktops and integrated Miele appliances
  • Gated development set within 2 and a half acres of private parkland
  • Feature windows with far reaching views over the countryside
  • Direct lift access to apartment
  • Two allocated parking bays and additional visitor parking
  • Video entry system and Naccoss approved alarm system
  • Build mark warranty


Main Description
Unique duplex penthouse


A truly majestic place to call home, Antlia Court at The Pump House delivers the perfect combination of a luxurious serene lifestyle in a prime accessible setting, all whilst being surrounded by captivating history and breathtaking landscapes – a true London haven in all sense of the word.

The Chace, a spectacularly unique duplex penthouse apartment located on the third floor of The Pump House. To the lower floor you will find a delightfully expansive living/kitchen/dining area fitted with Miele appliances, a luxurious master suite which is complimented with tremendously impressive ensuite bathroom and dressing area.

As you ascend the stairs, you will find notably spacious bedrooms 2 and 3 along with a well-designed shared ensuite bathroom. Totalling 2174 sq ft, this truly extraordinary apartment benefits from two allocated parking bays set within the secure gated grounds.

For those seeking a London home with a countryside ambiance, look no further than Antlia Court – a development steeped in history that will bestow on residents an aspirational standard of living. The seven luxury properties are ideally located in North London among two and a half acres of luscious private parkland.

Solomons brook flows peacefully along the edge of this idyllic sanctuary and residents have two and a half acres of parkland, lawns and vegetation to call their own. All this in a location that is as practical as it is charming. Just an 18-minute walk will see residents at Trent Park, an area of Special Historic Interest due to its links to King Henry IV and his hunting grounds. Today, the park extends to 400-acres and is host to ornamental lakes, grassy meadows, a water garden, and enchanting woodland – the perfect place for a family day out or romantic stroll.

Despite its abundance of greenery and rural environ, Antlia Court holds a winning hand when it comes to an outstanding location. For amenities, Cockfosters underground station is under 3-miles from the properties, making the London network and the Capital’s offerings easily accessible whilst offering families an array of state, grammar and private schools in the area.

Additional Information
For further information please call the sales team.

The property has been extended downstairs and boasts a contemporary fitted kitchen with good storage space and granite work surfaces which opens onto a dining / living room, a separate front reception room, a ground floor wc, a modern fitted first floor bathroom, double glazing, gas central heating, a rear garden that extends to approx. 40ft with a double garage to the rear accessed via a shared road way, and off street parking to the front of the house. detailedDescription:
We have pleasure in offering for sale this stunning detached property in this incredibly sought after road. 2 Large receptions, kitchen, cloakroom, 4 bedrooms, en-suite, bathroom, garden, garage, off street parking.

Property Details

We have pleasure in offering for sale this stunning detached property in this incredibly sought after road.

On the ground floor there are two excellent size reception rooms both with feature fireplaces with over mantle and coved ceilings. The reception hallway has a stunning parquet flooring with enclosed radiators and coved ceiling with a downstairs cloakroom. The kitchen has bespoke fitted wall and base units with granite worktops, a butler style sink unit, a range cooker with extractor above and wood flooring. The kitchen has been extended with a modern roof lantern and feature arched window providing plenty of light and downlighters recessed into the ceiling. On the first floor there are four bedrooms with an en-suite to the master and an additional family bathroom. There is a beautiful mature rear garden with large patio area with the remainder laid to lawn with flower and shrub borders and to the rear of the garden is a summerhouse.

Situated within walking distance of Grovelands Park and Winchmore Hill Green with its local shops, buses restaurants and br station. Southgate Circus is also within easy reach with its underground station and multiple shops.

detailedDescription:
Equity estate agents are pleased to offer this well maintained and spacious Ground Floor Apartment located in this Quiet cul-de-sac backing onto greenbelt countryside just off The Ridgeway. The property is within easy access of enfield town Multiple Shopping Centre, good schools and walking distance to gordon hill and enfield chase Train Stations which has good links to (Moorgate Line via finsbury park and Liverpool Street Lines), or alternatively oakwood Underground Station (Piccadilly Line). For those longer journeys the flat is a 9 Minute drive from the M25 at Junction 24 and Close proximity to st Micheals CofE Primary School, Merryhills Primary School and Highlands School. The flat is also located within a 2 Minute walk of Farmlands, a lovely countryside Walk which takes you directly into Trent Park and within a 10 Minute walk of Rectory Farm, another lovely Walking area.

Benefits include 16ft lounge/diner, modern fitted kitchen (Includes a New Hob and Oven extractor fan and dishwasher) and bathroom, new PVC double glazing (Installed in 2020), electric heating, two double bedrooms, new water tank ( Installed in 2019 which provides good water pressure), lease 90 years +, communal grounds and permitted communal parking.<br /><br />

Barnfields are extremely pleased to offer this superb lower ground floor garden flat in this modern development, within a short walking distance of Grange Park Rail Station (Moorgate Line) and local shops and within easy access of Enfield Town multiple shopping centre.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A stunning First floor apartment comprising of 2 Bedrooms and 2 Bathrooms. Forming part of this luxury development of 9 bespoke apartments set in an oasis of tranquillity offering five star hotel style living. Concierge at your service, beautifully manicured landscaped gardens, swim, leisure and wellness facilities and Golf course views.

Specification:
- Main Hallway features floor and wall finishes. Feature decorative lighting. Concierge reception.
- Bespoke passenger lift exclusively designed
for residences serving each level with direct access to parking/Spa level. Oversized entrance doors to all apartments.
- Individually designed Kitchen & Utility Room with
bespoke cabinetry, lacquer finish soft closing doors and drawers. Miele integrated oven and induction hob, integrated combination microwave/oven, integrated full-height fridge and freezer, dishwasher. Composite worktops to Kitchen. Feature splashbacks to selected areas. Composite worktops to Utility room. Composite under mount sink with waste disposals. Quooker mixer tap with boiling water function and extendable hose for cleaning in dark platinum matt. Miele washing machine and dryer to Utility room.
- Bathroom & Powder Room with large tile wall and floor finishes to master ensuite bathroom and powder room. Bespoke vanity units with stone tops exclusively designed. Medicine cabinets to master ensuite bathroom where appropriate. Rain showers to master ensuite bathroom. Pull out hand showers to bath in master ensuite bathroom. Wall mounted WC pan with soft close seat/cover and concealed cistern to ensuite bathroom. Heated towel rail to all ensuite bathroom.
- Interior finishes include bespoke oversized timber doors. Bespoke skirting and architrave detail. High quality timber floors throughout hallway and main reception room. Carpet to Bedrooms. Bespoke fitted wardrobes to Bedroom suites including shelving, rails, drawers and concealed lighting. Dark bronze effect ironmongery to all doors.
- Lighting & Technology includes bespoke lighting design layout. Feature ceiling coffers with concealed lighting to selected hallway, principal
reception room and master bedroom suite. Recessed LED downlighters throughout. 5-amp lighting circuits to selected principal reception room and bedroom suites. Pir lighting where appropriate. Integrated Sonos music system and ceiling speakers to selected principal reception
room and master bedroom suite. Cat 6 wiring throughout. Telephone and data points to selected
principal reception room. Television points to principal reception room and bedroom suites. Lutron mood lighting system. Central ‘Hub’ cupboard for home automation.
- Underfloor heating to principal reception room, hallway, bedroom suites and bathrooms. Individual room thermostatic climate control. Comfort cooling to selected principal room and master bedroom suite.
- Video entry system to operate private entry / exit. Individually designed zoned apartment alarm system installed. Mains operated smoke detectors. On site concierge service. External lighting to selected areas. CCTV coverage of all external communal areas monitored by the concierge.
- Secure underground parking with two reserved parking spaces. Heated ramp. Individual lockable storage room. Power and lighting to private storage room. Cold store for grocery deliveries and
additional private refrigeration. Provision for vehicle charging points.
- Residents Spa & Fitness Suite includes comfort cooling. Vinyl flooring to gym suite. Mirrored wall. Television and sound system. 15 metre swimming pool. Sauna and steam room. Spa treatment rooms for private use. Two changing rooms with shower facilities. Covered and secure access to spa.
- Communal Gardens with bespoke landscape design. External feature lighting. Clipped topiary hedging. Central ornate water feature. Modern podium landscape. Fruit trees. Meandering mown paths through long grass. Resin bound gravel paths to selected areas. Specialist exterior flooring.

detailedDescription:
Summary
A two double bedroom 2nd floor apartment designed to a high specification. This residence could be an ideal first home or a great investment opportunity with Oakleigh Park Mainline Station just 0.8 miles making it appealing to buyers needing to commute to Central London in less than 30 minutes.

Description
Comprises of living area giving you direct access to a private balcony overlooking well-tendered communal gardens as well as a modern kitchen area. Two double bedrooms, one with en-suite facilities and a lovely fitted bathroom. The property also benefits from a residents private gym and has one underground allocated parking space. This development is approached and entered via remote accessed gates giving the sense of not only additional security but a true sense of exclusive living in Whetstone.

Dating back to the 15th Century, Whetstone originated in medieval times, and legend has it that the name stems from the stone that is placed outside of the Griffin Pub, where soldiers went to sharpen their swords before the Battle of Barnet. Whetstone is perfect for both commuters and families alike. Located in zone 4, Totteridge and Whetstone northern line tube station offers easy access in and out of the city and central London, whilst also being only moments away from open countryside.
