Our family home for the past 6 years has provided us with everything we have needed for our young family with a nice addition of the adopted family of ducks in the garden that overlooks the canal!
Set in a peaceful conservation area with ample parks and walks it has given the our children all the room they have needed to run. We have never got bored of the different routes and new things to discover.

detailedDescription:
Summary

One bedroom third floor apartment positioned in a great location for transport links into Central London and surrounding. This property is a great opportunity for either investors or first time buyers

The property comprises of a separate lounge and the Kitchen is generous sized master bedroom. The property is double glazed through out and has underfloor heating.

Auctioneers Additional Comments

Pattinson Auction are working in Partnership with the marketing agent on this online auction sale and are referred to below as 'The Auctioneer'.

Please be aware that any enquiry, bid or viewing of the subject property will require your details being shared between both the marketing agent and The Auctioneer in order that all matters can be dealt with effectively.

This auction lot is being sold either under conditional (Modern) or unconditional (Traditional) auction terms and overseen by the auctioneer in partnership with the marketing agent.

The property is available to be viewed strictly by appointment only via the Marketing Agent or The Auctioneer. Bids can be made via The Auctioneers or the Marketing Agents website.

Auctioneers Additional Comments

Your details may be shared with additional service providers via the marketing agent and/or The Auctioneer.

A Legal Pack associated with this particular property is available to view upon request and contains details relevant to the legal documentation enabling all interested parties to make an informed decision prior to bidding. The Legal Pack will also outline the buyers' obligations and sellers' commitments. It is strongly advised that you seek the counsel of a solicitor prior to proceeding with any property and/or Land Title purchase.

In order to submit a bid upon any property being marketed by The Auctioneer, all bidders/buyers will be required to adhere to a verification of identity process in accordance with Anti Money Laundering procedures.

Auctioneers Additional Comments

In order to secure the property and ensure commitment from the seller, upon agreement of sale, the successful bidder will be expected to pay a non-refundable deposit and or reservation fee of up to 6% inc VAT (subject to a minimum of between 2,400 and 6,000 inc VAT dependant on geographical location and contract type) Full terms and conditions are available on The Auctioneers website.

The Reservation Fee is in addition to the agreed purchase price and consideration should be made by the purchaser in relation to any Stamp Duty Land Tax liability associated with overall purchase costs. The Auctioneer may believe it necessary or beneficial to the customer to pass your details to third party service suppliers, from which a referral fee may be obtained. There is no requirement or obligation to use these recommended suppliers or services.

address: Parkgate Avenue, Hadley Wood, Hertforshire EN4
detailedDescription:
A fantastic opportunity to acquire this fabulous six bedroom, seven bathroom contemporary family home sitting on an impressive plot of approximately 3/4 of an acre. The property offers well planned and proportioned accommodation arranged over three floors and is situated in the heart of Hadley Wood.

As you enter to find an impressive reception hallway, a 'super room' incorporating a contemporary kitchen breakfast/dining room leading into a family room plus a separate prep kitchen and utility plus access to the garage which has a shower room. To complete this floor there is a cinema room and a guest cloakroom.

To the first floor there are four well proportioned bedrooms all of which have en-suites and dressing rooms. The master bedroom has a lovely view overlooking the garden and is super sized measuring 31'4 x 24'10.

A further staircase from the first floor landing leads to the second floor where you will find bedrooms five and six both of which have en-suites and dressing rooms, a winter sitting area with feature window overlooking the garden, a music room and a summer sitting area to the front.

The stunning and secluded garden is approximately 303 feet with a paved terrace, perfect for entertaining and truly needs to be seen to be appreciated. There is a mature selection of trees and flowers along with a lawn and a path to a woodland at the end of the garden. To the rear of the garden there is a gym and a treatment room.

Location:- Situated in this highly regarded avenue in the heart of Hadley Wood within easy reach of local shops, primary school and mainline station. The M25 is a short drive away.

For more properties for sale in Hadley Wood please call our Estate Agents in Hadley Wood .

title: 2 bed flat for sale

address: 494 Green Lanes, Palmers Green, London N13
detailedDescription:
Peter Barry are pleased to offer this ground floor two double bedroom purpose built apartment with ample storage & Share of freehold.

Palmers Green mainline stations are just 0.6 miles away, this travels into London's financial district. You also have great road links with the A10 & A406 within close proximity too.

Lindsey Court would make a great first time or investment purchase with local high street shops, amenities and transport links all plentiful. The area also boasts some fabulous schools such as St Monica's rc primary school should you be looking to extend your family in the future.

This wonderful purpose built apartment is situated perfectly for a short walk to Palmers Green High Road with its range of coffee houses, restaurant's, delicatessen's and Gastro pubs. Alternatively you also have Winchmore Hill Green and The Broad way within close proximity too.

In brief the accommodation comprises communal entrance, inner hallway, lounge dining room, modern fitted kitchen, two double bedrooms, family bathroom, communal gardens & parking and finally ample storage.

Viewing recommended.

detailedDescription:
A charming and substantially sized detached, corner house situated on Cartehatch Lane, within easy reach of Enfield Town shopping precinct and Enfield Town br station, as well as a number of highly regarded schools and open spaces including the popular Forty Hall estate.

Arranged over three floors, the property boasts impressive living accommodation with high ceilings, character fireplaces, and scope to re-configure to one's own requirements. The ground floor features an interlinking reception room and dining room, an eat-in kitchen, utility room and a guest WC. The first floor provides four generously sized bedrooms and a family bathroom, whilst the third floor enjoys an impressive master bedroom with and en-suite and plenty of built-in storage. Externally the property benefits from a rear garden which is predominantly paved and a garage.

Purplebricks are delighted to market this converted 1930’s ground floor 2-bedroom flat with own front and rear gardens, off-street parking and secure garden workshop/office. 50% share of freehold included.

detailedDescription:
Tucked away in private gated development in the heart of Southgate, is a well presented four bedrooms plus study semi-detached family house. Arranged over three floors, this stunning property has been designed with modern living and functionality in mind. Bright and spacious living accommodation with elegant interiors and upgraded fixtures and fittings give this property a premium finish. Comprising of four bedrooms plus study with the master boasting an en-suite bathroom. A generously sized reception room with semi open plan kitchen, with a separate large dining room. The private rear garden, which has a patio area and mainly laid to lawn. At the front there is off street parking that is completely secured and gated.

Location

The development is situated a moments walk to Southgate Circus tube station and high street with a variety of shops, restaurants, trendy coffee shops and patisseries on offer. Other benefits nearby include Broomfield and Grovelands parks and open spaces. The property falls within catchment for highly sought after primary and secondary schools. Palmers Green mainline station (trains to Moorgate) is also close by.

detailedDescription:
Summary
Situated in this popular retirement & warden assisted development is a self-contained 2 double bedroom first floor flat overlooking well-tendered communal gardens. Offering well-proportioned accommodation & presented in good decorative order.

Description
The entrance hall gives access to a spacious lounge and semi-open plan modern kitchen, shower-room, good-sized bedrooms with a rear aspect window. Enjoying an independent retirement lifestyle within a relaxed and friendly setting, this development also provides a professional on-site manager available every weekday and staff who offer a range of social activities and communal services where you can choose to get involved in as much or as little as you like. Further features include a security entry phone system, a communal lift and residents parking facilities.

Southgate is a suburban area in North London that was originally the "South Gate" of Enfield Chase, the King's hunting grounds. In 1894 Southgate was created an urban district of Middlesex, but was predominantly developed around the 1930's. Located in Zone 4 on the borders of Arnos Grove and Winchmore Hill, Southgate tube station offers easy access in Central London. Southgate is the perfect location for those who want to be part of the vibrant city lifestyle while also being moments away from the open spaces around Cockfosters.

title: 4 bed end terrace house for sale

detailedDescription:
Offered with no onward chain and with an extended lease of 156 years remaining is this magnificent two bedroom flat, set on the ground floor within a highly sought after development with beautifully kept communal gardens and resident parking. Situated within walking distance to both Southgate and Oakwood underground. Boasting over 550sq ft of internal floor space, this spacious two bedroom flat offers bright and airy accommodation and is beautifully presented throughout.

Upon entering the property, you are greeted by a welcoming entrance hall that branches off to all the principal rooms. The stunning large semi open plan living and kitchen dinner is flooded with natural light through its large aspect windows that over look the luscious communal gardens. The kitchen boasts ample fitted wall and base cabinetry complete with electrical appliances. Both bedrooms are well proportioned and look out to the communal gardens. The modern bathroom boasts ceramic tiled walls and flooring with a contemporary white bathroom suite complete with chrome fittings.

Location

The development is situated a moments walk to Southgate Circus tube station and high street with a variety of shops, restaurants, trendy coffee shops and patisseries on offer. Other benefits nearby include Broomfield and Grovelands parks and open spaces. The property falls within catchment for highly sought after primary and secondary schools. Palmers Green mainline station (trains to Moorgate) is also close by.

Lease Information

156 years remaining. All prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries via a solicitor.

Service Charges

We understand the service charge on the property is circa £1,200 per annum, with ground rent at £300 per annum. All prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries via a solicitor.

Disclaimer For Virtual Viewings

Some or all information pertaining to this property may have been provided solely by the vendor, and although we always make every effort to verify the information provided to us, we strongly advise you to make further enquiries before continuing.

If you book a viewing or make an offer on a property that has had its valuation conducted virtually, you are doing so under the knowledge that this information may have been provided solely by the vendor, and that we may not have been able to access the premises to confirm the information or test any equipment. We therefore strongly advise you to make further enquiries before completing your purchase of the property to ensure you are happy with all the information provided.

Available on a chain free basis, Butler & Stag are delighted to offer for sale this very well maintained, four bedroom family home set in a quiet Enfield turning.

The property has been very well looked after by the owners and offers near 1000' sq ft of accommodation, making it a perfect family home.

Chain Free.

For just £136,250 which is a 25% share of this luxury apartment with generous-sized rooms which have been completed to a high specification are full of natural light, complementing the semi-rural setting. The contemporary décor is additionally offset by historical touches that echo the distinguished heritage of its magnificent surroundings.

Set within the historical Royal hunting ground of Trent Park, which is 400 acres of parkland, you will have the opportunity to seek and secure a rich prize of your own. This is a wonderful oasis away from the busy surroundings. Located amongst beautiful parkland in the north London triangle of Oakwood, Cockfosters and Hadley Wood. Nature is all around, yet so much more is on your doorstep, from sport and leisure facilities to shopping and dining opportunities. The development further offers easy access to the M25 and connects to King's Cross in 27 minutes from nearby Oakwood underground station.

The Kendrick Collection and The Chase Collection at Trent Park is a selection of one, two and three-bedroom apartments set amidst a 56-acre estate.

detailedDescription:
An exceptional 7-bedroom home boasting 7,000 square feet of living space, located in Hadley Wood. Approaching the home, you are greeted with a double fronted-gate that leads you into the driveway providing parking for numerous vehicles and a double garage.

Upon entering the property, the ground floor greets you with a beautiful atrium that allows natural light to flood the hallway. It is a home that truly lifts the spirits. This home benefits from two reception rooms for formal and informal entertaining. The centre of the home features a grand dining area overlooking the landscaped gardens and the chef’s kitchen benefits from a large marble island, Poggenpohl units and integrated Gaggenau appliances.

The first floor hosts four of the bedroom suites, the master bedroom benefits from south-facing views, a large en-suite and a walk-in wardrobe. Heading up to the final level you have three additional bedrooms with one room functioning as a home office.

The incredible landscaped gardens benefit from vast green space, with the rear featuring an architecturally designed outbuilding that includes a gym, swimming pool, and entertainments room. Additional features of this building include an outdoor chefs kitchen, full bathroom, sauna and outdoor shower.

Beech Hill is an opportunity to own a magnificent mansion in a prime North London suburb. Hadley Wood benefits from tranquil open-countryside. You have the benefit of serene country walks, with Central London just a quick trip away.

Location: Hadley Wood mainline station offers a 30 minute journey time to Moorgate, Kings Cross and Cockfosters underground station (Piccadilly Line) is a short drive away as is junction 24 of the M25 which provides an excellent link to the M1 and all major airports including Heathrow, Luton and Stanstead. Recreational facilities in the area include Hadley Wood Golf club, Tennis Club and acres of green space to explore.

The area is also well served by educational facilities which include Stormont, Lochinver, Haberdashers' Aske's for Boys, Haberdashers' Ake's for Girls, Mill Hill School, Aldenham, Belmont, Dame Alice Owen, Haileybury, Queenswood, Queen Elizabeth's Boys School and Queen Elizabeth's Girls School.

title: 4 bed detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
Detailed Description

The Cooper Collection comprises five- bedroom detached homes set within Trent Park's 413 acres of parkland, surrounded by mature trees and a moment's walk from the historic Lime Tree Avenue, residents-only Lawn Club and the expansive North Lawn. Contemporary and elegantly crafted, these carefully considered homes are designed to settle comfortably within their natural surroundings.

A quiet escape from the bustle of London life, Trent Park offers a local lifestyle with easy access to a great range of surrounding amenities, just a short drive to the M25 by car and 26 minutes to King's Cross via tube.

Comprising traditionally designed homes within historic grounds in Enfield, Trent Park includes two, three, four and five-bedroom houses, and one, two and three-bedroom apartments. Its centrepiece will be the Mansion House - a Grade II Listed Mansion that is being thoughtfully restored to its former brilliance and glory.

Nestled in the heart of Trent Country Park - a former medieval hunting ground - surrounded by wildlife, ponds, lakes and ancient woodland, and above all, traditional English countryside. With breath-taking scenery all year round, from forest glades to an expanse of bluebells, there is something for the whole family to enjoy. Nature trails, country walks, bike paths and historical curiosities abound, alongside play areas, a hockey and a golf club, and a wildlife rescue centre are all on your doorstep.

title: 3 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
A truly wonderful family home. Solsana is a rarely available, art deco, extended, four bedroom, semi-detached property which is set on a premium road within the popular Minchenden Estate, and is ideally situated for Walker Primary School, as well as being just a short walk from 'The Green'. Arnos Park is close by offering an abundance of open green space with Arnos Grove Underground Station (Piccadilly Line) being just 0.5 miles away.

This exceptional home boasts further benefits such as private off street parking, a downstairs guest W/C, two reception rooms (one with a feature fireplace), as well as converted garage space which can be used as a study / games room or downstairs bedroom. The luxury of separate utility space can also be found just off the kitchen.

The property further profits from large landscaped rear gardens with the benefit of side access, as well as a fully integrated, high-spec kitchen with ample storage, stainless steel appliances and granite work surfaces.

The rear gardens can be directly accessed from both the rear reception room as well as the kitchen.

Number 1 Abbotshall Avenue, also named as 'Solsana' has been fitted with double glazed windows, coupled with gas central heating flowing throughout the property.

This home was extended to the rear with a double story extension boasting a unique curved glass window design for the kitchen and master bedroom. The space has assisted with adding larger living space, a further bedroom with an en suite, and the luxury of a juliette balcony overlooking the extensive gardens. The master suite also benefits from air conditioning.

Four large double bedrooms occupy the first floor, and both the family bathroom and en-suite leading off the master bedroom are both spacious and semi-tiled with chrome fixtures and granite surfaces throughout. Three of the four bedrooms also offer bespoke fitted wardrobe space.

The property has recently been painted throughout with newly fitted carpets and a newly laid resin roof.

The flat roof on the top of the home provides the perfect setting to enjoy the memorable firework displays at both Alexandra Palace and the locally known Walker Cricket ground, and of course, some great space for sunbathing during the summer days.

Solsana offers close to 2,400 square feet of modern living space arranged over just two floors.

Location Solsana is just one of nine art deco family homes situated on Abbotshall Avenue which is a pleasant leafy street set within the ever so popular Minchenden Estate. Arnos Grove Station is just 0.5 miles from the property providing direct links into central London for those working in the city, whilst there is also plenty of open green space for enjoyment on the weekends and evenings. Arnos Park, Broomfield Park and Grovelands Parks are all easily accessible, with Arnos Park being the most convenient option. These large green spaces contain lakes, streams, tennis courts and play grounds, providing a relaxing local environment for adults and children.

Southgate's high street is also just a 15 minute walk or just a 4 minute drive offering an array of restaurants, banks and coffee bars alike. Education in Southgate is also a huge factor in its popularity. Walker, Monkfrith and Ashmole primary schools are nearby, with Ashmole Academy being just a short drive away. As well as the local schools, Southgate's location in London means that it lies on the bus routes to the top independent and state schools in North London as a whole.

Message from the owners:
"This house has been filled with friends, family and lots of laughter and will be very much missed. A great location with the park, pub and restaurants on our door step which we have thoroughly enjoyed over the years and a fabulous and warm community in the road. The garden is jewel in the crown and never sparkles as much as when it is full of people enjoying the sunshine, drinking and eating good food. The extension was carefully planned to keep the integrity of the stunning Art Deco architecture and create a space that flows and provides lots of space for the whole family. We hope another family enjoy this home as much as we have."

Please contact one of our property consultants to organise an accompanied meeting at your earliest convenience to avoid potential disappointment.

detailedDescription:
Detailed Description

Sitting proudly overlooking the historic Daffodil Lawn in one direction and views of the North Lawn and lake on the other, Trent Park House really is the jewel in the crown at Trent Park. Offering a once in a lifetime opportunity to be a part of history these 14 luxury 1,2 and 3 bedroom apartments have been meticulously refurbished for modern day living with a choice of specifications. 5* facilities include a Reading Room on the ground floor, outdoor heated swimming pool, fully equipped gym in the historic orangery and outdoor tennis courts along with 413 acres of beautiful English countryside to explore.
title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Detailed Description

A one bedroom second floor apartment in Highfield house with ample storage. The apartment comprises a spacious living/kitchen/dining room with access to a balcony. Master Bedroom benefits from fully fitted wardrobes.

Facing directly onto the Daffodil Lawn, the 1,2 and 3 bedroom apartments and 2 and 3 bedroom penthouses provide the perfect respite for a busy urban lifestyle. The apartments in Highfield House provide all the benefits of modern living in a calm and tranquil setting.

A quiet escape from the bustle of London life, Trent Park offers a local lifestyle with easy access to a great range of surrounding amenities, just a short drive to the M25 by car and 26 minutes to King's Cross via tube.

Comprising over 250 traditionally designed homes within 56 acres of historic grounds in Enfield, Trent Park will include two, three, four and five-bedroom houses, and one, two and three-bedroom apartments. Its centrepiece will be the Mansion House - a Grade II Listed Mansion that is being thoughtfully restored to its former brilliance and glory.

Nestled in the heart of Trent Country Park - a former medieval hunting ground - surrounded by wildlife, ponds, lakes and ancient woodland, and above all, traditional English countryside. With breath-taking scenery all year round, from forest glades to an expanse of bluebells, there is something for the whole family to enjoy. Nature trails, country walks, bike paths and historical curiosities abound, alongside play areas, a hockey and a golf club, and a wildlife rescue centre are all on your doorstep.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Tucked down a quiet tree lined road in the heart of N13 is this charming period, two-bedroom split level flat. The property is found in good condition with bay windows and in excess of 700 sq. Ft (65 sqm) it is larger than your average. The property is situated off the well-known Palmers Green High Street and only a few minutes’ walk to Palmers Green Overground and numerous bus links.
The property


The property is presented with a spacious open plan reception and kitchen, beaming with natural light through the large bay windows. The kitchen is built with ample storage space and work top space perfect testing out your culinary skills.
Dark wooden floors run throughout the property bringing in contrast and texture and adding to the natural characteristics of the flat.
The property offers Two good sized rooms with plenty of space for all types of bedroom furniture. The bathroom suite is in great condition and offers a panel bathtub and is tiled from floor to ceiling for ease of maintenance. The property also offers a separate WC.
Location


New River Crescent is very well connected. A number of bus routes allow for easy access whether you are heading south towards Harringay or North towards Enfield. Close to Broomfield Sports Ground and conveniently positioned for the excellent selection of shops, restaurants and transport facilities of both Palmers Green and Winchmore Hill. You will also find the popular Hazelwood Primary School within close proximity and easy access to St Monica’s Church. The location also provides easy access to the A10 and A406.

An ideal home for people looking to live in a residential patch surrounded by amenities. Imminent interest is expected!

‘Think...Property Inc’

detailedDescription:
Beautifully presented chain free original four bedroom semi-detached house with retaining period features and garage to side, located on a quiet tree lined residential turning forming part of the desirable Minchenden Estate. This property has great potential to increase the living space by extending to rear, above the garage and into the loft space.

Langside Crescent is ideally located for The Green and its local shops, restaurants, Ye Old Cherry Tree pub and bus routes. It is also within close proximity to several stations including Arnos Grove and Southgate underground stations as well as Palmers Green mainline station into Moorgate.
Green spaces/parks are well catered for, including Arnos, Broomfield Park and Groveland's Parks. Trent Country Park is a short drive away. There are schools within close walking distance, including Walker Primary School.

Built in 1928 • Impressive entrance hallway with original wood parquet floor and bay window • Spacious through lounge with large front bay window, French doors to rear garden, wood parquet floor and fireplaces • Morning/tv room opening to kitchen/diner with door to garden and working original servant's bell system • Ground floor guest cloakroom • Spacious landing with a beautiful original stained glass window and access to loft space with potential to convert • 19ft master bedroom with built in wardrobes • Two further double bedrooms and a good size single bedroom currently used as an office • Family bath/shower room • Gas central heating • Off street parking to front for several cars • Garage with automatic door • Secure gated side access • Mature rear garden with fruit trees measuring just under 100ft

address: Tower Point, 52 Sydney Road, Enfield EN2
detailedDescription: Space presents this well-designed 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment on the 9th floor in a purpose-built building at Tower Point, situated in an excellent location of Enfield Town Centre. This home is in pristine condition with central climate control heating and air-conditioning and electric remote controlled blinds. The apartment has a large balcony with impressive views in a highly desirable location with fantastic transport links. The property welcomes you into hallway with access to the living room, the two bedrooms and the family bathroom. The well-appointed modern kitchen has perfect wall and floor tiles, integrated neff appliances; full-size dishwasher, washing machine, induction hob, microwave, fridge freezer, granite worktop with under-mount sink and is set in the alcove of the living room. New wooden flooring throughout the property, newly decorated walls and the new modern kitchen, a/c and central heating, makes this property one of the most desirable apartments in the building. Double glazing tilt-and-slide balcony doors and the large double-glazing window in both bedrooms adds plenty of natural light, as well as the glass panelled living-room door brings light into the entrance way. The electric blinds in the living room and dining room, set the tone for a sophisticated evening. The bedrooms are both a good size and benefit from high quality fitted wardrobes. The large balcony has access from the living room and also the master bedroom, and the spectacular view can relieve you of the stresses of the day. The apartment comes with ‘under-building’ parking for one car. 104 years remaining on the Lease. This is a 'must-see' property. Please call today to book your viewing appointment.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
** Your Chance To Own A Share In This Stunning Development Available To Purchase Between 25% And 75% **

For just £110,625 which is a 25% share of this luxury apartment with generous-sized rooms which have been completed to a high specification are full of natural light, complementing the semi-rural setting. The contemporary décor is additionally offset by historical touches that echo the distinguished heritage of its magnificent surroundings.

Set within the historical Royal hunting ground of Trent Park, which is 400 acres of parkland, you will have the opportunity to seek and secure a rich prize of your own. This is a wonderful oasis away from the busy surroundings. Located amongst beautiful parkland in the north London triangle of Oakwood, Cockfosters and Hadley Wood. Nature is all around, yet so much more is on your doorstep, from sport and leisure facilities to shopping and dining opportunities. The development further offers easy access to the M25 and connects to King's Cross in 27 minutes from nearby Oakwood underground station.
These stunning apartments can come in at a lower cost than you might think, thanks to the Shared Ownership scheme. Purchase your dream home from as little as a 25% minimum share.

The Kendrick Collection and The Chase Collection at Trent Park is a selection of one, two and three-bedroom apartments set amidst a 56-acre estate.

To stay informed about the latest details, events, show homes and Trent Park viewing openings, register with us today

title: 6 bed property for sale

address: Prytaneum Court, 251 Green Lanes, London N13
detailedDescription:
A stunning and unique one bedroom apartment situated on the lower ground floor of an exclusive gated development in the heart of Palmers Green, within easy reach of the mainline br station to Moorgate and a bus service to Wood Green underground station (Piccadilly Line).

The property boasts stylish living accommodation filled with modern finishing touches. There is an impressive open-plan reception room/kitchen with dual aspect windows. The kitchen is fitted with a range of bespoke, two-tone units finished with a quartz work top and a range of integrated appliances. You will also find an attractive porcelain tiled bathroom and a double bedroom. Externally the property enjoys direct access to a private L-shaped patio terrace, part of which overlooks Pymmes Brook. Additional benefits include private access, a colour video entry phone system, solid oak flooring, a lift, secure cycle storage and an unexpired building warranty. Offered for sale chain-free and with a remaining lease term in the region of 121 years.

The building, which was constructed in 1894, was previously home to Southgate Town Hall until early 2014, soon after which the site was acquired by award winning developer, Hollybrook. The development involved extensive and sensitive restoration works, resulting in a blend of Victorian charm and luxurious contemporary living which completed in 2016. The location offers excellent convenience, with Palmers Green library and a private gym adjacent to the building, and an excellent selection of cafes and restaurants found along Green Lanes, and opposite Broomfield Park on Aldermans Hill.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Set on one of the most premium roads in Southgate is this five-bedroom, double-fronted, semi-detached family home on Merrivale.

This property is perfect for a family that is looking for space and looking to put their stamp on a forever family home in a premium area. With five good-sized rooms and the master benefitting from its own walk-in wardrobe and ensuite shower room there is ample room to accommodate the whole family and in-laws. If entertaining space is top of the priority list, then the large through lounge, separate kitchen and morning room is perfect for hosting with further potential to add living space to the rear and via garage conversion (STPP).

Merrivale is located within close proximity to both Oakwood and Southgate Stations and is within several outstanding school catchments including Eversley Primary and Highlands and Southgate Secondary Schools.

"Before we moved to Merrivale, we were living in Prince George Avenue, we love this area it is so peaceful and has been perfect for raising our family. The kids and grandchildren have all had enough space here and we have enjoyed many birthdays, weddings, and other celebrations over the years of us living here. Unfortunately, the time has come for us to downsize, so, our message to the new buyer is to love this house, it will not disappoint you. It is a lovely family home and has met all of our needs. I would love for a new family to take over and enjoy the amount of space this house has to offer."

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
The Lakes Estate conservation area is situated in Palmers Green/Southgate, North London. This property is located in one of the most highly sought-after tree lined roads, just off Aldermans Hill and opposite the open space of Broomfield Park and close to Grovelands Park. Close to many cafés and restaurants, as well as being a short walk to both br (Moorgate) and the local High Street with the A406 (North Circular) a few minutes drive.

This house has been sympathetically extended and renovated over three floors with a great layout downstairs, high ceilings throughout with two good sized reception rooms, one with a feature fireplace. The property has been newly redecorated throughout. The extended modern kitchen (approx 26ft in length) has bi-folding doors which stretch the entirety of one side onto the garden given a feel of the outside and space. Upstairs there are three bedrooms off the large landing and the loft provides a further impressive master bedroom with en-suite which leads out to a decked balcony.

Front garden: Gravel. Off-street parking. Steps up to main front door.

Entrance: Intercom system. Via hardwood front door.

Hall: Tessellated flooring. Dado rail. Picture rail and cornicing. Cast iron radiator. Stairs to first floor. Doors to all rooms. Understairs storage.

Reception 1: Oak flooring. Feature fireplace (working) with timber surround and cast iron inset. Timber bay window to front aspect with shutters. Picture rail. Cornicing. Ceiling rose. Radiator.

Reception 2: Oak flooring. Built in storage/shelving. Picture rail. Cornicing and ceiling rose. Timber bay window and doors to rear aspect leading to garden.

Ground floor W/C: Close coupled W/C. Corner basin. Slate flooring. Extractor fan.

Kitchen: Large open plan space with ample room for breakfast/dining table. Tiled flooring. Contemporary handless high gloss kitchen fitted wall and base units with integrated double oven (Neff). Integrated five ring gas hob (Miele). Integrated wine cooler. American fridge/freezer. Under-hung Blanco sink with white composite stone worktops. Integrated microwave (Neff). Built-in TV. Partly tiled walls. Bi-folding UPVC double glazed doors to side and rear aspect. 2 x modern wall radiators.

Landing: Carpet. Doors to all rooms. Staircase to second floor.

Bedroom 1: Carpet. Timber bay window to front aspect. Radiator.

Bedroom 2: Carpet. Feature fireplace with cast iron surround. Tiled inset with cast iron fire. Fitted wardrobe. Door to en-suite. Timber sash window to rear aspect. Radiator.

En-suite: Ceramic flooring. Shower cubicle with thermostatic shower. Close coupled W/C. Basin. Fully tiled walls. Extractor.

Bedroom 3: Carpet. Timber window to front aspect.

Bathroom: Ceramic flooring. Bath with side panel. Close coupled W/C. Basin with chrome taps. Chrome towel rail. Partly tiled walls. Cupboard housing megaflow system. Timber sash window to rear aspect.

Second floor landing: Carpet. Door to Bedroom 4.

Bedroom 4: Carpet. Modern bi-fold doors opening onto large balcony with stunning views. Velux windows front aspect. Radiator. Door to en-suite.

En-suite: Ceramic flooring. Shower cubicle with thermostatic shower. Close coupled W/C. Basin. Fully tiled walls. Velux window to front aspect. Extractor.

Rear garden: Contemporary composite 'weather proof' decking. Lawn area. Part patio to rear with shed. Mature trees and border shrubs.

detailedDescription:
The accommodation, that extends to 570 sq ft, comprises ground floor entrance with stairs rising to first floor landing and doors leading to: Large bay fronted reception room, separate fully applianced kitchen with breakfast bar, double bedroom to rear aspect, fully tiled bathroom suite and a separate/guest WC. The property is benefits from several period features to include coving, picture rails, high ceilings, tessellated entrance hall and an ornate cast iron fire surround. Additional features include UPVC double-glazing throughout, generous loft storage and sole use of the front garden.

Lodge Drive is an attractive residential street of period properties and is closely located to Palmers Greens Triangle, the junction of Aldermans Hill and Green Lanes. Therefore, the property is very well located for the many social and leisure amenities of Palmers Green that comprise a Morrisons Supermarket, numerous independent retailers, a Farmers Market and well-regarded restaurants. Broomfield Park (a 21-hectare public park) is easily accessible and consists of playing fields, a boating lake and community orchard. Palmers Green Station (Overground) is within comfortable walking distance and provides regular commuter rail services to Londons Moorgate and Kings Cross Stations.

address: Parkgate Avenue, Hadley Wood, Hertfordshire EN4
detailedDescription:
A very well presented six bedroom, four bathroom, four receptions Mock Tudor detached family home of just over 3,600 sq ft.

The downstairs accommodation benefits from a deep entrance hallway with doors leading to a dual aspect open-plan living room and dining room which in turn leads through to a modern kitchen breakfast room featuring lovely views over the rear patio and garden. A combined utility room and storage area along with a generous integral garage and downstairs guest w.c are also accessible from the entrance hallway.

The first floor comprises a master bedroom with a contemporary en-suite bathroom and a storage room. Four further double bedrooms complement the first floor along with a modern family bathroom and a family shower room. A modern LED lit staircase rises to the versatile second floor of this spacious home which currently consists of a cinema room/ lounge, an office and a large shower room. This could be adapted to a families needs if one requires additional bedrooms or even a self-contained apartment for guests or family.

The private rear garden is ideal for outdoor entertaining and offers a wide patio for dining along with a hot tub area. The remaining garden is mainly laid to lawn with fenced borders and a variety of shrubs and plants.

Approach:- The property is approached via a sweeping block paved driveway providing ample parking for numerous vehicles which in turn leads to the integral garage, side pedestrian access and an ornate entrance and front door.

Location:- The property is located on a quiet tree lined avenue of Hadley Wood and is within walking distance of Hadley Wood mainline station, Hadley Wood primary school, local shops, golf course and tennis club. The M25 is also just a short drive away.

For more properties for sale in Hadley Wood please call our Hadley Wood Estate Agents .

detailedDescription:
A spacious, four bedroom semi-detached period house situated on the desirable 'Lakes' conservation area, within easy reach of Grovelands and Broomfield Parks, St. Monica's Primary school, and an excellent selection of cafes and restaurants along nearby Aldermans Hill and 'The Green'.

The property boasts 1749 Sq.ft of living accommodation with period features including beautiful stained glass windows, tessellated tiled flooring, high ceiling, and exposed woodwork.

The ground floor boasts an impressive front reception room with a large bay, high panelled ceiling and bespoke units built-into the alcoves. At the rear of the house is a dining room with an imposing cast iron fireplace and opening leading into an eat-in kitchen. You will also find a guest WC located at the end of the entrance hall.

The first floor provides three well-proportioned bedrooms and a traditional style family bathroom, whilst the loft has been converted into a large fourth bedroom and a shower room.

Externally the property enjoys a rear garden extending 74' on length and a driveway at the front.

Location:
Conway Road is a sought-after residential turning enviably located within easy reach of both Palmers Green mainline station and Southgate Underground station. You will also find the popular Broomfield and Grovelands Park's nearby, as well as an excellent selection of shops, restaurants and bars on Southgate Green and Green Lanes.

This property also benefits from an excellent location & superb transport links: Within minutes of Enfield Town, the benefits of shopping & recreational facilities are endless; Transport links include Bush Hill Park (13 minute walk), Grange Park Train Station (25 minute walk), Enfield Chase Train Station (25 minute walk) & Winchmore Hill Train Station (30 minute walk), & many bus routes. detailedDescription:
A particularly light and spacious executive style family home featuring 3 reception rooms (originally 4), large hall, 5 double bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and secluded gardens.

Double front doors open onto the really spacious hall with downstairs w.c. And turning staircase to the first floor. The main reception room, which could be divided into 2, is triple aspect with views of the rear and side garden. The dining room is connected to the fitted kitchen and the 3rd reception is currently being used as a study but could also be used as a TV room. There is also a separate utility room.

Upstairs, the master bedroom and second bedroom both have their own en-suite and fitted wardrobes, there are an additional 3 double bedrooms and family bathroom.

To the front is a driveway in front of the detached double garage, lawn and hedging directly in front of the property and access to the side garden. The secluded south east facing rear garden has a paved patio area, the rest laid to lawn.

Set within this highly desirable private and exclusive development, the property is surrounded by countryside allowing a rural feel. However, Potters Bar (3 miles), Crews Hill (1.8 miles) and Cuffley (2.3 miles) train stations are a short drive away allowing direct access into the City of London thus creating the 'best of both worlds' scenario. Also, not far away is a variety of highly regarded schools, both in the private and state sector to include Lochinver House (boys), Stormont (girls), St Johns and Queenswood.

Loft has potential for development STPP.

Bathroom is equipped with large bathtub, shower, WC, bidet and basin.

Double room is equipped with laminate flooring, double glazed windows and fitted wardrobes (0.5 metres depth)

Master bedroom is equipped with carpet, double glazed bay windows and fitted wardrobes (0.5 metres depth)

Single room is equipped with laminate flooring and double glazed windows.

Side building was originally a garage (planning permission granted 4 years ago)
Now converted into a split level one bedroom flat, equipped with open plan lounge, integrated kitchen appliances, downstairs WC & shower.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Located towards the entrance of this exclusive private cul de sac on a superb plot which provides a magnificent landscaped rear garden and a large front garden area with a substantial driveway which offers plenty of parking. Corbar Close backs on to the stunning open expanse of Hadley Wood Golf Club. Located off Beech Hill in this popular and quiet residential location, yet only a short distance to Hadley Wood National Rail Station with its fast trains into Kings Cross & Moorgate (Zone 6- Oyster).

This contemporary home which has been beautifully interior designed with a subtle hint of Art Deco, the accommodation provides a wealth of well proportioned rooms over two floors only. The ground floor reception areas interconnect and sub divide to provide extremely well planned and easily accessible rooms to include a reception hallway, principal reception room, a formal dining room, a fitted bespoke kitchen breakfast room, utility room, study and cloakroom, television room/snug with kitchenette and cloakroom, garden room (summer dining room) which overlooks the landscaped rear garden, gym (family room), indoor swimming pool with steam room. The first floor which incorporates the stunning principal bedroom suite with fitted wardrobes and en suite bathroom, two further bedroom suites, one additional bedroom and a family bathroom.

Outside
Externally the property features a double width garage, further off street parking on the driveway which is set back behind a large lawned front garden. To the rear the beautiful garden is has been painstakingly designed and maintained to provide various different areas and follies, ideal for relaxation, combining a well-maintained lawn section and patio area which is beautifully maintained with deep herbaceous borders and an abundance of trees and shrubs, together with a contemporary waterfall, a separate area finished with astroturf and a separate courtyard garden.

Situation
The location is also well known for its renowned green spaces, Hadley Wood Golf Club is adjacent to Corbar Close. The location is well renowned for ease of access to some highly regarded schools, such as Alphablocks and Norfolk Lodge which are notable nursery schools, Hadley Wood Primary School, Monken Hadley C of E Primary School and Mount House School. There are coach pick ups in Hadley Wood for The Haberdashers’ Aske’s Boys’ and Girls’ Schools, North London Collegiate School and St Albans Boys and Girls Schools. Other private schools within easy reach are Lochinver House and Stormont Cockfosters has a superb selection of restaurants and cafes. Also nearby is the delightful Trent Park for county walks and the Piccadilly Line underground Station, together with easy access to the M25.

detailedDescription:
Ian Gibbs are proud to be marketing this large and very well presented four bedroom detached family home. The property is located in a desirable location and has many benefits including off street parking, large rear extension, separate utility room and beautiful large rear garden.

The property is located on Hadley road a well-regarded road within Enfield and is located just off The Ridgeway.

The property offers a range of amenities close by including Chase Farm Hospital, Enfield Town and rural locations such as Botany Bay and Hadley Wood.

To the front of the property is a stone driveway with parking for multiple cars and the large wooden double doors to the front porch lead into the

Entrance Hall 15'5 x 9'5 Wide staircase located in the center of the hall, 2 storage cupboards located under the stairs, radiator.

Formal Living Room 18'1 (Into Bay) x 15 Double glazed dual aspect bay windows, 2 radiators, log burner fire place.

Rear Family Room 24'3 x 21'6 Multiple purpose family room featuring double glazed bi-folding doors opening to the rear garden, double glazed French doors opening to the side garden and double glazed bay window to opposite side. Multiple fitted units with desk area, 3 large fixed Velux skylights, answer telephone for front entrance.

Kitchen 17'3 x 8'4 (Forming part of the family room) Modern white fitted kitchen with granite and wood work surfaces. A range of integrated appliances including wine cooler, microwave and large extractor fan located above wide oven space, there is also space for a dishwasher and fridge/freezer. Dual aspect double glazed windows, 2 storage cupboards with one housing the combination boiler.

Large downstairs WC 7'6 x 4'5 toilet, glass sink with storage below, double glazed frosted window, chrome heated towel rail, door into the

Utility room 7'5 x 5'5 Fitted units with granite and wood work surfaces with space, electric and plumber for a washing machine and tumble dryer with sink inset to work surface. Large double glazed window.

1st Floor

1st Floor landing 11'8 x 9'7 (Max) Double glazed frosted window over staircase and doors to all rooms on this floor.

Master Bedroom 19'2 (Into Bay) x 17'2 (Into Bay) Dual aspect double glazed bay windows, 2 radiators, fitted wardrobes and storage.

Bedroom Two 14'1 (Into Bay) x 11'7 Dual aspect double glazed windows, radiator.

Bedroom Three 10'6 (Into Bay) x 9'8 Double glazed bay window, radiator.

Family Bathroom 11 x 6'5 Four piece suite consisting of toilet, sink with storage underneath, corner bath and large walk in shower with fixed glass door with shower attachment and overhead shower. Dual aspect frosted double glazed windows, chrome heated towel rail, separate wall mounted electric heater, extractor fan.

2nd Floor

2nd Floor Landing 7'11 x 5'7 Double glazed frosted window above staircase, Velux skylight, storage within the eves of the loft.

Bedroom Four 14'4 x 13'11 Triple aspect with double glazed window to the front and 2 Velux skylights to either side, fitted wardrobes and storage and cupboard to storage within the eves of the loft.

Ensuite 7'11 x 5'8 Three piece suite consisting of wall fitted toilet, wall fitted sink and bath with shower attachment and shower overhead, 2 Velux skylights, chrome heated towel rail and extractor fan.

Exterior

To The Rear

Large Garden of approximately 110' with patio area to the side and access to front either side of the property. Well maintained grass area to the rear with a range of plants, shrubs and well established pond, large storage shed/barn style to the very rear.

To The Front

Stone driveway with off street parking for several cars and well established shrubs and bushes to the front and sides with direct access onto Hadley Road.<br /><br />

address: Corbar Close, Hadley Wood, Hertfordshire EN4
detailedDescription:
This finely appointed detached family residence is situated in a private woodland close which consist of 8 homes and is set within a plot just under a 1/3 of an acre. This particular home has been designed with a modern yet contemporary theme. This home offers vast amounts of entertaining space and versatility depending on a particular persons living requirements.

As you enter the home the main hallway leads to the formal lounge with double doors leading to the formal dining room and this connects to the kitchen breakfast room which has been appointed with a bespoke contemporary wooden kitchen and granite worktops. The Kitchen leads through to a family living and separate dining area which also access's the garden. The northern wing of the home also has a separate annex / home office which has its own kitchenette and Shower room. The hallway also links to a separate side entrance which has a WC and also access's the double garage.
The southern wing of the house provides a full leisure suite including a gym and links to the indoor Swimming pool and jacuzzi. There is a steam room and a beautiful appointed WC and Shower room / changing room.

To the first floor there are four double bedrooms and a family bathroom. Bedrooms two and three have the added benefit of en suites and built in wardrobes. The master suite has an array of fitted wardrobes with a hidden door that leads to a sumptuous en suite bathroom that consists of a five piece suite.

The rear garden has been bespoke designed and has various different features including a walled courtyard garden, cascading water feature and lighting. There is also a woodland walk that leads to a perfect area which is used as a games area as this has been laid with a lazy lawn.

The front of the property is also beautiful landscaped and offers a carriage driveway of approx 107 ft in width and provides parking for a number of vehicles.

Location: Close to Hadley Wood British Rail Station, Cockfosters Piccadilly Line Underground and Barnet Northern Line Underground. Good road links and airport access. A pick up point for local quality schools and a short walk to Hadley Wood Golf Club.

Corbar Close is a secluded, safe, quiet close of 8 homes and is situated directly off Beech Hill.

detailedDescription:
First time buyers or investors! EweMove Barnet present this chain free 2 double bedroom ground floor maisonette with own rear garden and garage. The property has been modernised and would be ideal for investment or a first time purchase. Contact us 24/7 to arrange your viewing or book online!

This property is located just off Lancaster Road. This spacious mainly refurbished maisonette has a share of the freehold and has 973 years remaining on the lease and includes off-street parking at the front for residents and ample visitors parking, as well as its own garage to the rear of the property.

Internally the property includes 2 double bedrooms, the main bedroom has fitted wardrobes, and the second bedroom would be an ideal child's bedroom or an office/study for those home workers. A good size lounge with patio doors leading directly onto your own rear garden. A brand new Schuller fully fitted kitchen with all appliances. A brand new bright and modern fully fitted bathroom with a bath and a wall-mounted shower. Full gas central heating and double glazing. Brand new Vaillant combi boiler. Newly painted. Re plumbed and partly rewired. This ideal first-time purchase, Investment for Buy To Let or a family apartment is chain free!

If its tranquil settings, a community vibe and fast travel links into central London that float your boat, you should look into calling the North London area of Enfield your next home. Enfield is especially popular with families thanks to the abundance of green spaces, local parks and good schools including Worcesters Primary School and Enfield County School for Girls. It's also in demand with professionals who are looking for quieter areas to call home. The closest public transport operates at Gordon Hill station, which is just 0.5 miles away. There are direct services to Central London and the City, which take just over half an hour to complete. Enfield Town station is just 0.8 miles away and takes you directly into Liverpool Street Station. Oakwood Tube Station on the Piccadilly Line is also only 2.4 miles away.

This lovely chain free share of freehold home, which has 973 years remaining on the lease, is available for viewings now and we would love to show you around. Please call EweMove Barnet & Borehamwood on or book your viewings online 24/7!

This spacious, one-bedroom apartment is on the third (top) floor and features a reception room with an open-plan kitchen and a well defined dining area. Energy-efficiency and environmental-impact ratings are very good, thanks to modern insulation standards, gas central heating and high performance glazing. Shops, supermarkets, restaurants and a cinema can be found on or around the nearby Great Cambridge Road, Hertford Road and Southbury Road. Also within easy reach are Enfield Playing Fields and Forty Hall, considered one of England's finest historic houses and surrounded by more than 270 acres of grounds.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Offered chain free is this stunning one double bedroom ground floor maisonette with own rear garden. Refurbished to a high standard including a fully integrated fitted kitchen, walk in shower, gas central heating and spacious lounge. Property benefits from a share of freehold.

What the vendor loves about their home!

"I have thoroughly loved living here in Glenville Avenue. The location has been perfect for my daily commute to the city, with a ten minute walk to the station and direct trains into Moorgate and also easy tube access.

The road is relatively quiet and you’re always able to find car parking close by. The surrounding area is beautiful and you can enjoy walks to the nearby Hilly Fields Park as well as longer walks into the Forty Hall estate. The local shops are a stone’s throw away and the area is perfectly located for the garden centres of Crews Hill and shopping in Enfield Town or the retail parks on the A10.

The flat is incredibly comfortable and spacious, and has been designed with maximum storage and comfort in mind. I have loved hosting here, both inside and out in the beautiful sunny garden. I will genuinely miss this flat – along with the wine cooler!”
Close to


Gordon Hill station 0.5 miles away.

Local amenities 0.2 miles away.

Summary
Within Ruby Mews, we are delighted to present a super, new build, two bedroom apartment, preloved by one owner only. This home has attractive decor throughout and to a high specification, master bedroom ensuite, balcony for outdoor space and open plan living ideal for entertaining. Must be seen!

Description
Situated within Ruby Mews, a development of beautiful apartments, we are thrilled to offer to the market a two bedroom, two bathroom, apartment on the 2nd floor on this newly built block, just several years old.

With over 800 sq ft, this attactive home offers a comfortable lifestyle, it has open plan living, a neat integrated kitchen, a balcony for some outdoor space, the spacious bedrooms have neutral decor, the bathrooms both have modern tiling and sanitaryware and the hallway benefits from two storage cupboards.

Benefits from having parking, a long lease (120 years) and it is within its 10 year build warranty period

Ideal for a commuter to London, this flat is located 0.6 Miles from Arnos Grove Underground Station (Piccadilly Line), 1.6 Miles from Palmers Green over ground station & moments away from the local shops and amenities

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
An outstanding four bedroom, three bathroom townhouse with balcony tucked away on a quiet residential road in North-East Enfield. This family home is presented over 3 floors and comprises of a large garage, spacious kitchen/diner, a first floor living room which opens up to the balcony, 3 bathrooms (4 toilets, one on each floor), 45ft rear garden and very good size bedrooms.

Location is perfect if you are after a private and quiet lifestyle, with the property situated deep in Enfield Island Village, formerly part of the Epping Forrest district of Essex. But has the convenience of being close to the Local Tesco Express, Library, Youth Club, The Island ViIllage Surgery and more. Enfield Lock Station is only a short distance away, with 121 and 491 bus routes giving you direct access to Enfield Town Shopping parade, Waltham Cross and North Middlesex Hospital.

detailedDescription:
For Sale by Online Auction, Starting Bid of £265,000 Terms and Conditions Apply.

Gracechurch Property Services are delighted to market this three bedroom Split-Level Maisonette.

This property is being sold with an Incumbent Tenant, generating £1400 pcm rental income and is therefore only available to a Buy-To-Let Investor

Moorfield Road is set on the third and fourth floors of this purpose built development, located just off Carterhatch Lane conveniently located to the Local Shops & Amenities and transport links via the A10 Great Cambridge Road and Hertford Road. Brimsdown Train Station is less than 1 mile away which offers links into Tottenham Hale & Liverpool Street.

Added benefits include, a modern bathroom, large bedrooms and a spacious lounge and dining area.

Other Information...

Vendors position: Chain Free (sold with tenant)
Rental Income: £1400 pcm
Council Tax Band: C
Tenure: Leasehold 85 Years Remaining
Location of Boiler: Kitchen
Windows: Double Glazed
Heating: Gas Central Heating
Service Charge & Ground Rent: £800 Per Annum

Auctioneers Additional Comments

Pattinson Auction are working in Partnership with the marketing agent on this online auction sale and are referred to below as 'The Auctioneer'.

Please be aware that any enquiry, bid or viewing of the subject property will require your details being shared between both the marketing agent and The Auctioneer in order that all matters can be dealt with effectively.

This auction lot is being sold either under conditional (Modern) or unconditional (Traditional) auction terms and overseen by the auctioneer in partnership with the marketing agent.

The property is available to be viewed strictly by appointment only via the Marketing Agent or The Auctioneer. Bids can be made via The Auctioneers or the Marketing Agents website.

Your details may be shared with additional service providers via the marketing agent and/or The Auctioneer.

A Legal Pack associated with this particular property is available to view upon request and contains details relevant to the legal documentation enabling all interested parties to make an informed decision prior to bidding. The Legal Pack will also outline the buyers' obligations and sellers' commitments. It is strongly advised that you seek the counsel of a solicitor prior to proceeding with any property and/or Land Title purchase.

In order to submit a bid upon any property being marketed by The Auctioneer, all bidders/buyers will be required to adhere to a verification of identity process in accordance with Anti Money Laundering procedures.

In order to secure the property and ensure commitment from the seller, upon exchange of contracts the successful bidder will be expected to pay a non-refundable deposit of 5% of the purchase price of the property. The deposit will be a contribution to the purchase price. A non-refundable reservation fee of up to 6% inc VAT (subject to a minimum of £6,000 inc VAT) is also required to be paid upon agreement of sale. The Reservation Fee is in addition to the agreed purchase price and consideration should be made by the purchaser in relation to any Stamp Duty Land Tax liability associated with overall purchase costs.

Both the Marketing Agent and The Auctioneer may believe necessary or beneficial to the customer to pass your details to third party service suppliers, from which a referral fee may be obtained. There is no requirement or indeed obligation to use these recommended suppliers or services.

detailedDescription:
Stunning two double bedroom ground floor Edwardian flat offering 753 sq ft of newly refurbished floor space with a beautiful kitchen/diner, a modern bathroom, own front door and sole use of rear patio terrace and garden.

Lightcliffe road is a popular residential turning off Hazelwood Lane close to Palmers Greens high roads shops, restaurants, bus routes and mainline station into Moorgate. Broomfield Park and the New River are also within easy walking distance.

title: 5 bed detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
This detached five bedroom family home is situated in the highly sought after Hadley Park Estate. The home has been extended and remodelled and offers open plan living to the ground floor with flexible and versatile accommodation upstairs.

As you enter the property the hallway leads to the main living room and a guest WC. The open plan super room has a beautifully appointed kitchen with granite worktops and a range of integrated appliances. The living space consists of two separate seating areas and a large formal dining area. There is also access to a converted garage that is currently used as a gym. Two sets of bi-folding doors are to the rear of the super room, one leads to the garden and decked patio and the other takes you to a bright and spacious conservatory.

To the first floor there are four bedrooms and a family bathroom that has been finished to a high standard. One of the bedrooms is currently used as a home office. The principle suite is also on this floor and has the benefit of a modern walk in en suite shower room.

To the second floor there is a studio which has a lovely sitting area, kitchenette and sleeping area with a push out 'Velux' balcony. To complete this floor there is also an en suite with a walk in shower, WC and wall mounted sink.

The rear garden is nicely landscaped, has an array of shrubs and plants to the borders and is manly laid to lawn. The garden has two decking areas, one directly is to the rear of the house and another to the rear of the garden, perfect for outdoor dining and entertaining.

To the front of the home there is a block paved driveway which allows parking for a few vehicles.

Location:- The property is ideally located for all members of the family within easy reach of Cockfosters tube station (Piccadilly line) and the wide variety of local shops on the parade. Local schools include Trent Primary school, Southgate Secondary school, jcos and East Barnet School.

detailedDescription:
Description

Situated within a sough-after residential area in the heart of Winchmore Hill and presented in excellent condition, this Leasehold two bedroomed apartment set within this former Edwardian semi-detached house boasts bright and airy interiors, modern décor, generous living accommodation offering quality fixtures and fittings with contemporary appeal and spacious interior, with Winchmore Hill Station only a stone's throw away.

The property benefits from a reception room, stylish and contemporary kitchen with fully integrated appliances, a good-sized master bedroom, second sizable bedroom, smart bathroom, wooden floor throughout, double glazing, central heating, off street parking ( on a first come first serve basis) and it's offered Chain Free!

The property is ideally situated to take advantage of the selection of shops, bars, restaurants, schools and local amenities of Winchmore Hill with nearby Palmers Green for a further selection, while the open space of Grovelands Park and the picturesque Winchmore Hill Green are also close by.

Transport links include the over ground Station of Winchmore Hill situated only a few minutes away with frequent trains straight to Moorgate, Grange Park Station and a number of regular bus services, while the motorists benefit from easy access to the A10 and the A406.

Sold with chain free! An internal viewing is highly recommended.

detailedDescription:
This beautifully positioned detached two bedroom bungalow is located in a quiet enclave of Hadley Wood, sitting on a plot close to 0.2 of an acre with a rear garden in the region of 143ft in length. The bungalow overlooks woodland which is accessed just across the road to the property.

The home consists of two double bedrooms and a modern fitted family bathroom. The kitchen/breakfast room has a range of integrated appliances and there is a well proportioned lounge/dining room to the rear plus a bright and spacious conservatory that overlooks the large rear garden which is mainly laid to lawn with planted borders.

To the front of the property there is a garden and driveway allowing parking for multiple cars and direct access to a good sized garage. The property has further potential to extend subject to planning permission.

Location : Covert Way is a wonderfully quiet road which is perfect for the individual or family who are looking for a peaceful and scenic setting within the heart of Hadley Wood. detailedDescription:
This detached five bedroom family residence is situated in a gated development in Winchmore Hill. The current owner has modernised and enhanced the home to a high specification and key features to this property are the large super room to the rear with a feature fish tank and a versatile living room that also doubles up as a cinema room.

As you enter the property the spacious entrance hallway leads you to a study, guest WC and the living room/cinema room. To the rear of the home double doors open up onto the super room which is approx 36 ft by 26ft, this room is perfect for a seating area and a family dining area. The kitchen has been fitted with contemporary high gloss wall and base units with a range of integrated Siemens appliances. Just off the kitchen area is a utility room. Bi-folding doors lead you from this amazing open space onto the rear garden.

To the first floor there is a open galleried landing that leads to the bedrooms. Currently the home is being used as a four bedroom home and bedrooms three and four have the use of the family bathroom which is well appointed with luxury finishes and has been finished with porcelain tiles to the walls and floor. Bedroom two has the benefit of an en-suite walk in shower room. The master suite is rather special as it has a vaulted ceiling with Velux sky lights with electric blinds with lovely views over the rear garden. The master suite also benefits from a sumptuous en suite walk in shower room with dual sinks and WC. The fifth bedroom has been incorporated into the master suite to allow for a large dressing room.

The rear garden has a large patio terrace that leads to an artificial lawn, perfect for all year round use and has a peaceful and tranquil outlook. The garden has direct access to the double garage.

The front of the property has a driveway with allows parking for a number of vehicles and the double garage is set to the side of the home.

Location: Set in the highly sought after and picturesque area of London, N21 within 200 metres of the prestigious Bush Hill Golf Club, this family home enjoys peace and tranquillity yet still remains within one mile from Grange Park Mainline station (approx.33 mins to Kings Cross) and 1.7 miles to Winchmore Hill Village Green where various shops, boutiques and restaurants can be found. Southgate underground station (Piccadilly line) is only 2.6 miles.

For more properties for sale in Hadley Wood please call our Hadley Wood team .

detailedDescription:
Guide Price: £450,000 - £475,000 * Offered with no onward chain is a magnificent two double bedroom garden flat. Set on the ground floor of a converted period building, forming part of a handsome Victorian terrace nestled in a quiet residential road within Palmers Green, walking distance to both Palmers Green and Wood Green Stations. Boasting circa 800 sq ft of internal floor space, this unusually spacious two bedroom flat offers bright and airy accommodation.

Comprising of a stunning large front reception room with a wealth of period features including stripped wooden floorboards, high ceilings with original ornate cornicing and rose, large bay windows and original cast iron fireplace complete with marble mantel piece. The equally spacious kitchen diner offers ample storage and direct access to the private rear garden that is generously sized and benefits from a decking area ideal for entertaining guests and is mainly laid to lawn. Both bedrooms are well proportioned doubles with the master bedroom boasting large patio doors that lead out to the rear garden. The stylish family bathroom benefits from tiled walls and floors with white bathroom suite and chrome fittings.

Location

Located close to all local amenities of Palmers Green including various shops, restaurants and cafes. You will find excellent transport links within a short walk, these include Wood Green underground station (Piccadilly line, zone 3) and Palmers Green overground station providing direct access into the City and the West End along with numerous bus routes.

Lease Information

158 years remaining. All prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries via a solicitor.

Disclaimer For Virtual Viewings

Some or all information pertaining to this property may have been provided solely by the vendor, and although we always make every effort to verify the information provided to us, we strongly advise you to make further enquiries before continuing.

If you book a viewing or make an offer on a property that has had its valuation conducted virtually, you are doing so under the knowledge that this information may have been provided solely by the vendor, and that we may not have been able to access the premises to confirm the information or test any equipment. We therefore strongly advise you to make further enquiries before completing your purchase of the property to ensure you are happy with all the information provided.

detailedDescription:
Retirement development for the over 55's. Fabulous three bedroom park home with two bathrooms, modern kitchen and utility room. Full double glazing and mains gas supply. Vendor suited. Small residential park close in Crews Hill. Picturesque location. Regular bus service.

Situated on a small residential park home site for residents aged 55 or over we offer this 44' x 20', 2008 park home which is positioned in the corner of the park with pretty churchyard views to the side and rear aspect.

The unit has been beautifully maintained by the current vendors and has benefitted from replacement boiler, some replacement double glazing and a chassis inspection in recent years.

St Johns Park is an intimate park close to local picturesque walks, close to Crews Hill br Station and with the added benefit of 456 regular bus service into Enfield and furthermore onto North Middx Hospital. This park welcomes well behaved dogs.

The accommodation offers a generous three bedrooms and two bathrooms with the master suite offering an en-suite shower room and walk in wardrobe. The dual aspect lounge leads onto the separate dining area and additionally there is a modern kitchen with farm house style units which is complimented by the adjacent utility room.

Externally the plot surrounds the unit and is secured with close boarding fencing. There is a generous patio area for table and chairs and easy resident parking.

Vendor is suited and therefore viewing is highly recommended. Cash purchasers only.

address: Newmans Way, Hadley Wood, Hertfordshire EN4
detailedDescription:
This six bedroom detached family residence is in excess of 3500 sq ft and is situated in a quiet residential turning just of Camlet Way. The property has been maintained and enhanced to a high standard and offers bright, versatile accommodation arranged over three floors with well proportioned rooms.

As you enter the home there is a spacious reception hallway with a tiled floor and a feature exposed brick wall. The hallway leads to a TV room, downstairs WC and a more formal through lounge/dining room that has direct access to the kitchen and the garden. The kitchen/diner has high ceilings and has been re-fitted with 'Schmidt' contemporary units and granite work tops. The kitchen has a range of integrated appliances including an aga dishwasher and built in wine cooler. Just off the kitchen there is direct access to the utility room and a separate plant room which has an integral door leading into the garage.

To the first floor there are five bedrooms, four of which are double bedrooms and a single bedroom/study. The second suite has a the benefit of a beautiful fitted en suite shower room and the principle suite overlooks the rear garden and has the benefit of a separate dressing room and a luxurious en suite shower room. To complete the this floor there is also a five piece suite family bathroom that has also been finished to a high standard and has a walk in multi jet shower, bath, bidet, wc and vanity unit.

The second floor has been really well designed with vaulted ceilings and provides another large double bedroom and en suite shower room. There is also a large games room which has has direct access to a large storage area.

The rear garden is approx 148 ft in length and has an array of plants, shrubs and trees and is mainly laid to lawn. As you enter the garden from the home there is a large patio and a brick built BBQ, perfect for entertaining on a large scale.

The front of the property has a a sweeping driveway and is landscaped with a lawn, planted borders and provides parking for a number of vehicles.

Location:- Located within easy reach of Hadley Wood mainline station (which offers a regular service into Moorgate with a journey time of approx. 30 minutes), Cockfosters underground station (Piccadilly Line) which is approx. 3 miles away and junction 24 of the M25, which provides a link to all major motorways and airports. Education is well catered for in the area, as are recreational facilities which include Hadley Wood Golf Club and Tennis Club. The mainline station is located in Crescent West where facilities includes a health club, restaurants, hairdressers and a newsagent.

For more properties for sale in Hadley Wood please call our Estate Agents in Hadley Wood .

Filey Properties are delighted to offer on the market this Second Floor One Bedroom Apartment situated in this Retirement Complex and suitable for applicants over the age of 60.

Built in 1988, this complex consists of 66 one & two bedroom flats with the main purpose of housing people over the age of 60 for retirement living, therefore, age restrictions apply. The communal facilities include Residents Lift, Lounge, Communal Garden, Laundry Service & Guest Facilities alongside frequent social activities such as Bingo & Cards organised by the residents.

The property boast a Spacious Lounge/Living Room, 3 Piece Bathroom Suite, Fitted Kitchen, One Double Bedroom, Double Glazing & Economy 7 Electrical Heating. Welcome to Osidge House, A collection of eleven 1,2 & 3 bedroom apartments located within the meticulously restored Grade II Listed Mansion, former home to the legend Sir Thomas Lipton. Internally you have the most unique layout within Osidge House, walking up to the separate kitchen, up again to the second bedroom and down to the en-suite, with a further two bedrooms, en-suite, bathroom and utility room located on the lower level.

An exclusive opportunity to live in a truly unique residential location.
