detailedDescription:
Cottage Fields are enthused to present this Four Bedroom Corner Plot Semi Detached House. This property boasts an array of features to include Offstreet parking for up to four cars, Main Bedroom with En-suite, Modern Designer Kitchen, Large Living and Dining Area, Catchment of sought after local schools, Utility Room, Side access to Garden, Georgian Bar Double Glazing throughout, Gas Central Heating, and many more features. Location, Location, Location this property boasts this being within a 20 minute walk to Oakwood Underground station to Central London and Local sought after schools within the catchment. This property would make an ideal family home, please see our video walkthrough tour before arranging a viewing.

Contact one of our property experts now, to arrange your viewing and hopefully the first step in securing keys to your new home.

Cottage Fields Team Member:

'This property is your ideal family home, it offers great entertaining space downstairs and a modern designer kitchen. This is also a short distance to local schools and amenities.'

Location Guide:

This property sits in between Oakwood and Enfield Chase, allowing you to benefit from two sought after locations in north London. With reputable local schools within the catchment and local transport within a short distance, in particular Oakwood Underground station (Piccadilly line) within a 20-minute walk. Trent Park offering a playground for young children and scenic grounds for you and the family. As well as being a short walk to local shops and a little further afield from Enfield Town (boasting Shopping Centre, Libraries and much more) and Oakwood Town Centre offering a parade of shops and restaurants, as well as Enfield Golf Club for the keen golfers.

Tiled flooring, painted walls and ceiling, Plumbing for washing machine, water tank, Potterton boiler, sockets, light switch, enclosed bathroom light.

Patio, external socket, and external lighting, waterpoint, side access, steps to Elevated lawn, raised flower beds to side, shed.

Carpet, skirting boards, painted walls and ceiling, coving, spotlights, Two Georgian Bar double glazed windows, smoke alarm, sockets.

Carpet, skirting boards, painted walls and ceiling, coving, double convector radiator and thermostat valve, Georgian bar double glazed window, feature dropdown light pendant, sockets, light switch.

Solid oak wood flooring, skirting boards, painted walls and ceiling, coving, spotlights, Georgian bar double glazed windows, dimmer switch, sockets, double convector radiator, and thermostat valve.

Laminate flooring, skirting boards, painted walls and ceiling, double convector radiator with thermostat valve, feature dropdown pendant, Georgian bar double glazed window, storage cupboard, sockets.

Tiled floors and walls, bath with mixer tap, overhead and handheld shower, shower screen, towel radiator, toilet with push flush, sink with vanity unit, mirror cabinet, double glazed frosted Georgian bar window, spotlights.

Solid oak wood flooring, skirting boards, skylight spotlights, smoke alarm, painted walls, carpet to the staircase, wooden banister, light switch.

Solid oak wood flooring, skirting boards, painted walls and ceiling, spotlights, four skylights with made-to-measure blinds, made to measure wardrobes and storage, storage into the eaves, double convector radiator, and thermostat valve, dimmer light switch, sockets.

This modern home offers superb accommodation measuring over 1,040 sq ft in a highly desirable location with fantastic transport links and situated on the cusp of the park. This is a delightful home ideally suited to busy people looking for convenient and stress-free living. The property welcomes you into a hallway with a dividing internal door to the living room area which is the heartbeat of the house and will immediately relieve you of the stresses of the day. Tilt and slide doors give access to the balcony from the living room and the master en-suite and provide plenty of natural light to both the living room and kitchen. The kitchen includes a range of integrated appliances, abundant cupboard and worktop Space. A staircase featuring a left-angle turn arrives at a spacious landing on the first floor, with access to the 2-double bedrooms and full family bathroom with a large bath and wc. The home offers plenty of windows and with the added benefit of sky lights. A secure gate at the front of the property leads to the underground parking. Viewings to be arranged for September 2021. 105 Years remaining on the Lease. Found Rent: £250.00 per year. Approx £3500.00 per year service/maintenance charge.

detailedDescription:
2 Bedroom apartment in Trent Park available to purchase through Shared Ownership.
Available to for a 25% share at £129,375

Financial Breakdown:
Full market value: £517,500
25% share value: £129,375
10% deposit of 25%: £12,937.50
Rent on unowned share: £889 per month
Viewings by appointment only, book yours today!

The Chase Collection
2 Bedroom Apartment at Bevan House
The well-appointed apartments at Trent Park have been designed to a high standard featuring generous-sized rooms and spacious layouts finished to a high specification. In addition, the beautifully designed kitchen in this apartment has been fitted with the latest A rated appliances. The contemporary décor is additionally offset by historical touches that echo the distinguished heritage of its magnificent surroundings. Trent Park is a little oasis away from the hustle and bustle of the city.

Location
Trent Park is located amongst beautiful parkland in the north London triangle of Oakwood, Cockfosters and Hadley Wood. Nature is all around, yet so much more is on your doorstep, from sport and leisure facilities to shopping and dining opportunities. The development further offers easy access to the M25 and connects to King's Cross in 27 minutes from nearby Oakwood underground station.

To book a viewing or more information, please register your interest and our dedicated Sales Consultant who will be delighted in helping you find your new home.

What is Shared Ownership?
If you can't afford the mortgage on 100% of a home, Shared Ownership offers you the chance to buy a share of your home (between 25% and 75%) and pay rent on the remaining share. Later on, you could buy bigger shares when you can afford to and, if you chose, own the property outright. Monthly costs to purchase via Shared Ownership are generally less than purchasing outright or renting, making it a fantastic option to get onto the housing ladder.

About Legal & General Affordable Homes
Legal & General Affordable Homes are a Registered Provider offering these apartments for sale on a Shared Ownership basis. We are creating communities to live, grow and flourish and are committed to removing the stress and anxiety associated with moving house, whilst delivering customer satisfaction and quality new homes.

Please Note: The video tour shows the 2 bedroom show apartment at Trent Park.

detailedDescription:
We are delighted to offer five newly built houses situated on the borders of East Barnet and Southgate in a private gated development.
The properties all have high specifications and conservatory extensions with bi-folding doors.
The size of the gardens differ on the end of terrace properties whilst the mid terrace properties have a well proportioned 4th bedroom within the loft space.
All of the properties have under floor heating and video entry phones to each house from the main entrance gate.
With fantastic local schools, transport links nearby and shopping facilities, these properties require to be seen to appreciate the fantastic community feel that these secluded houses give.
Call today to book an early viewing.

Kings Group - Enfield Town are delighted to offer this two double bedroom split level maisonette which is located just off Lavender Hill within a short walk of Gordon Hill Mainline Station which offers fast links into London Moorgate. As well as being within easy reach of local shops, amenities and other good transport links to the surrounding areas. This ideal family property falls within the catchments of some of the most sought after schools in the Enfield Area. The accommodation comprises two double bedrooms, good size lounge, well equipped kitchen and bathroom with separate WC. There is the added benefit of communal gardens and communal parking. In our opinion this property would make an ideal investment or First Time purchase. Internal viewing is recommended - call us today on to arrange a viewing.

detailedDescription:
This is an exceptionally bright two-bedroom flat, tastefully renovated and located in a quiet residential turning between Hoppers Road and Green Lanes. It is set on the second (top) floor of an immaculately presented boutique, purpose-built block. Its extremely convenient location, allows you to be a short walk away from the prestigious Winchmore Hill Green and Palmers Greens shopping, restaurants, bus routes and their respective mainline train stations into Moorgate. Southgate underground station is also a very short bus ride away.

This freshly renovated flat, benefits from a light and spacious living room with a Juliet balcony, a brand new high-quality modern fitted kitchen, a double bedroom with fitted wardrobes, one single bedroom, a modern bathroom, laminate flooring throughout, double glazing, gas central heating and loft storage space. The block itself is impeccably clean and boasts well-maintained communal areas. It benefits from a secure entry phone system, beautifully groomed communal gardens and secure gated parking with two allocated parking spaces as well as guest parking spaces.

This would be a perfect first time purchase, and an opportunity not to be missed with the current 5% deposit scheme and stamp duty holiday.

address: Prytaneum Court, 251 Green Lanes, London N13
detailedDescription:
A stunning two bedroom lower ground floor apartment, located in the heart of Palmers Green, within easy reach of the mainline br station to Moorgate and a bus service to Wood Green underground station (Piccadilly Line). Set within an exclusive gated development, formerly Southgate Town Hall, the property boasts a superb open-plan reception room/kitchen with direct access to a 44'11 wide private patio terrace, a contemporary bespoke kitchen with a breakfast bar, two-tone handless units, quartz work top and integrated appliances. You will also find spacious bedrooms, one of which boasts an en-suite bathroom, plus a further a shower room located off the hallway. Each are beautifully finished with high quality fittings and stunning porcelain tiles. The property also benefits from a colour video entry phone system, solid oak flooring, an allocated parking bay, lift access, secure cycle storage and an unexpired building warranty. Offered for sale with a remaining lease term of just over 122 years and no onward chain.

The building, which was constructed in 1894, was previously home to Southgate Town Hall until early 2014, soon after which the site was acquired by award winning developer, Hollybrook. The development involved extensive and sensitive restoration works, resulting in a blend of Victorian charm and luxurious contemporary living which completed in 2016. The location offers excellent convenience, with Palmers Green library and a private gym adjacent to the building, and an excellent selection of cafes and restaurants found along Green Lanes, and opposite Broomfield Park on Aldermans Hill.

address: Trent Park, Cockfosters Road, Barnet EN4
detailedDescription:
Description

Comprising over 260 traditionally designed homes within 413 acres of historic grounds in Enfield, Trent Park will include two, three, four and five-bedroom houses, and one, two and three-bedroom apartments. Its centrepiece will be the Mansion House - a Grade II Listed Mansion that is being thoughtfully restored to its former brilliance and glory.

Nestled in the heart of Trent Country Park - a former medieval hunting ground - surrounded by wildlife, ponds, lakes and ancient woodland, and above all, traditional English countryside. With breath-taking scenery all year round, from forest glades to an expanse of bluebells, there is something for the whole family to enjoy. Nature trails, country walks, bike paths and historical curiosities abound, alongside play areas, a hockey and a golf club, and a wildlife rescue centre are all on your doorstep all accessible via the Trent Park residents only shuttle bus

The King George Collection phase
North West aspect
4 bathrooms
5 bedroom house
Est. Completion: Q2 2021 - Q3 2021
Located moments from the Lime Tree Avenue and North Lawn
Shaker style kitchens and bathrooms
Excellent commuter links via M25 and Oakwood station
Influential schooling in the surrounding area
Exclusive Lawn Club facilities: Swimming pool, tennis courts & gym

detailedDescription:
Cottage Fields are enthused to bring to the market this seldom available Listed Georgian Residence on Clay Hill's conservation area. This property exudes many grand features to include Period Features throughout, 50 sqft Land, High Ceilings and Sash Windows, Exquisite Four Piece Designer Bathroom, 20ft Entrance Hall, Grand Communal grounds, Share of Freehold, Designer Kitchen/Diner, Garage, Off Street Parking and much more which need to be seen to be truly appreciated. This property offers the unique ability to capture some of Enfield's heritage with this Grade Two listed apartment. Pleasantly located within a short distance to Crews Hill, whilst being a short walk to Forty Hill and Hillyfields scenic parkland. Whilst also offering Enfield Towns Renovated Shopping Parade and Enfield Town and Gordon Hill br station with links to Central London being in close proximity for the city commute.

From the moment you approach this gated residence, the grandness is illustrated throughout as this Georgian Building will illustrate its beauty before your eyes. Once you enter the secure communal entrance the grand staircase to your apartment and decor will ensure you appreciate its rare and luxurious qualities. Please view the video tour, before you arrange your physical viewing on this unique property, we have no doubt you will not be disappointed.

Cottage Fields Team Member:

'The period features throughout this property is timeless, not only has the property been decorated to the highest standard, it offers off-street parking, land/garden, and a garage in addition to the share of freehold, you truly will be acquiring a part of Enfield's history with this grade two listed property'.

Location Guide:

This property is Enfield's conservation area and this grade two listed Georgian residence, within walking distance to scenic and Picturesque Grade 1 listed Jacobean Listed Forty Hall Manor House and Grounds, hosting a museum, exhibitions, whilst also being walk of under a minute to Hillyfields. Within short proximity, you will find Crews Hill, Crews Hill and Enfield Golf Club and Parkland for those who enjoy outdoor activity. Enfield Town is a short journey away, boasting a new state of the art library, Palace Garden shopping parade, Restaurants, Bars, Large Supermarkets, Post Office, and other local amenities. Catchment to local Oustanding rated Ofsted Schools. Both Gordon Hill and Enfield Town br station offering you direct links to Central London in under 30 minutes.

Request a viewing now or call either our Winchmore Hill or Enfield Chase Branch to arrange your viewing, with one of our friendly property experts.

Property additional info

Entrance Hall: 7.00m x 1.50m (22.97ft x 4.92ft)
Carpet, skirting boards, painted walls and ceiling, socket, phone entry system, fuseboard, double convector radiator, made to measure cabinets stretching four meters, loft hatch, wall mounted lights, coving, solid wooden front door. Thermostat, made to measure book shelf to end of entrance hall. Leading onto:

Carpet, feature wallpaper, dado rail, coving, sockets, fireplace, mantle, large sash window to rear aspect, wall mounted lights, light switch, single convector radiator. Made to measure glazed cabinet,

Tiled flooring, assorted base and wall mounted cabinets, granite worktop and washer, double convector radiator, hob, extractor, chandelier, dimmer switch, spotlights, coving, undermount sink and mixer tap, sockets, sash window.

Carpet, skirting boards, wallpapered to picture rail, painted above and coving (feature), sash window, single convector radiator, sockets, in built cupboard, made to measure glazed cabinet. Chandelier, telephone socket. Light switch.

Bedroom 2: 4.48m x 2.79m (14.70ft x 9.15ft)
Carpet, skirting board, painted walls and ceiling, picture rail, sockets, front and side aspect sash window, sockets, coving, made to measure cupboard in alcove.

Bathroom: 4.51m x 1.92m (14.80ft x 6.30ft)
Tiled marble floor and wall to dado rail, painted above and ceiling, spotlights, pull cord. Four piece bathroom suite, bath with traditional tap, frosted sash window, traditional toilet, featured marble sink and vanity unit, tiled splashback and 2.5m wide mirror, heritage towel radiator, traditional shower with overhead and handheld unit. Cupboard containing water tank and shelving, mixer tap, toilet roll holder.

Garden/Land: 50sqft

detailedDescription:
There are a good selection of local schools, Hadley Wood Primary and JCoss, just two close by. For the tube you have Cockfosters on the Piccadilly Line within easy reach along with a fabulous varied selection of restaurants and shops along the Cockfosters parade where you also have Trent Park for its beautiful walks through nature, lakes and pathways, Junction 24 of the M25 is just a short drive away.

This contemporary house has a welcoming reception hallway with views to the rear garden. There is Italian tiled flooring extending throughout the ground floor comprising of a guest cloakroom, access to an area with modern dressers which leads to the kitchen and double doors to the sitting room with a reading area by a picture window with views overlooking the front garden. The dining area with dome sky light is accessed via bi-fold doors from the lounge leading into the luxury kitchen with a central island and bar unit, two ovens, microwave, warming drawer, wine cooler and boiling tap. Across the back of the house are bi-fold doors out to the garden. Another reception room leads off the dining area with doors to the garden. This versatile room is currently used as a television room but would be an ideal playroom or office.

The utility room has a door to the side and houses all of the communications for the wifi and all TV’s.
The stairs with concealed tread lighting lead to the first floor to three bedrooms, the principle bedroom has a walk in dressing room and en-suite shower room, bedroom two has fitted wardrobes and en-suite shower room, bedroom three has an en-suite bathroom. On the top floor is a further bedroom with two skylights, en-suite bathroom and plenty of eves storage.

The well maintained flat south facing garden has a courtyard style patio area with rooms leading out to it from two aspects and to the front there is a deep frontage with long driveway.

Full market value: £442,500

Viewings by appointment only, book yours today!

The Chase Collection
1 Bedroom Apartment at Bevan House
The well-appointed apartments at Trent Park have been designed to a high standard featuring generous-sized rooms and spacious layouts finished to a high specification. In addition, the beautifully designed kitchen in this apartment has been fitted with the latest A rated appliances. The contemporary décor is additionally offset by historical touches that echo the distinguished heritage of its magnificent surroundings. Trent Park is a little oasis away from the hustle and bustle of the city.

Location
Trent Park is located amongst beautiful parkland in the north London triangle of Oakwood, Cockfosters and Hadley Wood. Nature is all around, yet so much more is on your doorstep, from sport and leisure facilities to shopping and dining opportunities. The development further offers easy access to the M25 and connects to King's Cross in 27 minutes from nearby Oakwood underground station.

To book a viewing or more information, please register your interest and our dedicated Sales Consultant who will be delighted in helping you find your new home.

What is Shared Ownership?
If you can't afford the mortgage on 100% of a home, Shared Ownership offers you the chance to buy a share of your home (between 25% and 75%) and pay rent on the remaining share. Later on, you could buy bigger shares when you can afford to and, if you chose, own the property outright. Monthly costs to purchase via Shared Ownership are generally less than purchasing outright or renting, making it a fantastic option to get onto the housing ladder.

About Legal & General Affordable Homes
Legal & General Affordable Homes are a Registered Provider offering these apartments for sale on a Shared Ownership basis. We are creating communities to live, grow and flourish and are committed to removing the stress and anxiety associated with moving house, whilst delivering customer satisfaction and quality new homes.

Please Note: The video tour shows the 2 bedroom show apartment at Trent Park.

detailedDescription:
4 bed family home! Zuplex of Palmers Green are delighted to offer this wonderful four bedroom family home to the market. Situated off Palmers Green’s famous roads - Green lanes.
This extended 1930s terraced home has been modernised throughout to luxurious high end standards. Upon entering the property you are ushered to a spacious hallway leading to the living room and a large kitchen diner, and also to a private study. The kitchen is fitted with a high end kitchen units with tall built in oven, quartz worktops, an island and tiled splash backs.
To the first floor you have two large bedrooms and a single bedroom. The master is bright and airy complete with fitted storage. Bedroom two and three are light and spacious bedrooms also finished with fitted storage. The family bathroom is well lit and fully tiled. Finished with a modern, white two - piece suite and separate bath.
To the second floor you have the fourth bedroom which is a large double bedroom with a modern fully tiled ensuite bathroom. To the rear, there is a well maintained garden consisting of a paved patio perfect for summer barbeques..
Situated on a quiet road and only 5 mins walk from the Clockhouse junction and close to all the amenities that Green Lanes has to offer. Also boasting great transport links with Palmers Green Rail station and bus connectivity with Wood Green. This property is the perfect family home nestled on a peaceful residential road and falling into the catchment area for great local schools.

Please call us on to arrange viewing

detailedDescription:
Peter Barry are pleased to offer this wonderful ground floor conversion located in the ever popular Highlands Village area with a long lease.

This great property would make the ideal home for a working professional or small family alike with good transport facilities & local schools near by.

Highlands Village is located within close proximity to Eversley & Grange Park primary schools and Highland's Secondary School, making this location ideal for those looking to be in good catchment area for great schools, you also have a Sainsburys superstore, pharmacy and a nursery close by too.

Transport facilities are good with bus routes such as the W9 & 125 taking you to Southgate Underground station or Grange park mainline station which is only 0.9 Miles away.

In brief the accommodation inner hallway, lounge dining room, fully fitted kitchen, two good size bedrooms with a large walk in space off the master bedroom into the lower part of a tower and finally the family bathroom.

Outside the communal gardens are beautifully maintained.

Viewing highly recommended.

Register your interest today and be among the first to find out about this exciting development of new houses for sale in Enfield.

Locksley Place enjoys an enviable location, just far enough out of town to enjoy the best of both worlds. Within a two mile radius you will find two large parks, and three golf courses, yet just the same distance away, you can enjoy all that a busy town centre has to offer in Enflield.

The benefits of choosing your new home in Enfield at Locksley Place don’t end with just the location. These beautiful new four bedroom homes offer a new way of living for modern families, and no matter what size your family is, you can make these homes fit your everyday needs.

These energy efficient homes stand out for their original design and modern, spacious living over three floors with the emphasis on the kitchen - the heart of the family space. The living room (on the 1st floor in the majority of these houses) is a quiet sanctuary away from the lively ground floor hub where you can kick back at the end of a busy day.

Moving made easy

detailedDescription:
A beautifully presented home with accommodation comprising of 4 bedrooms, 3 reception rooms and 3 bathrooms. The downstairs layout incorporates an open plan kitchen with an inter-communicating drawing room overlooking the rear garden, separate television room and a guest w.c located off the entrance hallway. To the first floor, the property boasts four bedrooms of which the master bedroom and bedroom two have en-suite bathrooms and there is a separate family bathroom to service the remaining bedrooms.

A delightful rear garden incorporates a patio area ideal for outdoor dining with steps leading to a wide lawned area. The garden has fenced borders and has a side pedestrian gated path leading to the front of the property.

Location:- Set in the heart of Hadley Wood within close proximity to Hadley Wood Primary School, local shops and mainline station. The M25 is a short drive away.

Approach:- A block paviour driveway provides off street parking for several vehicles and provides access to the garage and front door. The front of the property also benefits from exterior flood lighting, a wrought iron gated sideway and a front lawn area with shrub beds.

detailedDescription:
Baker and Chase are delighted to present this rarely available 3-bedroom, semi-detached house, with a garden office/summerhouse and a separate annex, complete with its own wet room.

The accommodation consists of a entrance lobby providing access to a downstairs w/c and the dining room. The dining room complete with a beautiful wood-burner provides access to the first floor and second reception room. Beyond the dining room, there is access to the primary bathroom and cottage-style kitchen, complete with granite worktops.

The first floor hosts 3 bedrooms, two of which are doubles, with the third being a single, perfect for an office or child's bedroom. The main bedroom has the added benefit of an En-suite w/c.

Externally, the property is semi-detached, so benefits from a wider than usual plot. Currently there is a garage/car port to the side. Behind that there is an annex, currently serving as a self-contained bedroom, with wet room and the potential for a little kitchenette. The back garden is low maintenance and provides access to the car port and garden office.

Occupying a desirable and semi-secluded location this house is sure to suit commuters, as Bush Hill Park London Overground is only 0.2 miles away (approx), with a range of shops nearby including Sainsbury's, Co-op and the popular Stantons Coffee shop.

detailedDescription:
A spacious two bedroom garden flat arranged over the entire ground floor of a semi-detached period conversion. Situated within the desirable 'Lakes' conservation area, the property is located close to Palmers Green mainline br station to Moorgate, Broomfield Park, as well as an excellent selection of cafes and restaurants along nearby Aldermans Hill and Green Lanes.

The property boasts 787 Sq.ft of living accommodation including a generously sized reception room, well-proportioned bedrooms, a fitted kitchen, bathroom and a separate shower room. Externally the property enjoys direct access to private section of rear garden and off-street parking. Offered for sale with no onward chain and a new 125 year lease on completion.

address: Wagon Road, Hadley Wood, Herts EN4
detailedDescription:
A lovely Victorian cottage set at the top of Wagon Road. The property is full of charm and character with outstanding views over greenbelt countryside benefiting from a southerly aspect rear garden and set within easy reach of Hadley Wood with its local shops, primary school and mainline station.

As you enter the property you are welcome by the through lounge dining room that is split by an open staircase with features including sash windows and a lovely fireplace and wood floors. To the rear of the property is a modern fitted kitchen with a range of integrated appliances and views over the rear garden.

To the first floor there are two double bedrooms and a family bathroom. The family bathroom comprises of a four piece suite including a bath separate shower cubicle sink, vanity unit and WC. A spiral staircase leads you to the third bedroom in the loft.

To the rear of the property is a south facing rear garden backing onto the woodland where you can access via a gate and take some lovely walks around Hadley Wood.

To the front of the property there is off street parking and a pathway leading to the front door.

For more properties for sale in Hadley Wood please call our Estate Agents in Hadley Wood .

detailedDescription:
Situated on one of N9s prime roads, is this immaculate two bedroom apartment. Internally, it exceeds 700 sq ft and neighbours Silver Street Station (direct access to London Liverpool Street and connecting Victoria Line Stations)
The property


The open plan kitchen/reception is massive in size and the layout offers flexibility to add a dining area or even partition into another room (subject to relevant permissions). The reception space has solid wooden flooring and is beaming with natural light through the large double-glazed windows. The Kitchen is fully equipped with a fridge/freezer, electric hob and oven. Though it is an open plan kitchen/reception, the room is well divided between the two spaces.

The Master bedroom is large in size and as you can see there is enough space for massive wardrobes to be fitted in. The room is beaming with sunlight through the end-to-end windows bringing life to the space. The second bedroom is more than adequate in size and can also accommodate bedroom furniture. The bathroom has tiled walls and flooring for ease of maintenance and is equipped with a panel bathtub, toilet, hand wash basin vanity storage.
The location


A highly desired place to move to, the property is placed centrally in N9. The A10 and A406 are in very short proximity, known in London to be primary driving connections. Allowing easy access to all parts of the Capital, also including significant motorways such as the M25, M1 and M4. The Property is conveniently close to Silver Street Overground and Edmonton Green Station providing direct access around London. Around the area you will also find an abundance of green spaces such as the renowned Pymmes Park and Tatem Park Recreation Ground.

Do not miss your opportunity to view this lovely property! Call us now.

‘Think…Property Inc!’

detailedDescription:
**click for video tour** kings are proud to present this recently refurbished Three Double Bedroom Terraced House available on a chain free basis. This substantial double fronted Victorian property is situated in the heart of N18 and forms part of a unique terrace called Witham Villas built in 1899. This period home comprises two reception rooms, a 16ft modern kitchen/diner, a refitted first floor bathroom, a lean-to ideal for storage and a south facing rear garden.

The property is a fine example of old meets new with an excellent finish and quality fittings together with charm and character. In our opinion the house would be perfect for someone looking to move straight in, where they could benefit from the extensive work carried out by the current owners including refitted gas central heating and restored original floorboards. A full list of work/upgrades available on request.

Nothing is too far away with Silver Street train station, A406 road access and North Middlesex Hospital all within walking distance. There is also the lovely Pymmes Park, popular schools and high street shops all within easy reach. The property is situated between two of the biggest redevelopment projects in North London, being the ongoing improvements around White Hart Lane and the exciting Meridian Water project set to bring new homes, business, leisure and Cross Rail transport links.

detailedDescription:
A charming two bedroom property found minutes from transport links, located in one of N22’s prime location and surrounded by beautiful green spaces. The flat is situated on the upper floor of a imposing Victorian building, within arm’s reach of Woodside Park and the bustling Wood Green High Street. The property currently achieves £1300.00 per calendar month in rental with the potential for a slight increase, Ideal for investors or first time buyers!
The property


The property has a large reception room big enough to accommodate two full-sized sofas, the space is abundant in natural light and has solid wooden floorboards. Both rooms are large double's bedrooms and very spacious capacity for bedroom furniture. The kitchen is equipped with a fridge/freezer, washing machine, oven, and gas hob. The bathroom in the property has tiled walls and flooring for ease of maintenance. It is also fitted with a panel bathtub, hand-wash basin and double glazed frosted windows.
The location


Locally to the property is the renowned High Street. With no shortage of local stores on selling fresh produce, bars/pubs, restaurants and quirky coffee shops providing perfect spots to shop, dine and relax. Not forgetting the selection of green spaces surrounding the flat. Seconds from the property you arrive at the beautiful Woodside Park, a popular park in the area, a great place to spend some time with friends and family if the weather permits! Another great park nearby is White Hart Lane Recreation Ground and Trinity Gardens. Also local is the New River Walking Path, if the desire is to take a pleasant stroll along the river this spot will not disappoint.

To get around town, you have a host of transport links. Situated less than 15 minutes walking distance of Bounds Green Underground Station (Piccadilly Line Zone 3) and Bowes Park br providing direct access to London Liverpool Street. The location also has numerous and regular bus links providing routes to most major parts of London.

'Think...Property Inc'

This stunning property benefits from a large lounge with tranquil views and direct access on to a gorgeous private patio area overlooking extremely well maintained gardens with a Southerly aspect. There are two bedrooms, both with fitted wardrobes, and the master has a large en-suite bathroom and access to the patio area. There is an additional family bathroom.
The kitchen has a comprehensive range of wall and base units with integrated appliances and granite worktops.
The apartment also has the added benefit of its own allocated underground parking and video entry system.
An internal viewing is highly recommended and can be arranged via the vendors sole agents.

A short walk away is the pretty Broomfield Park and Palmers Green British Rail for easy access to the City and Hertford, and Green Lanes provides good bus links.

The maisonette set over two floors and offers spacious living accommodation with three good sized bedrooms, the master benefiting from an en-suite.

On the ground floor the 19' lounge opens to the high spec modern kitchen with Miele appliances and there is a large patio.

Offered with no onward chain this stunning flat has under floor heating and video intercom and two allocated parking spaces.

title: 2 bed maisonette for sale

detailedDescription:
A first floor, two double bedroom maisonette, with own garden and garage, excellently located within half a mile of local shops and Cockfosters & Oakwood tube stations (Piccadilly Line).

Ps. The flat has a 997 year lease with a Share of Freehold and very low yearly outgoings.

This well maintained property, which is situated in quiet cul-de-sac, benefits from two double bedrooms, spacious lounge with sliding door onto a private balcony, double glazing throughout, 3 piece bathroom suite and a modern fitted kitchen with side access from downstairs to its own private section of garden. Offered on a chain free basis, further benefits include attic storage, a private garage and share of freehold.
Ground rent is £15 per annum and current buildings insurance - approx. £230 per annum

Oakwood is an up market residential area with a suburban feel.

Southgate has fantastic road routes in and out of London, which makes it the perfect place for families.

It has much to offer with Trent Park Equestrian centre & golf course, Oakwood Park and excellent transport links into London and the M25. In addition, Enfield Town shopping centre is within easy reach.

Oakwood is also lucky enough to be within close proximity to some of the most sought after schools in North London, all with enviable reputations.<br /><br />

detailedDescription:
Key features:
  • 840 sqft two bedroom first floor apartment with contemporary open plan design
  • En-suite to master bedroom
  • Private balcony
  • Video entryphone system
  • Underfloor heating to kitchen and bathrooms
  • Allocated parking

Main Description
Plot 3 is a 840 sqft 2 bedroom apartment with an ultra-modern design, many features to include an impressive fitted kitchen with integrated appliances, master bedroom with en-suite and access to a private balcony.

Welcome to Errigal House. Set behind its gated entrance, you will find just 5 private 2 and 3 bedroom apartments finished to a stunning specification. title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Summary
Charming three bedroom detached residence with an abundance of original features dating from the 1700's, situated on a generous plot overlooking Turkey Brook within the Turkey Street Conservation Area and within easy reach of Forty Hall Country Park, Capel Manor and easy access of Enfield Town.

Description
Delightful and unique, three bedroom detached character residence with an abundance of original period features dating from the 1700's, situated in a quiet residential location and on a generous and mature plot overlooking Turkey Brook (within the Turkey Street Conservation Area). 'The White House' is within close proximity of Forty Hall Country Park, Capel Manor College and Gardens, the A10 with its abundance of retail facilities, Turkey Street Station (Liverpool Street Line) and within easy access of Enfield Town Centre.

Entrance Hall
Solid wood floor, double radiator, beamed ceiling and walls, door to both lounge and dining room.

Dual Aspect Lounge 15' 5" x 11' 5" ( 4.70m x 3.48m )
Solid wood floor, beamed ceiling and walls with brick exposed inserts, brick exposed inglenook fireplace with inset cast iron multi fuel burner.

Dual Aspect Dining Room 16' 11" x 9' 6" ( 5.16m x 2.90m )
Solid wood floor, beamed ceiling, large walk-in storage cupboard, double radiator, brick exposed inglenook fireplace with inset cast iron multi fuel burner.

Kitchen / Breakfast Room 23' 6" max x 9' 3" max ( 7.16m max x 2.82m max )
Beautifully fitted in modern shaker style style units, comprising a range of base units with wooden worksurface over, tiled splashback, inset single bowl ceramic butler sink, space for range oven with extractor chimney over, plumbing for dishwasher, double radiator, quarry tiled floor, exposed beams to ceiling and walls, brick exposed chimney breast, stable style door to garden, door to utility room.

Utility Room 6' 10" x 5' 6" ( 2.08m x 1.68m )
A range of wall and base units with worksurface over, plumbing for washing machine, space for tumble dryer, radiator.

Landing
Approached via attractive turning staircase, beamed walls and ceiling, access to loft, fitted carpet.

Bedroom One (front) 15' 10" max x 12' 6" max ( 4.83m max x 3.81m max )
Solid wood floor, double radiator, range of fitted wardrobe cupboards, attractive cast iron fireplace.

Bedroom Two (front) 16' 4" max x 11' 2" ( 4.98m max x 3.40m )
Wood laminate floor, double radiator, attractive cast iron fireplace.

Bedroom Three (rear) 14' 6" x 9' 1" ( 4.42m x 2.77m )
Range of built-in wardrobe cupboards, radiator, two Velux windows to roof aspect, window to rear.

Family Bathroom
Beautifully appointed in a modern old style suite, comprising a freestanding cast iron roll top bath with mixer taps, vanity wash hand basin, high flush WC, extractor fan, sunken spotlights to ceiling, Velux window to roof, glass shower cubicle, part tiled floor and walls, decorative column radiator.

Outside
There are extensive gardens to side, front and rear which are laid to lawn with mature trees, shrubs and beds with an attractive picket fence to front aspect with views over Turkey Brook. There is a stone paved patio and further decked area with power and lighting with 3 metre wooden pagoda with tiled roof ideal for entertaining, large established pond, large cast concrete (sectional) storage shed with power and light, rear vehicular and pedestrian access via Gilbert Street (EN3 6PE) to double length garage with up and over door, power and light.

detailedDescription:
A rural retreat in an urban setting

Location

Hadley Common is one of the most desirable addresses in North London, it offers a rare balance of village life with ease of access to the City. It is a picturesque and peaceful Conservation Area, close to Barnet Town centre, yet only 12 miles from the central London.

A regular tube (Northern Line) service runs from High Barnet Station, it also has excellent road links via the M25 and A1 to Heathrow, Stansted and Luton International Airports. The area has an abundance of nearby golf courses, Tennis clubs and other country pursuits in Hadley Wood.

address: Hadley Common, Hadley Wood, Hertfordshire EN5
detailedDescription:
A Rural Retreat in an Urban Setting

Located in the area's premier setting, with spectacular views across Hadley Common to the front and far reaching green belt views to the rear. Being with close proximity of the historical white gates and the picturesque Monken Hadley church, within walking distance to Barnet town centre with its traditional High Street and The Spires shopping mall.

Hadley Wood is within easy commuting distance to central London with Hadley Wood mainline station offering a 30 minute journey time to Moorgate and Kings Cross and with High Barnet underground station (Northern Line) within walking distance and junction 24 of the M25 just a short drive away. Recreational facilities in the area include Old Fold Manor golf course, which is also within walking distance and Hadley Wood golf club and tennis club. Educational facilities in the area include St Martha's, Stormont, Lochinver, St Johns, Haberdashers Askes for Boys and Haberdashers Askes for Girls, Mill Hill School, Aldenham, Belmont, Dame Alice Owen, Haileybury, Queenswood and Queen Elizabeth Girls and Boys Schools.

Main Description
Welcome to Woodcroft, N21, A gated private development of only five exceptional homes - Plot 2 is a 3,126 sq’ five bedroom, three bathroom detached family home with double garage occupying a mature 0.17 acre plot directly opposite The Woodcroft Wildlife Space

Currently under construction to an unusually high specification with a modern design you will find many features to include impressive fully fitted bespoke Italian kitchen/dining areas, separate utility rooms, spacious living rooms, master bedroom with en suite and walk-in wardrobe, bi-fold doors to rear garden, double garage, 10 year New Build warranty and much, much more!

Located in the highly sought after and scenic area of Winchmore Hill you will find this home enjoys peace and tranquillity yet sits only 0.6 miles from Winchmore Hill Mainline Station (approx. 31 minutes to Moorgate) and 1.1 miles to Southgate Underground Station (approx. 27 minutes to Kings Cross). Offering easy access to Winchmore Hill Village Green where an array of shops, boutiques and restaurants can be found and excellent local schooling for all ages, you really do have all you desire.

Lock 8 Estates is proud to present this two bedroom bungalow located in Enfield, EN2. This property offers two double-sized bedrooms with enough space to add more furniture and cupboards. The bathroom also includes cupboards below the sink, heated towel radiator and separate enclosed shower cubicle.

The living area is measured at 4.93m by 3.28m approximately providing multiple space for dining tables, large sofa and any additional furniture. The kitchen features new tiles for splashback throughout and integrated appliances such as a washing machine, double oven as well as multiple storage space. Lastly, the property also benefits from a private garden with room to set up table and chairs, space for additional plants or even to use as extra storage space. Other benefits include a long drive which leads to the garage, local primary schools and easy access into central London from surrounding stations. Viewings highly recommended.

detailedDescription:
Chain-Free. A spacious four bedroom period house situated on a no-through road, just over quarter of a mile to Bowes Park br station and Bounds Green tube station.

The property boasts 1540 Sq.ft of impressive living accommodation with high corniced ceilings, sash windows, character fireplaces and intricate fretwork. The ground floor features an impressive front reception room with a box bay, whilst at the centre of the house is a morning room and an interlinking kitchen. There is also a second reception room at the rear of the house with a door leading to a shower room.

The first floor benefits from four spacious bedrooms including an impressive 18'5 wide principle bedroom, as well as a family bathroom. Externally you will find a 37' long rear garden and a paved garden at the front.
